name: David Coram
text: I had an after hours HVAC emergency at my home.  It was hot and the HVAC would not come on. It was around Midnight on a Friday night when I called Stegall. Joe Rider was on call and came right out in about 30 minutes, and got us up and running in about 20 minutes.  He was courteous, kind, and had a great attitude to be up so late.  I wish I could hire more people like Joe to work for me!!

name: Drew Lansdell
text: Stegall has been very professional in my experience with them. I have requested two homes receive an HVAC inspection prior to purchase, and Joe has performed both. I would highly recommend the service.

name: Cathy Gibson
text: Woke up July 3rd. No air. Twenty guests expected for a Fourth of July celebration!  Shelly was extremely helpful in the office and Joe the technician came out and had us up and running in no time. Thanks Stegall!!

name: Susan Smith
text: Very prompt and courteous service in the middle of the night to get our air conditioning working. We were so grateful!

name: Shane Gates
text: From the office staff to the guys on the field, everyone is fantastic! I've had work in plumbing, electrical, and HVAC. Brandon, Chuck, Justin, Nick, and Quentin are professional, personable and knowledgeable. Shelly who works in the office is priceless! This company has the best employees you could ask for! I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Excellent service! I appreciate the prompt response to my initial phone call. I can't remember the last time technicians have covered my floors with protective sheets. I have already recommended them to my co-workers!

name: G Weldon
text: Have used Stegall for HVAC units, electrical needs and plumbing issues and highly recommend them!  Just today I had a plumbing issue - was able to get a quick response time, and can’t express enough how awesome and thorough Brandon and Bobby were in resolving the problem and cleaning up afterwards.  And, the fees are so much more reasonable than what I’ve encountered in the past!

name: samuel mcdonald
text: We were very impressed with Joe's professionalism and integrity as he serviced our HVAC this morning. He did a wonderful job!

name: Tony Diliberto
text: Joe and Steven we on time and very profesh. Great company!

name: janet taylor
text: I just completely replaced my central heating/air system and duct work after many years long overdue, which was a task.  I shopped thoroughly and got 4 bids, Jeremiah's bid was best as well as the install was very satisfactory with experienced professional & courteous labor.  I greatly appreciated Jeremiah's drive and honesty to give the best job for the best price.  I also recommend Carrier Infinity unit with media filter and UV light.

name: BIZ 77
text: Had an issue with my drip pan being full and needed the drain unclogged so I contacted Stegall who sent Joe the same morning to get the issue resolved quickly.  Went ahead and signed up for the two visits a year deal because I was so impressed with the service we received.

name: Lisa Churchill
text: I called 4 different companies to help me with purchasing a new HVAC unit for my sunroom. No one could help with this purchase and install - all said that the crawl space was too small for a new unit. However, Stegall said, "Yes!" The team of Jo, Todd and Justin dismantled the existing unit piece by piece and fit the new unit in this tight space. It is anyways easier to say no but so glad that Stegall said YES! It works like a charm - thanks Stegall!

name: Caroline Langley
text: Joe Rider was the Technician that serviced our HVAC. He was quick to diagnose the issue, and he was very punctual. Would use again in the future!

name: Ron Inscho
text:
Friendly and helpful service.
Michael arrived within two hours of our urgent call and stayed until our problem was solved! The manager we worked with, Jerry,  was considerate of our plight and worked efficiently to help us get things resolved. This was one of those everything-goes-wrong days, and Stegall made it better.

name: Don Kraupa
text: Brandon did an awesome job and is very professional. He represents a great company, who must be proud to have him. Thank you Brandon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words

name: Holly Nealey
text: Thanks Joe Rider for your great service! Always prompt and knowledgeable about services provided!

name: Tina Howse
text: Our A/C went out last night and Joe was here first thing this morning and had it fixed before we could even blink. He identified the problem, replaced the motor and now we're in the cool again. I can't thank Joe enough for helping us out in such a timely fashion. Thank you Joe!!!

name: kaytebugg016
text: It’s late June. My house was 85°. A technician came and went and my issue was resolved within 25 minutes. He was polite, fast, and very knowledgeable. I also live in a condo so my access to the HVAC and condenser units was not the most convenient. Overall I am 200% pleased. Would definitely call Stegall again.

name: Shana Moton
text: Stegall offered excellent customer service from being on time for our initial quote, to offering the best quote we received, to being able to install our new A/C the very next day (on a Saturday!!).  Andrew with Stegall offered service with a smile, was very knowledgeable, and was very kind and upfront with us the whole time.  We were very impressed with Stegall and recommend them to anyone needing to replace your home's A/C - it's going to be a hot summer!! But, thankfully, we'll be sitting cool inside our home :)

name: Karri Hensley
text: I called Stegall for a broken AC. Joe from Stegall was at my house 2hours later and expertly analyzed my system. He gave his recommendation and I followed it. A crew from (Todd and Brandon) Stegall showed up the next day to install a blower to properly match my existing heat pump. Todd and Brandon worked in withering heat and paid attention to the smallest details, not scratching or denting my floors, or walls.  The heat pump developed another small issue and Joe came back to inspect the over all system AND fixed the heat pump issue not charging me the callout fee. Joe, Todd and Brandon are excellent at their jobs and are very personable people. Stegall is a quality company. I would recommend them to you.

name: Darren Wells
text: Stegall came out and serviced my air conditioner. Justin was friendly and honest and explained everything he was doing and gave me great tips. I'm freezing and it's hot as hell outside! Thanks Stegall!!!

name: andrea egea
text: Mr Gilbert saved us tonight. Was very helpful and warned us of possible future problems. I am not totally useless when it comes to such things. Was the first place to call us back at a bad time of day. Great job!

name: Lauren Hall
text: We have used Stegall for years for yearly maintenance and other work. Technician Joe Rider has been wonderful, prompt and walks us through any issues!

name: Mortimer Calhoun
text: I'm very pleased with the services I have received with Stegall. Great company, great staff.

name: Terry Stinson
text:
The service man today was Joe Riley. He was, as is usual for Steagall, prompt and courteous and solved my problem quickly and professionally.  He went the extra mile for the filter I needed after he checked everything out.

I find Steagall and it’s employees to be knowledgeable and prompt and professional from the administrative side to the service side.

name: Julie Dana
text: Called in service order for my hot water heater and they came out the very next morning at 8AM!  The service guys were excellent and their attitude was very customer oriented and professional.  I will call Stegall again when I need services they provide.

name: Libby Langford
text:
Got home from work and the house was 80 degrees! Called another company and they couldn't get anyone out until late if any, and would charge an emergency fee. Called Stegall, and the guy was here in an hour, and had it fixed shortly afterward. Very professional and efficient, and the price was VERY resonable! They are definitely my "go to" people in the future.

By the way, I AM a real customer that had a real problem....

name: Carolyn Lantrip
text: I came home from work one day to find my air conditioning was not working properly and I called Stegall the next day.  Two technicians met me at my home on Smith Lake in Winston County AL that evening around 4:00 p.m.   They were very courteous and serviced the unit.  They explained exactly what part had gone bad, replaced it with a new one which they had on the van and had my air back on within the hour.  The charge for the work was more than fair and I will definitely use them again.

name: Jenifer White
text: Excellent service throughout the process! Everyone was punctual, professional, and competent. After a bad experience with another company, it's refreshing to see that there is a company that can meet expectations. Great job!

name: Zachariah Seanor
text: Joe stopped by today and made sure our unit was running efficiently for our big family reunion. Thanks Joe Rider for answering my questions and not judging our messy house 😄

name: Crystal Knezek
text: Our main A/C unit stopped blowing cold air. Jeremiah came out quickly and diagnosed and fixed the problem, after another company screwed it up and tried to make us think we needed a whole new unit. Jeremiah was straight forward, friendly, prompt and considerate, and above all, he was honest. Thanks!

name: Michael Heaven
text: Great company, repairs on our HVAC were reasonably priced.  The service professional that came to our house, Joe Rider, did a great job getting our system back in tip top shape and was prompt and courteos!

name: Daniel Richards
text: They came out to service my HVAC and did a fantastic job!!  Mr. Gilbert was very polite and took care of us.  I will definitely will be calling Stegall again for future issues.

name: Rena Miller
text: The technician was great.  On time and super friendly.   So far my experience with Stegall has been great.

name: Haley Dshae
text: I highly recommend Stegall mechanical for any plumbing, electrical, and hvac needs. Honest and reliable and all around great company.

name: Susie Brasher
text: We recently replaced one of our units using Stegall. They made sure we were purchasing the option that worked best with our budget. We were very happy with the customer service and overall experience. Thanks Stegall!

name: Rod Damon
text: I have used Stegall for at least 5 years. I have used them for HVAC maintenance, new hot water tank, and electrical work and have always had great service. I have a yearly maintenance contract with them to service my heat pump. They come out twice a year and I have had less unit problems since I've gone with them.

name: Jennifer Lerma
text: I knew that I needed a new heat pump as my current heat pump was 14 years old.  When I got home from church on Sunday and it was 80 degrees in my house, I knew I could put it off no longer.  I had a quote from another company but had recently learned about Stegall through a co-worker.  They came out to my house within a couple of hours of receiving my call, confirmed I needed a new system, gave me quotes and options, helped with me financing and installed my new system, all within 2 days.  They sold me a better system and a better price than what I had been quoted by another company.  Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

name: Brewer Family
text: Stegall has been our go-to for Plumbing, Electrical & HVAC. We have an older home, so the guys at Stegall help us give it a little TLC. Brandon Jones especially will go the extra mile! Thank you guys!

name: Jerry Baker
text: They came out to check on our HVAC and serviced it with an affordable price.

name: Abigail Cole
text: Stegall were very professional. Got great service. Got a new heat pump installed, it is working wonderful.

name: Jason Echols
text: My house AC unit stopped working. I am a plumber by trade but I have no idea when it comes to hvac type stuff. I call stegall and they came to my house and investigated the problem. I assumed I would be looking at a huge bill because I have had similar issues at a different residence, and Norrell charged me $600, 3 separate times over a number of yrs. so I figured it was going to be the same ole same ole. But was wrong!!!! The technician that came out explained everything he was looking for and what I needed to look for and do to prolong my AC unit. Turns out I was not doing maintenance for the unit that I was not aware of. He fixed it quickly and in no time the unit was running properly. My wife was super excited and happy......happy wife =happy life. Lol 😂

resp.text: Thanks Jason for the kind words,please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Sara Fondren
text: Be careful with these guys. I had one of them tell me my condenser was bad and had to be replaced for $5000 when it was actually just a fuse. Get a 2nd opinion or better yet just don't bother calling this place at all.

name: Ann D
text: Have used in the past for HVAC repair and maintenance and recently used again to install flood lights, fix a doorbell and a 2 way light switch.  They did a great job as always.

name: Anderson Jackson
text: Andrew did a very good job this morning, he ansered all my questions. I would recommend Stegall Heating and Air.

name: Niaj Nia
text: The tech came in to check my unit. He diagnosed it as a leak but never found a leak. In addition to charging me for a diagnostic fee, I was charged an additional $125.00 for a "leak check". Isn't the diagnostic a part of checking to see what is wrong with the unit ... including checking for leaks? I would not recommend this company AT ALL. They are ripoffs and I am taking them to court if my money is not returned. I will be contacting them on Monday about this matter.

name: Jamie Cowden
text: Bought a service contract. They never called the number I gave them to set up appointments. When I need my ac fixed my contract is expired. I never received any service. Wouldn’t recommend a company that takes people’s money and doesn’t provide any services.

name: Jeremy R
text: Needed a heat pump and was impressed with how professional everyone was. I cancelled my other estimates and had a new heat pump the next day. Thanks.

name: Kasey Graydon
text: Stay away! Came and LOOKED at my water heater. Could not fix it and sent me a $200 bill! ???? The company that actually made the repair charged me less than they did to LOOK at it. Garbage. DO NOT CALL.

name: Buddy Estes
text: very prompt, knew what he was doing and repaired on the spot!

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

name: Marlin Headley
text: The technician, Joe, was courteous, efficient, and most importantly, arrived on time

name: Cindy Fletcher
text: Stegall Mechanical is one of the best plumbing companies around no doubt about it.

name: Stegall Mechanical
text: This is a one stop shop with experienced techs

name: Tina Smith
text: Great company!

name: Kaye Cook
text: I called nine days ago for a plumbing issue at my rental property. I was told they would be out that afternoon or the next day. No one ever showed from Stegall and no one called. This is the poorest action for a service company to exhibit.

resp.text: Ms Cook I apologize for this oversight on our side. I would be glad to help out in anyway I can to resolve this issue. Please contact My office at 205-251-0330 Doug Hinote

name: Tammy Beard
text: Everyone was very nice, they came on time, answered all my questions and did not leave a big mess behind for me to clean up.

name: Charles Cope
text: I'm not very pleased with this company...After spending a lot money

name: Michelle Hudson
text: They are prompt and professional.

name: Renee Cleveland
text: Bad all around

resp.text: I am sorry if you had a bad experience if we can help solve the problem please call the office.

name: Jimmy Bailey
text: Great service experience every time.

name: Jim Kellen
text: The word exemplary expresses the “best of its kind” which is more than merely installing equipment.  Understanding the correct technology solutions that balances our new system components with our original old components was an essential service that made our project a great success!  David Gilbert assessed our problem and recommended our solution and his installation team of Todd and Jay preformed excellent work and left everything clean!!

name: Logan Wilson
text: AC went out in the middle of the day. Joe Rider responded and had my unit fully functioning within an hour. 10/10 recommend.

name: Nicholas Danfourah
text: Jason came out to our house at 2am to fix our water heater because it was just spraying water for hours. He was able to help us stop it from leaking water so we could sleep peacefully. He was so professional and came on time. I had such a good experience with him, I am going to recommend him to anyone and everyone. He is very knowledgeable. He deserves a huge bonus and pay raise through the company because it is hard to find people like him. Especially coming out at 2 in the morning.

name: Douglas Coleman
text: Joe Rider was very professional and helpful with any questions we had. I highly recommend this company. We will be using them for all of our HVAC needs.

name: Natalie Vanderbleek
text: Joe Rider was great! Installed Nest thermostat and was patient enough to wait and make sure everything worked before leaving. Will use Stegall going forward!

name: Katrice M.
text: I wish the workers where treated better . I wish all ethnicity was treat equally. The office workers are fantastic the job site Supervisors are very much stuck in the old days.. (master can I please take a break) I think we all should be treated equally not by the color of our skin. Doesn't mean your less knowledgeable because we are not the same skin color. Respect is due to a Dog! I guess you have to be animal to be respected and treated equally. Great company site supervisors need more training on ethics and communication with the employees/ temps as well . Lets start treating each other with respect .Just because you have power don't mistreat your workers .

resp.text: Katrice we appreciate you bringing this our attention but since you are not an employee of Stegall we do not know who to contact in regards to this issue.  Please have our employee contract Jimbo Rudloff (President of Stegall).  We are an equal opportunity employer and believe in treating all of our employees the same.  Thank you.

name: Michelle Michael
text: All around best service! David was sent out to diagnose our AC problem and he pinpointed the issue and even double-checked himself to be sure. He also checked other areas to make sure there weren't additional problems. He explained everything so well so that I could understand the functionality of the system and where the problem was. A part had to be ordered and he said Stegall would send someone out ASAP. I requested that he come back personally. They managed to get the part, and David, back to our house for the installation the next day. So happy with their response time, their professionalism, and David's attention to detail and genuine friendliness. Thank you for getting us COLD air in the Alabama July heat!

name: Reid DeShazo
text: There are not enough stars that I could give to Stegall.  Great service and fantastic folks.  A pleasure to deal with.  Ken, Justin, and Hayden installed my new package unit in less than an hour.  Highly recommed!

name: Jack Boehm
text: Did nothing, charged me over the "eval" price, yet did nothing.  When called to ask about this and let them know the exact problem is in place that was when they arrived, they did listen.  Promised a call back, no call back, and certainly no refund.

name: Patricia VanHorn
text: Mr. Joe came out and did my fall maintenance today.   He did a great job, was kind and courteous left me feeling confident that with proper maintenance we wont wake up to no heat this winter.  I will use this company - because of people like Joe - for all my heating and cooling needs, and I highly recommend you do too.  Also - Joe needs a raise.  He put up with my tiny dog who thinks shes an attack dog without blinking an eye.

name: Frances Howard
text: Stegall came out  very quickly  and  determined the issue with our A/C, which was a  parts issue.  Joe Rider  our  mechanic was  knowledgable,  professional and  very  kind,  he fix  the  problem  immediately.  Our previous company wanted  us to buy an entire new unit.  We will certainly  "call Stegall" in the future!

name: Caleb Rotton
text: We have used Stegall for a variety of services over the years. They are always prompt and professional. I trust their work and recommendations.  I just had John out to service my HVAC for the summer months and  feel more confident in my 15+ year old unit for the season.

name: Susie Hooks
text: Joe Rider was my technician. He couldn’t have been nicer or more respectful. He told me what he found. Gave me options on what I should do. Never tried to strong arm me into buying anything that at this time I was not ready to do. I strongly suspect that I will use stegall when it is time to buy new. Thank you Stegall, for having a person like Mr. Rider. I am very pleased

name: Lisa Wever
text: Our AC decided to go out on a weekend of Heat Advisories and warnings. Stegall sent out Joe, the technician, about 4 hours after we called - amazing since it was a Sunday! Joe was great - kind, gracious, and took care of things quickly and with care. He knew exactly what he was doing. Thanks to Joe, we are now cooled down 12 hours later! And - the price was reasonable! Thank you!

name: Gaby Zimmerman
text: We are very pleased with the service from this company. John was the first technician hat didn't try to sell us a new unit. Extremely knowledgeable and took a lot of time to explain everything to us. Highly recommended, don't waste your time or money on anybody else !!

name: Angela Turner
text: Stegall always responds quickly! Called at 5pm on a Friday because AC was not cooling. Joe was there within the hour! He did a great job and there was cool air by sundown!

name: RACHEL CRUZ
text:
Joe did a wonderful job in addressing our issues. His positive attitude helped lessen the blow of the cost.

They responded quickly too!

name: Gary Anderson
text: Great service. I has a few issues with a unit they installed at my home. They have always been prompt and professional in responding. Ken did a great job replacing some major components. Excellent service

name: Alex Thrasher
text: I've used Stegall for a number of plumbing and electrical projects over the past month.  Projects include, installing light fixtures and fans, installing new faucets, and troubleshooting and fixing drainage issues and power issues.  Jerry, Shelly, Brandon, and the other employees who have worked at the house have all been fantastic.  They have been responsive to my requests, flexible with scheduling or other issues, and their prices have been better than competitor quotes one each project they've done for me.    I've been very pleased with my experience with Stegall and plan to use them moving forward for other major projects.

name: Retired 4 years
text: Traffic bad, got home late, cooking dinner and realize man it's hot in here, called Stegall Joe Rider was our tech. He is my hero. I am now cooling off. He came in asked a few questions and said what he thought was wrong and he was correct. I highly recommend Stegall and ask for Joe.

name: Carey Crowder
text: Today Joe Rider came and worked on our air conditioner. He was very professional and had a wonderful personality. Mr Rider shook my hand and demonstrated great patience when explaining my new thermostat. It was a pleasure to do business with an individual like Joe. Thank you for hiring someone of this caliber and look forward to future business with Stegall.

name: Trevor Hightower
text: John did a great job with my AC unit repair. He notified me of all my options and worked quickly to make sure the job was done right.

name: Carl Emmons
text: John came out and arrived exactly when they estimated he would. He diagnosed my issue, found a solution better than what I had “googled”, and had my problem fixed within 50 minutes. This was my first time using Stegall, but I’ll definitely call them moving forward.

name: Mary Terry
text: I recently had a water heater installed.The contractor,Brandon Jones arrived at his appointed time.He was  courteous and professional.He and two others had my heater in a a short amount of time.I. highly recommend Stegall to anyone needing electrical or plumbing services.Their office managers Brenda and Shelley are also very kind and caring.

name: michael thomas
text: Installed a new unit. Service was excellent. Johnathan, Justin, and Joe were great. Shelley provides above and beyond customer service. Highly recommend this company.

text: I had a new unit installed around two weeks ago.  It is so quiet that I put my hand over the vent to make sure it was working and it was.  The young men that were here were so polite and courteous.  Thank you Stegall.

resp.text: Than you so much for the opportunity please let us  know if you have any questions.

Andrew with Stegall offered service with a smile, was very knowledgeable, and was very kind and upfront with us the whole time.  We were very impressed with Stegall and recommend them to anyone needing to replace your home's A/C - it's going to be a hot summer!! But, thankfully, we'll be sitting cool inside our home :)

name: Karri Hensley
text: I called Stegall for a broken AC. Joe from Stegall was at my house 2hours later and expertly analyzed my system. He gave his recommendation and I followed it. A crew from (Todd and Brandon) Stegall showed up the next day to install a blower to properly match my existing heat pump. Todd and Brandon worked in withering heat and paid attention to the smallest details, not scratching or denting my floors, or walls.  The heat pump developed another small issue and Joe came back to inspect the over all system AND fixed the heat pump issue not charging me the callout fee. Joe, Todd and Brandon are excellent at their jobs and are very personable people. Stegall is a quality company. I would recommend them to you.

text: Stegall came out and serviced my air conditioner. Justin was friendly and honest and explained everything he was doing and gave me great tips. I'm freezing and it's hot as hell outside! Thanks Stegall!!!

text: Mr Gilbert saved us tonight. Was very helpful and warned us of possible future problems. I am not totally useless when it comes to such things. Was the first place to call us back at a bad time of day. Great job!

name: Lauren Hall
text: We have used Stegall for years for yearly maintenance and other work. Technician Joe Rider has been wonderful, prompt and walks us through any issues!

text: I'm very pleased with the services I have received with Stegall. Great company, great staff.

The service man today was Joe Riley. He was, as is usual for Steagall, prompt and courteous and solved my problem quickly and professionally.  He went the extra mile for the filter I needed after he checked everything out.

I find Steagall and it’s employees to be knowledgeable and prompt and professional from the administrative side to the service side.

name: Julie Dana
text: Called in service order for my hot water heater and they came out the very next morning at 8AM!  The service guys were excellent and their attitude was very customer oriented and professional.  I will call Stegall again when I need services they provide.

text:
Got home from work and the house was 80 degrees! Called another company and they couldn't get anyone out until late if any, and would charge an emergency fee. Called Stegall, and the guy was here in an hour, and had it fixed shortly afterward. Very professional and efficient, and the price was VERY resonable! They are definitely my "go to" people in the future.

By the way, I AM a real customer that had a real problem....

text: I came home from work one day to find my air conditioning was not working properly and I called Stegall the next day.  Two technicians met me at my home on Smith Lake in Winston County AL that evening around 4:00 p.m.   They were very courteous and serviced the unit.  They explained exactly what part had gone bad, replaced it with a new one which they had on the van and had my air back on within the hour.  The charge for the work was more than fair and I will definitely use them again.

text: Excellent service throughout the process! Everyone was punctual, professional, and competent. After a bad experience with another company, it's refreshing to see that there is a company that can meet expectations. Great job!

text: I knew that I needed a new heat pump as my current heat pump was 14 years old.  When I got home from church on Sunday and it was 80 degrees in my house, I knew I could put it off no longer.  I had a quote from another company but had recently learned about Stegall through a co-worker.  They came out to my house within a couple of hours of receiving my call, confirmed I needed a new system, gave me quotes and options, helped with me financing and installed my new system, all within 2 days.  They sold me a better system and a better price than what I had been quoted by another company.  Throughout the whole project, I was constantly being informed of what was going on and everyone was helpful, professional and nice. They answered all of my questions, no matter how inconsequential they may have been. Stegall is my company of choice and I will be happy to recommend them to all of my friends and family!

text: My house AC unit stopped working. I am a plumber by trade but I have no idea when it comes to hvac type stuff. I call stegall and they came to my house and investigated the problem. I assumed I would be looking at a huge bill because I have had similar issues at a different residence, and Norrell charged me $600, 3 separate times over a number of yrs. so I figured it was going to be the same ole same ole. But was wrong!!!! The technician that came out explained everything he was looking for and what I needed to look for and do to prolong my AC unit. Turns out I was not doing maintenance for the unit that I was not aware of. He fixed it quickly and in no time the unit was running properly. My wife was super excited and happy......happy wife =happy life. Lol 😂

name: Joe Allred
text:
My two HVAC units were due for annual spring service, and my commercial ice maker had stopped running .  Upon my request, Ken Speer called before his arrival, and promptly arrived on time. Very professional and friendly, Ken immediately began to perform the maintenance service due on my units.

I knew my upstairs heat pump system was in need of replacement, and Ken explained the problems with it, and recommended a replacement system that would be best suited for the space.

Ken determined the problem with my ice machine, installed the replacement part needed, and had my machine making ice, in less than an hour.

I mentioned to Ken, the water pressure in my house had never been sufficient, since I built my house in 2005, and he contacted a co-worker from Stegall's plumbing division, and upon his prompt arrival, they determined my pressure regulator needed replacing.  Stegall had the replacement part on their truck.  The new regulator was quickly installed, the pressure adjusted, and my water pressure problems were solved throughout my entire house, for the first time, since I built my house, 11 years ago.

I would highly recommend Stegall's services to anyone in need of HVAC, or plumbing service.  Ken Speer is a professional, knows his business, and promptly resolved 3 major issues within my home, and did so, in just a few hours.  I couldn't be happier with his customer service.  I give him an A+.

text: Air Degree owner Lonnie Law and COO Sam Billiter are amazing! They have an extraordinary amount of integrity and are exceptionally competent. They tested it and answered my many questions thoroughly and knowledgeably. We decided jointly that it needed to be replaced. Lonnie and Sam looked at my HVAC system, saw it was still under warranty and called the manufacturer to inquire about the warranty! It is still in effect for both parts and labor, but the work has to be done by a specific local company. They told me I could get both parts and labor done for free simply by phoning that company. What ethical standards they displayed! They also had gone far out of their way to work me into their very busy schedule. I highly recommend this company and will hire them myself in the future.

text: I had issues with my air. I called them they came right out and fixed the problem....

name: Samuel Walsh
text:
A technician came for routine service on Tuesday, the AC stopped working on Wednesday. On Thursday night we called to request service and a technician arrived Friday morning. I’m happy with the response time. The technician told us the breaker tripped and then charged us 139$ for his time and diagnosis.

We had this issue last summer and we were assured by the service technician that there is nothing wrong with the AC or it’s amperage, so we installed a brand new breaker. Today I was told by customer service that the issue again must be with the breaker and not the AC, so we are stuck with the charge. I’m really starting to wonder what the point of paying for a service contract is.

Customer service is friendly and the “hold” music is soothing.

name: Jerry Forte
text: Been a customer for over 10 years. A/C unit stopped working and they sent technician who gave wrong diagnosis of problem, confirmed by 2nd diagnosis from another company. Charged $189 for wrong diagnosis. Refused to give refund. Left three messages for owner to call me to discuss. Still waiting for return call. BUYER BEWARE. Check Better Business Bureau site to read real issues with this company and decide if you want to do business with Climatemp.  They have lost my trust and my business!

name: Lynne Hall
text: Climatemp installed a high end Carrier system 4 years ago.  Now, July, having condensation dripping from indoor unit and damaging ceiling on lower level of house. Home warranty sent a an HVAC professional to house.  He stated unit was improperly installed by Climatemp and duct work had separated from unit creating condensation which is dripping to floor below.  Also possibly causing the unit to underperform.  He is unable to repair the duct work due to how the unit was installed.  Climatemp worked on the unit in December and stated there was no issue then, (it’s not hot in December).  They will not stand behind their installation work. Spoke with Carrier, they allow any licensed HVAC company which is licensed to install their product.

name: Lundy Sparks
text: Climatemp installed and services my HVAC.  Always reliable and competent.  Both the office and field staff are great.   Field tech Rob has done our maintenance and always does a thorough job.

resp.text: Thank you for your fabulous words Lundy, we are very grateful to have fabulous loyal a/c customers like yourself. We work for you!

name: mark fuller
text: Was told service call was 89$ after a 10 minute diagnosis was given a bill for 139$ turns out 89$ is just to show up, if they get out of the truck there’s a labor charge also. Technician told me what I needed and said would take a half hour to put in and part would be under warranty. Called me 2 days later to tell me the 30 minute repair was going to cost 250$ that’s a 389$ total for a warranty repair and under an hour labor. If money is no object this your shop. The original owner warranty is ten years and subsequent owner warranty is five years. Installation date 9/29 /17 as per your estimate. And don’t act like you installed or fixed anything because you certainly didn’t. And for you as the owner to respond with this tale is is further proof of the right decision I made to go elsewhere.

resp.text:
Thank you Mr. Fuller for letting us know about this.Your feed back helps us get better.We are looking into this issue and hope to resolve it promptly and accurately.After doing research we found that your units parts where not covered under any warranty.We apologies for dropping the ball and not catching this the Night of your call.Although your parts where not covered under any warranty you still where not charged for your part due to us dropping the ball and not finding out that you were the 2nd home owner of the residence since this unit was installed making your warranty invalid.How ever as the Owner here at Climatemp Cooling & Heating Inc. I would like to understand your concerns a little more so we can make sure any future experiences go better. Please give me a call at 251-968-6006. Here at Climatemp we strive for an excellent service experience. Please do not hesitate to give me a call we would like to make things right for you!

Owner:Randy Englebert
Climatemp Cooling & Heating Inc.
251-968-6006

name: Rena Allen
text: The guys were very professional and did a great job putting in our ac system works amazing well done and then one month we found mold in the ac vents  and called climatemp out to do a mold treatment and also to clean vents they recommended a air scrubber which I wasn’t familiar with thought it was a good  thing to have they were saying positive things  Said it would eliminate mold and help with cleaner air. I asked them to clean inside the ac vents where the mold was but they didn’t get cleaned  the guys said they another job to go do. I was told the air scrubber we bought was to eliminate the mold that was still in the vents and prevent new mold from growing completely. I stayed away 24 hours cause I’m  sensitive to chemicals and especially mold I’ve dealt with mold before and became very ill and stayed in hospital. The night I did return home I woke up at 2 am with tightness in my chest and throat irritation and was very uncomfortable had fire dept to check me out was upset about it. I googled more about the air scrubber and found some people don’t do well with it and I feel I’m one of them and the side effects were what I was experiencing. It’s been two days and I will not stay at home. I called one of the owners David and asked them to please remove the air scrubber system it was the weekend so they were gonna charge me service call which wasn’t a big deal but I wasn’t even told when they did mold treatment what kind of treatment or was there mold in the ducts I feel like I’m scared to be in my own home. I don’t want to upset anyone But I would have liked to known. I talked to one of the owners David he was trying to make me feel better about the situation but I’m thinking the air scrubber is not for us.  which was very nice but I feel like im not going to do well with a system that isn’t helping me and I want to be comfortable in my home. I hope this company will make this right for us. They are very professional and have helped us in the past. I didn’t know how I would react to the air scrubber and I’m not doing well I would like to fix it please thanks so much.

resp.text: This is fantastic thank you so much for choosing Climatemp Cooling & Heating inc. as your Heating and air conditioning provider.

name: Linda Cook
text: Noah was very professional and had great communication skills. Keeping me informed of what he was doing and how long it would take him was a big help.

resp.text: This is exactly how we do businesses thank you so much for choosing Climatemp as your Heating  & Air Conditioning service company.

name: J
text:
Climatemp sold and installed two new Carrier Infinity series, 18 seer units  in 2019.  These came with a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In 13 months, Unit A stopped cooling 3 times over several months and Climatemp was unable to effect permanent repairs.  The last time Climatemp repaired unit A, it stopped working within 18 hours.  This was after several days of disruption, no AC, and probably 10 hours of attempts to fix it.  Unit B stopped cooling at the 7-month mark and the air handler had to be replaced.  They broke the condensate pump which leaked water everywhere and didn't seal the discharge side into the main duct during the install.  In addition, I have seen several misdiagnosed issues,  unterminated wires, holes in return box, and uninsulated freon lines to name just a few issues.  My favorite was the condensate pump installed so that it blocked the door from closing to the air handler room.  The customer service is awful.  Nobody will call you back.  You have to follow up on everything yourself.  I had a no show on more than one occasion and when I called to ask where the tech was, “oh he’s not going to be able to make it.”  After unit A stopped cooling, yet again, and nearly immediately after the last attempt to fix it, I attempted to reach a final resolution with the GM David, but he never called me back.  He told me he would speak to the owner and let me know what they decided, but no call.  It would be laughable if I hadn’t spent 14k on two units and was one year into a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In the end, I never heard from him again, all while unit A was not cooling.  Ultimately, I had to get Carrier involved who thankfully switched my parts and labor warranty to another local factory authorized dealer, who has been amazing.  The new dealer fixed unit A on the first attempt, in about two hours, which was over pressurized with freon, and had been incorrectly diagnosed by Climatemp.  They provided updates through the whole process.  Then, they reconfigured unit A and B, which were never set up properly and were running inefficiently on factory default settings.  I would give anything to be able to go back and avoid ever using Climatemp, but they had such good reviews.  I discovered that A LOT of them are from their own employees.  Even the techs told me, they’re told to leave five-star reviews on google and have their friends and family do the same.  Look through the reviews and you will see the same names that you hear when you call dispatch or receive an email.  The owners, and the GM leave them, as well as their family.  You will see the same names leaving reviews across every location.  Normal customers don’t do that.  When bad reviews are left, you will see threats of litigation and claims of fake reviews.  Folks this company is shameful.  Please save yourself and use any number of available HVAC companies in Baldwin county.  If you have a part/labor warranty with them and you feel trapped, call Carrier.  They can and will help you.

** In response to the owner's claim - the last time your technician was in my home, he was there for nearly six hours.  I loaned him my extension cords and fed him dinner.  Your claim of being limited to 30 minutes is as disingenuous as the rest of your business practices.

resp.text: J please give us a call we would love to help you out sounds like you are one of a handful out of over 300 reviews that had an issue which we are human and do make mistakes as the loyal company we will strive to do our best to make things right in this relationship it takes two that’s loyal HONEST customers as well! If your not given the Proper opportunity to fix things then the problem becomes worse. Now the times we came to your house we had a time limit of less than 30min by you to fix your unit I don’t think that was the right approach! Please give us call at 251-968-6006 and give us the time we need while we are their to do our Job. Thanks,have a blessed day.

name: Jessica Cajueiro
text: If I could leave zero stars here I would! My unit, which I’ll admit is old, but it still works… Was not cooling as well as usual. This has happened previously and it needed Freon. So I called  Climatemp to come out… I knew they like to try to upsell your unit but I had them come out anyway. I had called and they told me there was an $89 service/diagnostic fee. So long story short… The guy came out opened the unit and within 10 minutes told my husband we needed a brand new unit that it would cost @ $3000 just to fix the leak. I told him no thank you we would get another opinion that I was not spending $10,000 today on a new unit. He then asked me “ What’s the right price to get you to say yes to a new unit today?” Climatemp keeps your credit card on file and within 45 minutes charged my account $189… For nothing! Within that same amount of time I had had another local company come out they had already fixed my unit, my house was cool and only charged me $150. Climatetemp does not tell you that they charge you $25 per 15 minutes they are there… If you do the math that is $1.66 PER MINUTE!! We would definitely not have let the technician take his 10 minute cigarette  break in our front yard if we had known we were paying that per minute!! They were there for 15 minutes, just wanted to sell us a new $8000 unit and told us ours could not be fixed for less than $3000, did not give us accurate information on charges, never left us an invoice and still won’t give us one, just charged my card. Terrible way to do business!!

resp.text: Jessica, we are sorry you feel that way after further investigation yes your unit was very old and had multiple R22 Freon leaks in it. The laws require us to fix and repair the leak before we put r-22 Freon back in this is a costly repair especially in your case where a whole coil was going to have to be replaced to fix your unit. So yes a coil plus recharging your unit with r-22 is a very costly repair. You say you paid 150.00 and you were cool again by another company but did they actually do you justice by putting some Freon in knowing its going to leak back out and you will be calling them right back out. We also noticed you said you already had them out once before. So as you can see your having to call someone out every few months to charge your unit mean while when it is running low on Freon it is working double time and costing you double time just to operate the system. It sounds like as much as you are having to pay for a very inefficient  system in your home with multiple service calls a year you could have purchased a new efficient system with just the savings you would have on your utilities each month not to mention all the 150.00 dollar service call. So did Climatemp really do a dis justice or where you just putting a band aid on something that really needed stitches to buy you more time. Climatemp charges by the quarter hr. Which can save you tons of money many other companies charge a 1hr minimum and flat rate prices that would have cost you much more. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience to you or your family but in the same note here at Climatemp we believe in fixing things right and not putting a band on something that will end up costing you much more in the long run. Our deepest regards

name: Paula Gaubatz
text:
I had an in home estimate with Stan and he sold me on getting a new 16 seer 3 ton unit.  They told me it would be installed the next day and someone would call me around 8am to let me know what time to expect them.  After 9:30am and no phone call, I called and was told they would be here between 11:30am-12pm and it would be about 4-5 hours for the installation.  I called several times after 12pm to find out when someone would be here as I had to take off work to get this done, no one called me back.  Finally, at 3:30pm the guys arrived to install this system.  It was not until 2am that they left, completed the job and drove out of my driveway!  I asked if they could stop and come back the next day and was told no, they were required to finish the job that day.  2am is unacceptable to me, for someone to expect their installers to do a good job at that hour and also when it's not an emergency is beyond me.  I was also told by the installer that the company does this to them all of the time.  I called the next day to talk to the owner and I also emailed him.  I have yet to receive a return call.  I will never recommend this company to anyone.  Wesley was wonderful, very competent and very nice.  The next day, the unit froze up and had to have service repair.  They said the thermostat was not relaying to the fan the correct way and he fixed it and it's been good since.  The installers and service guys seem to know what they are doing, however, the management doesn't and it's evident in their complete lack of correspondence.  The one email I did receive the day of the install was from the owner and it was as though he was yelling at me with his !!!!!! all throughout the email.  Customer service will get you every time and theirs is awful.

After discussing the issues with Stan, I was offered an additional 2 year maintenance agreement.  Stan was very knowledgeable and upfront with me on his visit and Wesley was excellent as an installer.

From the start, my summer bills have average about $50 more despite being a bigger more efficient unit. When I had another company service it, they discovered the electrical wiring was not done properly and needed to be redone plus the unit was short 2.5lbs of refrigerant.  Since there were no leaks, it probably hadn't been filled properly from the start (which explains the higher bills). I give them two stars because they came out on a weekend but I would never trust them to install a new HVAC.

Thanks, Stan Englebert, Brian Raines, Joey, James and Heath. We really appreciate yall.  Bill & Kathy Martiniere Fairhope, Al..

text: Durham installed a much smaller unit than required for my home. Fortunately we purchased the best warranty they offered, so while we have suffered with heat and cold, multiple compressors and other parts were covered by the warranty. So if you want to pay for a large unit and get a small unit, while being talked to as if you just fell off a turnip truck, hire this company.

His rates were also more than reasonable.

I would highly recommend him for any HVAC work needed.

name: Stephanie Fuchsberger
text: We really appreciate Cooper Climate Control and highly recommend them! We have had them repair both of our older AC units and then replace one. We really like their maintenance package, as well. It is not expensive and it pays to have the units inspected, cleaned and lubricated. Wes and staff are so nice, on time and very professional. Great business!!

name: Tanner Jones
text: Cooper Climate Control was very quick and professional. Called him on a Sunday afternoon and he was at my house within a couple of hours. Definitely would recommend.

name: Jake Evans
text:
Wesley @ Cooper Climate Control is great! I had to do some major repositioning of a return since I was remodeling- he couldn’t come on the planned day because of the weather- but he came the next free day that the weather allowed which ended up being on a Sunday. Which was super helpful because we had a contractor coming the next week to take out the whole wall!
I have also used Cooper Climate Control in the summer when my unit stopped working- he came that very day.
Easy to get in contact with and professional. Highly recommend

name: Michael McGee
text: Cooper Climate actually took my phone call, AND came out the same day for my requested estimate.  He took the time to have a conversation about my situation, utilizing questions and concerns to identify and address my needs.  He gave me a price that was in budget and close to what I considered a national average.  When we agreed in the next steps, he took it to the next level of execution with about a 1 week turnaround, AND even did the install on a Saturday morning.  Don’t hesitate to give Cooper Climate a call with your heating and air needs.

name: Matthew B
text: Mr. Cooper has come out to our house to repair our a/c units.  When you call or text him, he is extremely responsive, professional, knowledgeable, skilled and nice.  We called in the evening and he offered to come over that night, which was not necessary for us as we have 2 a/c units, but I thought it was extremely nice of him to be willing to fix the a/c after normal working hours, especially in the hot Huntsville summer heat.  He came over the next day and had our a/c unit repaired in an hour!  He explained what was wrong (our capacitor needed to be replaced and the coolant was low, so he also performed a leak check and added coolant).  Our unit failed again and he came over and got it running again, and didn't charge us as he had just been over, which was incredibly nice.  He said the pump might be failing, triggering the unit to shut off, but didn't want to replace it immediately if we didn't know for sure.  We really appreciated that he didn't replace a part unless it was definitely needed.  When our 2nd a/c unit failed a week later, he was just as responsive and helpful.  We were both extremely impressed with Mr. Cooper and would highly recommend him.  We will absolutely be calling Mr. Cooper again in the future for our a/c maintenance and repair. -The Brooks family

name: Ethan Graham
text: Got pricing from Wes and checked around with other local business and couldn't beat his price anywhere. Service was even better than his pricing! Great deal, workmanship, and service. Came out in the morning and fully replaced my split unit, installed a new return, and capped off the old return all in about 5 hours. You wont find anyone better in the greater HSV area.

name: Sarah Tripp
text: Cooper Climate Control to the rescue! We are very satisfied with the service we received from Dustin and Wes! Same day service and Dustin stayed late to make sure my unit was working correctly. I highly recommend this business!

name: Sara Duncan
text: Whenever there is a problem with my parent’s AC, Wes is their first call! He is very knowledgeable and goes above and beyond for his customers. Will always recommend Cooper Climate Control!

text: Wes and Cooper Climate Control are our go to when our HVAC needs maintenance. He is professional, extremely knowledgeable, and is competitive in his pricing. name: Matt Currie
text: Big thanks to Wes Cooper and Cooper Climate Control. I called about my heat being out and he was able to come while I was at lunch and check it out and get it fixed before I got home.  Quick and dependable service!

text: Wesley has done all of  our HVAC work for over15 years. He is outstanding at his profession. He is very honest,  thorough, dependable and does great quality work. I highly recommend him to all of my neighbors, friends and clients.

name: Cathy Smith
text: Any time a homeowner experiences a failure in a major system, its cause for alarm!  Who do I call?  How much is this going to cost?  How do I know if they will fix it without ripping me off??  Wes Cooper, Cooper Climate Control, takes away any concerns you may have.  He knows his stuff, he’s efficient and he does what he says he will do!!  He beat the competitors prices, he was in and out of my attic, my crawlspace and the interior of my home, leaving no mess for me!  Cooper Climate Control is my go-to for all heating and cooling needs.  Hands down!!

name: Joy Hicks
text: Very pleased with the responsive and honest service we received from Cooper Climate Control. We contacted them after another company said our system was shot and needed to be replaced. In one visit, Cooper Climate Control identified the minor problem and repaired it, saving us thousands of dollars. With CCC, doing the right thing is more important than making a sale.

name: Maurice Parker
text: I’ve used Cooper Climate Control for both scheduled & unscheduled maintenance as well as a new ductless mini split install.  Wes and team are responsive, technically superior and fairly priced.  I will continue to use Cooper Climate Control.

text: Very professional and responsive.  Willing to work with my schedule to get the needed items completed.

name: RJ on the go
text:
Cooper Climate Control has repaired and maintained our A/C units for the last 4 years including our rental house and my mother’s house.  Wes is experienced, technically proficient and very intelligent which is what you are always looking for in the service industry.  He is very customer service oriented while always giving the customer the best advice when problems arise.  Additionally, and this is why we continue to use them, Wes and his company does their job with honesty and integrity and charge a fair price.
Small example of his ccustomer service level - We have had a couple of occasions where our units froze over and Wes went out and made the repairs, one at 9:00 at night in sub 40 degree weather so my mother-in-law would not be without heat for the night and did not charge us an exorbitant amount of money to take care of it because he is a fair and good person.
I’ve built my own homes and had several HVAC contractors that have been very good or bad with decades of experience, but would put Wes and his company at the top of that list.

name: Fran
text:
This review is ONLY about the AC side of Blevins A/C . I have used both the A/C and Electric services from blevins. I want to say the Electrical side is top notch. I would give them a 5star rating.

Now on the to A/C service. I ordered a whole house dehumidifier for my 2100SQft. home. I was told by aprilaire and another AC company that the aprilaire 1830 was the size I needed for my home. So I purchased the unit. Anthony  came out to install the unit.
After the install the unit wasn't working as it should. The humidity wasn't coming down in the house. So I tried to work with Anthony to resolve the problem. He did call support for aprilaire. And after going talking with them they decided that the unit was undersized. The unit is a 70pint and should cover a 2800sqft. house. I wanted my humidity around 45 to 48 %.
this unit was only getting it  to 57%. that is what I started with , so it wasn't working at all.

After talking with support myself. I was told that the unit needed to be installed per the recommended installation. Which is from return to return. It needs to work with the AC unit to achieve peak performance.

Anthony installed it from return to supply. which I was told by aprilaire that causes a resistance from the supply air and the air coming from the dehumidifier. He did not install a drip pan under the dehumidifier.( he took the charge off for the drip pan) He used 12" duct which isn't recommended. And added reducer down to the 10" inlet

So I asked Anthony to install it per manufacture .  He straight out refused. I have a copy of the text and a lot of pictures to post. Also have an email from tech support stating the correct way to install is per the manual install glide.

I added the correct duct work and put a drain pan under the dehumidifier and rerouted the drain line.
The Dehumidifier is work as should now humidity is around 47%.
The only thing I asked Anthony to do is install it the preferred method ( which is what he should have done in the beginning and we would not of had any problems)  and he refused. I plan on sending a complaint to the Association.

I will not use the A/C service again. And wish I could use the electric service because they are awesome. They fixed several issues I had. Plus was able to fix a problem that 2 other companies was not able to fix. But it is a family owned business.

resp.text:
Since you chose not to share what happened only to leave a bad rating let us help you with that. Fran decided she wanted to save some money and buy a dehumidifier herself instead of purchasing one through an authorized dealer. She asked us to install it which we did by the manufacturer requirements. Her humidity is already down to 50-55% in the home but she insist that it must go lower. We tried to help her resolve this issue for a week. After contacting the manufacturer and going over our installation in detail to make sure it was no error on our part it was determined that Fran had purchased the wrong size unit to fit her home. The following is from Aprilaire contractor tech support.

Unit is undersized for the space and you would be lucky to reach 50% with an 1830. If you want to go to 40%, you would need at least an 1870. That being said, staying in the 50-55% range is perfectly reasonable place to be, and is safe.

Thank you,
Jacob

Jacob | Technical Support Team
Aprilaire, Division of Research Products Corporation
1015 East Washington Avenue | Madison, Wisconsin  53703
Phone: 1-800-334-6011 | Fax: 608-257-4357 | www.aprilaire.com
Technical Support Hours – M-F, 7:00 am to 5:00 pm CT

Thank you for your business but the only problem is you were given incorrect information then expected our business to stand behind a product we did not purchase.

text:
I called this “24-hour” service at 5:15pm.  They told me both technicians were on jobs, and someone would call me as soon as one of them finished and they would head my way.  They said it might be a little later on in the evening. Ok, sounds great.  Cut to 9:30pm (4 hours later) - I have received no calls from anyone, so I finally I call them back.  The “after hours” person answers and tells me they’ll find out what’s going on and call me right back.  I wait 45 minutes, no call back, and finally call them again.  A different person answers again.  I say “Look I just want to know if I can go to bed, I have to work tomorrow”, and they say “Yea, I mean if no one has called you by now they probably aren’t coming tonight”...  (24 hours - not so much apparently).  The lady then asks me what time I will be available in the morning.  I say I can be a little bit late to work, but I would need someone there by 8:30am at the latest.  She assures me someone will be there by 8:30am.  I wait around until 8:30, and call them again.  They act like they have no idea who I am or why I’m calling, and tell me they’ll call a technician and see when they can get someone out (they’re already supposed to be at my house).  I said, you’ve had four chances to do that and haven’t done it once, so - never mind, I’ll call someone else.

They seem like they are not very organized, and didn’t seem to care less about the fact that they kept me up waiting on a technician that wasn’t coming until nearly 11pm, or about the fact that they made me late to work this morning for no reason.  I would absolutely not recommend calling these folks if you have issues with your HVAC.

name: dj stewart
text: He was sent by our home warranty company because our fan was blowing and would not turn off. He finally called after 3 days and said he lost the work order but would be here at 12pm. He arrived at 7pm. He said a part was bad and he could get it the next day but he had a part in his van as a temporary fix. While attempting the fix, he did something wrong and the air unit started smoking so bad that my wife ran outside with a fire extinguisher because the entire house smelled like burning plastic. He jumped up and turned the breaker off, obviously a few minutes too late! So, he tells us he has to get the part but tells the warranty company that the unit needs to be repaired or replaced and that the coils are stopped up with dirt! And that incorrect parts are in the unit and that's the cause of the problem. So of course the warranty doesn't cover coil cleaning and won't cover any repair of the alleged incorrect parts. Warranty company calls him back asking about the smoke issue while he was here and he tells them it wasn't the part he put in. Then he tells them the unit is too big and the ducts are too small,etc. We paid him $100 to fill our home with smoke and ruin a part on our unit and the only problem was the fan blower continuously. Now the warranty company won't cover anything because of what Master craft said while changing the story of what was wrong.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, DJ. We will do our best to use this to improve.

What he told us cooled the house and kept it cool. Michael came out a few days later, he was late for his appointment but when he arrived he apologized multiple times and explained why he was late, he diagnosed our A/C unit and filled it with refrigerant. He was extremely nice and professional. I waited to write the review to make sure that his work would hold up and it has perfectly! A/C during an Alabama summer is required and Michael made sure we had one that works properly.

name: Sarah Oliver
text: Michael is completely unprofessional and his lack of integrity is astounding. Our home warranty sent his company to us for AC repair, and while our AC is fixed and running, there were damages to our ceiling and attic due to incomplete workmanship. The drain pipe was not connected properly upon job completion, which led to condensation dripping into our attic, rather than the drain pan. When I contacted Michael about having the damages fixed, he came out and fixed the connection and promised to have someone come out to patch the ceiling. I had to call Michael 1-2 times a week for over a month, with empty promises of scheduling repairs before he finally came out himself. When he arrived, he attempted to convince me that I bought my home as a foreclosure (I did not) and that the damages had been there before he initially did any work. He also informed me that I had an outstanding balance of over $600 that would need to be paid before he completed any further work on my AC (he identified that no one insulated a pipe that is now sweating into my attic, as well--more incomplete workmanship on his part) or repaired the damages, when we paid the invoice that he provided IN FULL upon job completion. He is also HOURS late, without notice, to every single appointment he sets. I would not recommend this company to anyone, ever.

name: deb c
text: I realize some people had an experience quite different from mine, but my recent experience with Head's was quite good. I would give them 4 3/4 stars if that were an option. I recently bought a house in Mobile, and was given paper work showing the AC coils having been replaced in January 2018 by Head's, with a 10 year guarantee. On some of the 1st hot days this year, the AC did not seem to be cooling efficiently, and there was quite a lot of condensation and then ice on the lines. I called Head's with some reluctance due to the negative reviews, but they were extremely responsive, came out to the house in less than 2 hours, and were extremely thorough, professional, courteous, and pleasant. They diagnosed the problem, handled it, and then checked everything else, and explained exactly what was going on.  They even gave me a call the next day to make certain everything went well. The only reason I'd take of 1/4 star would be because there was some initial record keeping confusion, and the problem with the AC function was traced back to a cap which should not have been added/placed at the previous service due to the slightly unusual configuration of my particular AC and furnace. Luckily, the tech (Scott) was very knowledgeable and diagnosed it easily.

text: Robert and his crew replaced our heat pump, improved our ductwork and circulation, added more insulation in the attic  and added a thermostat downstairs a few years ago. We ultimately decided that it was worth the expense to have our home be comfortable. That was at least five years ago, and I keep saying “it’s the little things that cost thousands of dollars that really make the difference!” We haven’t regretted spending one penny!

text: So this man, Robert Atkins and His staff at his company goes so way beyond and it just amazing! You see,  we had a severe issue last week which caused an emergency situation. text: ACS installed a new heating and cooling system in my home.  They arrived on time, worked until the installation was complete and left with everything neat, clean and assembled well.  The cost for equipment and installation was very reasonable.

name: Kevin Fairclough
text: ACS, INC replaced a gas pack for me. The installation was on time and the installation crew was efficient, competent and careful. In contrast to some other HVAC companies, the owner is very easy to contact.

name: Joe
text: Over the last eleven years, Robert Akins and ACS has provided nothing but high-quality, professional, and responsive service.  When one of my two HVACs went out in my new home, I called the company that installed it and they said the earliest they could come was three days.  When I called ACS, they were there the next morning.  I have been calling on ACS ever since.  During a heat wave, after Robert explained he would have to charge overtime, ACS fixed my HVAC on a Sunday morning.  Whenever ACS was at my house to fix my HVAC, after analyzing the problem, they were clear on what needed to be done,  how long it would take to fix it, how much it would cost, and why.  If necessary, they also provided a variety of payment options so I could choose what best met my situation.  So when one of my two HVACs needed to be replaced, ACS was one of two companies I called for an estimate.  While the other estimate was flowered with discounts for various reasons, the ACS estimate was clear, concise, and competetive.  Robert Akins spent a lot of time explaining options and whether they were worth the expense.  The unit ACS proposed has a lifetime condenser replacement warranty if the compressor ever fails.  An option ACS had that the other did not was a ten year warranty on the labor for warrantied repairs.  Finally, when the competitor said it would take at least a week for the replacement HVAC to come in, ACS had my new unit installed the next day on December 22, the week of Christmas!  So whether you are looking to replace your current HVAC unit or just repair the one you have, I highly recommend Robert Akins and ACS.  They have always been there when I needed them and taken care of the problem efficiently and professionally.

name: FRED RICHARDSON
text: Great customer service. Robert and his technical employees are top notch. He is fair and honest and always does what is best for the customer.

name: Jeremy Fleming
text: ACS recently replaced 2 units for my home.  They arrived on time, completed the work quickly and followed up after the installation.  We will be using them for service in the future.

text: Owner is an excellent business man and keeps track of how my systems are running. I would highly recommend using this company! The prices are fair and the job is top quality.

name: Emily of Earth
text: They were able to come to my house the same day that I called! My technician was very knowledgeable and friendly.

name: William Hastie
text: ACS responded in a reasonable time.  A capacitor was replaced.  The wholesale cost of the capacitor is under $30.  I was charge $130 for the capacitor plus labor to replace it.  Total charge $245.  So, if you do not mind a 300+% markup on material, then you can select ACS.  I will go elsewhere.

resp.text:
It is always a travesty for ACS, Inc. to have an unsatisfied customer and we do all that we can to help our customers have a good experience with us and continue a long term service relationship.  Unfortunately, occasionally, due to whatever reasons whether by our fault or other circumstances, a customer is dissatisfied.  In this case we did not learn of Mr. Hastie's dissatisfaction until he posted a negative review.  There was no phone call, no inquiry, no attempt to communicate or seek a resolution to his complaint, just a negative review.
After speaking to the technician and reviewing the statements associated with this service I found the following facts to be true:

Mr Hastie called to report his house was hot and his air conditioning was not working late in the afternoon.  I diverted a technician to his house after 4:30 pm to help him so that hopefully he would not have to go through another hot night in his house.  (We go on overtime at 5:00 pm).  The technician found the primary problem and responded by installing a part from his truck which was close to what was required but not the correct spec.  The temporary fix allowed the unit to run and cool the house overnight providing immediate relief for Mr. Hastie.  The technician did not charge for the overtime.

The part required was an odd spec which the technicians and many of our professional vendors do not carry locally (often an order Item).  The next day our technician searched among our vendors until he found a part locally.  He returned to the Hastie residence and exchanged the temporary part for the correct one.  Our technician also inspected the refrigerant charge and found a need to add some refrigerant to achieve the correct cooling specs per his instruments upon this return visit.

Moreover, our technician did not charge Mr. Hastie for the procurement or travel time required to serve his needs.  For the more than 3 hours time involved working exclusively on Mr. Hastie's behalf our technician charge him only for a service call and 1 hour labor.  As far as the cost of the part:  yes we, like most service operations who provide a responsive service, charge a markup on parts.  We do not attempt to compete with internet pricing.  Our pricing structure reflects the convenience of having the part, our vendors supporting us to have a part available, and the network which guarantees and supports the quick response business.

Otherwise, a client is free to diagnose his own problem, order his parts online and wait in the heat until the part arrives (hoping he did not make a mistake or that a wrong part was shipped.)

In conclusion:  Our technician followed pricing guidelines which have been satisfactory for our extensive client base for more than 40 years.  He waived labor costs in the hopes of establishing Mr. Hastie as a long term satisfied customer.  Mr. Hastie indicated to the technician that he was satisfied and grateful for the prompt service and relief from the heat.

Had Mr. Hastie called to inquire about the charges, we could have explained to him and even offered him a coupon if he was still not happy.  Personally, I see this negative review as simply malicious with the intent of harming our otherwise excellent review status and without any interest in understanding or seeking a resolution with ACS, Inc.

name: Betsy Drab
text:
Mr Josh Nelson was excellent!  I don’t ever leave reviews but this gentleman was knowledgeable, courteous, and was concerned with walking on my rugs etc. etc.  He also explained my thermostat to me and all the settings again and never made me feel like a question that I was asking was silly.
I will continue calling AC whenever I have a problem and hopefully Josh Nelson will be the man that comes out.   Thank you!!!!!!!!

name: Nathan
text: Called to get information on a repair. Instead all I received was a smart aleck and demeaning response followed with profanity. Extremely unprofessional. If someone speaks this way towards potential business, I highly question their ethical standards in performing a repair. AVOID.

resp.text:
I remember this caller.  Nathan called and began asking me vague questions about what was wrong with his heating system.  I told him that it sounded like we needed to send a tech out for diagnostics.  He asked me what the charge would be and I told him the minimum cost of a service call and labor for a call out.  He then asked me an unusual question for our industry.  He asked me why we charged for diagnostics.  From having dealt with the public for 40 years I understood that he was not familiar with how service companies operate.  I proceeded to explain to him why a company had to charge to send a tech to a remote location, time, equipment cost, travel, insurance, education and training, overhead and all of the costs associated with a working company.  I explained that the tech, for instance, had to be paid from the moment he clocked in which included the driving time to a residence and back, hence the service call.  Nathan took offense at the explanation and told me that he did not need a "lecture".  I asked him then why he asked such a question if he did not expect or want a comprehensive answer, to which he abruptly hung up the phone. There was no profanity.  Moments later this negative review arrived in my email.

Part of the service we provide is educational.  We are a very empirical and logic based company.  We deal with applied science.  When a question is asked we do our best to answer it thoroughly.  I often help clients solve heating and air conditioning issues over the phone at no charge when able.  I have recently successfully instructed non technical house wives in restoring their heat over the phone. My communication skills are very good.  In this circumstance it was very important that the potential client understood the charges and per his questions why there were charges.  If the customer does not understand that he will be charged for a visit and that he has an obligation to pay, or if he protests the value of the service prior to a visit by a tech, then we cannot send a tech to his residence.

Unfortunately, part of the job of dealing with the general public is to screen the potential client to make sure that the interaction with the company and the technician is successful and satisfactory for both parties.  We will not send a technician into a contentious situation.  We would have liked to have helped Nathan but the initial phone interaction and the "hang up" indicated that the interaction would not be successful.
