name: Chris Robinson
text: It was honestly a really great experience from start to finish. My wife met with Cason and we went into wanting multiple options which i thought were all fairly presented and well explained without any pressure of which to go with. I have a close friend who worked for many years for both Trane and Carrier with many of the dealers throughout Birmingham. He gave me a list of 3 companies he would have out to his home personally. Skelton was one of those, another company that i liked very much, and then one we didnt have a great experience on the quote with. Between Skelton and the other competitor, although Skeltons price was higher we were sold by the labor warranty and some of the other written guarantees, along with the rec from our friend. Installation - I believe it was Mark, my wife was the one on site - went way better than i could have imagined. We arranged last minute to have the unit moved to a new location. All of the work was very well done. I had an idea in my head of what "the aftermath" should have looked like and the equipment involved in the move and all that, and i probably would have been satisfied with a lot less. Its obviously a lot of money for most families, so I was bound to have some mix of buyers remorse and hesitation about whether or not we'd gone with the right people However, when i got home and saw the quality of the work, how neatly and efficiently and professionally everything was done, i immediately felt entirely confident in our decision and knew we had some true professionals out at the house. I think its the first time in my life ive spent that much money on something and dont have any regrets or second guessing about who we chose to spend it with. Kudos to both Cason and Mark's teams. Thanks yall!

text: My 15 year old AC unit was recharged about 5 weeks ago. When it stopped working again, I assumed all the Freon leaked out again and that it needed replacement. I asked Skelton’s to give a quote on a replacement unit. Their technician was very thorough and discovered a bad switch and capacitor, which he replaced on the spot. He checked our Freon levels and said they were still perfect. His extra effort and honesty saved us from having to buy a new unit at this time, even though he could have easily convinced me we needed a new unit. (Two other companies also provided quotes on new units, but neither of them discovered the underlying issue.) Honesty and integrity, and a desire to serve the customer’s best interests, are important to me. Skelton’s proved it by their actions. When it is time for a replacement AC system, I’ll call Skelton’s.

name: Jay Miller
text:
My 94 year old Dad's AC system went out on a Thursday afternoon in rural Alabama with the heat index well over 100. Justin promptly called me back and was out to check the system before the end of business that same day. The entire system had to be replaced so it couldnt be resolved that day. Justin lined up Wes and his crew so that they could begin the replacement first thing once the system was delivered. I was told everything would be good to go by 1pm. My Dad and I arrived at 12pm and Wes told me all they needed was access to the thermostat and they would be finished. This group understood the critical situation my Dad was in and went above and beyond to make sure his unit was installed and operating ASAP.
Thank you so much guys...you'll never know how much it meant to my Dad to get back to his home.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Miller for the great review! We are happy to hear about your that you were pleased with job and technicians. Thanks again for choosing Skelton's Heating & Air.

name: Doug Tilt
text:
I remodeled a room in my lake house which required repositioning the main intake vent from a vertical in -wall position to an in-floor register.  Brian Skelton , company owner, came out the day after my call, evaluated the job and provided a best guess estimate for the proposed task
The following day a team of two technicians  arrived at 0800 , as agreed. Within 4 hours the old vent box was removed, a new floor frame between the joists was constructed, a new box placed and large duct connected to the existing AC/ Heating unit and new ,sturdy floor grate placed( and thermostat repositioned)

The Skelton team were most professional and efficient.  The job site was completely cleaned and everything double checked to be sure everything was done to my satisfaction and functioning well. An immediate follow up call to me by company owner was appreciated.

The total cost was $960.00 based on labor and materials , which was as expected per initial estimate

My five star rating was completely deserved based on professionalism, punctuality, job done, and charge. I definitely recommend this company and will use them again.

Doug Tilt

I explained the situation, told him the model number of out Trane unit. He said he was on his way to a call and come after. Hff e called and ssid he was on his way. He arrived,  called to tell me and I told him i wiuld be diwn in 5 minutes  and told him which of the 5 Trane units it was. I was worried about the length of time hff e would be here an DC tge cost, especially since it was a weekend. I came down, not over 5 minutes later, he was replacing the capacitor on the unitand was finished 5 minutes later!
John was courteous,  honest, trustworthy,  and prompt. He could  have taken his time, running up labor time but just did his job efficiently.
I will definitely be using Skeleton Heating and Air for or all my AC/HEATING needs. . Thank you Mr. Skelton for having honest and efficient technicians!  Thank you John fir getting the unit up nb and runing so quickly!

text: We had renters at our lake house and the air conditioning quit working. I called Kelly’s at 10:00pm just expecting to leave a message for the morning. They called me right back and got to the house early the next morning and got the air conditioning working for our renters. Thank you!

name: Brian McCauley
text: Elijah was able to answer my questions and help me right away.  Thanks again Elijah!

name: Eric Stadler
text: All I can say is avoid at all cost. Do not allow the home warranty company to assign A&E as you provider. They are hard to communicate with, don’t answer calls, sometimes will text, and arrive hours late for the appointment time if they arrive at all. They promise to call back but never do and you will spend hours trying to contact them. They left us without AC for two weeks and then put a hard start kit in to try to get the unit going until a compressor came in. Two weeks of 90 plus temps in my house when it could have been done on the first day. My compressor was never installed (second week of July now) so I had to pay another service fee to have another company fix my AC which by the way was NOT the compressor. I now have working AC after 20 minutes of another company fixing my AC that had been down since May.

name: Dan Manofsky
text: Elijah Blanchard responded to our residential air system after it went out.  My wife spoke with him late evening, and he was at our house early a.m. the next morning battling the rain. After investigating the entire system, he replaced the needed parts, and as promised, he said you will have your air back (before he started) and it was back! He is very courteous, professional, and definitely excellent pricing.  Out of 5 Stars, we give him a 6!

name: Josh Gaddis
text: Stay away! Absolutely horrendous! I'm on day 11 of my air conditioning being out, and it is still not fixed. They stated it was fixed on Saturday, but when I got home, it was 87 degrees in the house. We called back, and they stated they would be here at 11 AM today to make the necessary repairs. However, it is now 12:45 PM, and they still aren't here. I would not recommend at all.

name: Jason Powers
text: They came out on a home warranty hvac claim. Never fixed the issue, left pieces of my ac unit laying on the ground and now won’t respond. Avoid!

name: Donell Williams
text: My warranty company assigned my service call to A&E Services, at the beginning after reading the reviews I was concerned, but it turned out to be the opposite. The technician came to my house at the time that it was scheduled. I needed the furnace to be replaced and in short time they replaced my unit. I’m satisfied with the quality of service that was provided and the professionalism of the technician and owner.

name: Tammie Huffstutler
text: ZERO STARS This place is a JOKE!  Told by Elijah two different days - two weeks apart that he would be here to fix our air conditioner.  First time bailed- said that he knew from our description what was wrong with it so he would just order the parts.  A week and a half later told us  he would be here by 8 am to repair the AC that he finally has the parts. Never showed up although all day long  he would text and say they were on the way.  Finally at 7pm he called to say he wasn’t coming because the entire unit needed to be replaced. HE NEVER CAME- NEVER SAW THE AC.  He is a joke and a liar.  Two days off work with no pay waiting on this joker to show up.  Unbelievable.

name: Michael Stokes
text: Elijah did an outstanding job with the repair of our unit. I have a home warranty and feel very fortunate that he was assigned to our job.

name: Julie Nelson
text: I have a home warranty through American Home Shield.  Our central AC went out and they assigned A & E Service Co., They were supposed to be here between 10 and noon.  Never a phone call that they were going to be late, they just didn't show up.  I called at 1:00 pm, they said they would call me back in 15 minutes.  An hour and a half later I canceled the service request through American Home Shield.  Still no phone call.  Terrible customer service!

name: Candice Walker
text: I went through my warranty company to use A&E services and they came to look at my HVAC unit the night I called them. I had issues with the warranty company,  but the technician, Elijah, always made sure I was kept in the loop about what was going on. Once things were straightened out with the warranty company,  they put my new unit in within 2 days. They even worked in the rain and in the dark to make sure I could get heat! I am very grateful for their great work!

name: Shawonna Garrett
text: I had an appointment but no one showed up nor called. I called and texted but got no response. If customer service poor i can imagine how the work will be.

name: arthur nelson
text: Quality work, knows what he is doing and would definitely recommend to a friend. Just be patient.

name: Nicholas Fine
text:
I'm still waiting after weeks of runaround to get anything fixed.  Avoid American Home Shield warranty and the contractors they suggest like A & E Service company who dodge calls, miss appointments, and then don't return phone calls when they say they will.

Also, one of the only positive reviews on this page are from the owner himself.  That's just sad.

name: Animagus
text: I wish i could give this pathetic excuse for a company less than one star. If you have to work with them through the HWA, go ahead and request service from a different company so your time isn't wasted. I've been without heat for 14 days. I have a family including two kids under 3 and am at my absolute wits' end. I've had to spend the holidays at my mother's house, mother-in-law's and anywhere else we can find a bed because these buffoons can't do their job. It's obvious that they don't want to do their job and have no desire to help customers. They've played the blame game, not shown up to at least FOUR appointments after they've called me saying they were on their way and haven't communicated ANYTHING to me after multiple issues with this claim. They've also sent 4 different people out each time I've needed assistance who have all given 4 explanations as to what our "problem" is. You'd think that a business would at least have the wherewithal and internal communication skills to talk about an issue so they can problem solve it, right? THINK AGAIN! There is no logic. There is no rhyme or reason and there certainly is NO customer service. Look somewhere else.

name: Carly Harris
text:
This is the WORST company. IT IS 95+ DEGREES RIGHT NOW. This company has had us without AC for weeks now. I wish there was an option for 0 stars because they don’t even deserve 1.
This company does not keep you informed. They are not all on the same page, communication is awful. The “CEO” Elijah just makes excuses for stuff not getting done.
End of story.. Do NOT use this company ever if your home warranty company suggests them.

name: Jon Ward
text: They look for techs for 13-14 an hour, they offer part time hours and you have to provide your own vehicle. Now compare that to most decent service companies who furnish a company vehicle and pay 20+ an hour. This should explain what kind of tech you are going to get. Home warranty companies love these types of companies which lead to these types of reviews. Home warranty on your HVAC is always going to be a loose loose situation and these companies are always going to minimize cost .

name: Mike Dickinson
text: A&E did a fantastic job replacing my 5 ton split system.  Elijah and his tech were very courteous and made sure my new system was running like it should.  Highly recommended if you need any type of HVAC repair or system install.

name: Gary Mitchell
text: This company doesn't keep you informed when someone will arrive to make repairs.  The owner says one thing and the tech says he wasn't aware and no one calls you back to let you know that the repair tech isn't coming.  Ypu will spend hours trying to track them down and their voice mail due to being full won't allow you to leave a message.  My American Shield warranty sent them.  The company is located over 90 minutes away from the repair site.  I will never use them again.

name: Brooks Bell
text:
AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!
Take days to show up then when they arrive the first guy didn't do anything and left with it still broken. When they FINALLY returned they attempted to SCAM us by flipping our breaker. If my mom had not checked the unit herself we would've had to pay them THOUSANDS to fix a problem they caused. Whether it be negligence or something more predatory, PLEASE avoid this business.

name: Laurie Calligaris
text: Got the job done

name: Andrea Otte
text: Bought Sears Home Warranty from A& E Tech fixed my dishwasher and did such a great job, quickly and affordably. Once under contract the service took a turn for the worst. Air conditioner stopped working, they missed the Friday appointment with no communication. Came in Saturday. Did not have a condenser to fix my air conditioner. Ordered the part Monday. It is Monday night, 4 days later with no air conditioner. A&E does not go the extra mile to help.

name: Bloody Wolf

He is the reason most independent businesses fail and sad to say I believe this company will fail to bc of poor customer service and lack of integrity.

We will have to call someone else.

name: Aubrie Smith
text: 1 star because a 0 is not an option. Long post but I need to share my experience about this absolutely dishonest company. They were assigned by AHS home insurance, because my AC broke and in this AL heat my house got up to 92 degrees. Thursday morning I got in touch with them and they said they were available to come out the morning of the next day. I then got a message confirming they’d come out Friday between noon and 2pm. Friday (today) came and I was at my house during those times and I hadn’t heard anything from this company so I called at 2 asking for an update. The contractor told me he would call the assigned technician and “call me back”. Over 30 min later and still nothing, I call the contractor back and again and they put me straight to voicemail and I get a text from the number saying “can I call you later” to which I replied I needed an update on the technician’s estimated arrival. More time passes and all my calls keep going straight to voicemail. It is 4pm, two hours after they were scheduled to come and I’ve still been waiting at my house in this heat so I text that it has been over an hour since I last heard from anyone and explain this is getting to be an emergency situation with my house rising in temperature and I need to know if someone is coming out to my house. Of course I also get in touch with AHS explain what’s been going on and they tell me if no one shows up at 5pm to call AHS back. Well, I call AHS back and this time the rep gets in touch with the contractor and they tell the rep that the technician is “on his way” from Bham to my area. It is close to 7pm and still no sign of anyone nor had I heard from the company. I call the contractor and ask for an update on the technician since they said they were on the way over an hour ago. The contractor says “Didn’t you just get off the phone with *name*? He told me that you told him to reschedule for tomorrow morning.” Absolutely shocking and completely dishonest if that is what the technician said because nobody has been contacting me throughout this situation, I’ve been the one to be reaching out and they told AHS that they were “on the way”. Absolutely I get in contact with AHS and tell them the update on this situation and at this point I don’t want a technician who lied and was dishonest about me to come out to MY home. While on the phone with AHS the contractor calls me and asks to “please reschedule for tomorrow morning...it was our mistake/*insert excuse*”. Absolutely not. How do I know what I went through today isn’t going to happen the exact same way? I spent half my day in the heat waiting on someone who said “they were on their way” multiple times and putting my trust and time just to find out that the technician who was to come out to my house falsified and lied about getting in touch with me and rescheduling without my knowledge. Absolutely ridiculous and utter waste of time.

I will never use this service again!!! I don't know if what happened to me, happened to anyone else but, on Friday, May03rd, I turned my A C on for the first time because I knew the colder weather had passed on by.once I turn my air on, I keep it on72degrees no matter what cause I also have ceiling fans and floor fans which helps to keep my power bill down. Well, the A C didn't come on so I called American Home Warranty which provided me with my info and called Same Day maintenance (cause I've used them before to install a thermostat in my home), the technician came out flipped the switch on and never went outback to check my unit...naturally I was happy because now I'm knowing I have air. Kept my doors and windows opened and up until around7:30 because it was really hot inside and I didn't want the unit to work as hard cooling the house inside. 3:00 before day Saturday morning; I was drenched in sweat.not understanding what's happened, got up, checked the A C inside..on. Went out back, checked the unit..no fan turning, unit very hot..turned off A C inside, called SameDay around 8:00 that morning, left emergency message..no return called. Called again all day every30 minutes- an hour...no phone call. Same repeat for Sunday. Monday morning I was on the phone calling them from7:30 until the answering machine picked up and I asked them to please call me back..didn't call me, I called back again finally getting someone who told me they would check with the tec. to see when he can come b out( mind you, this is a re-call) so I should have been a priority along with other people who had an emergency over the week-end not wait until Wednesday to try and work me in. I was told Wednesday morning that the Tec. would be out between 1and 5pm. Okay... I'm trying to hold my self in check because now I'm feeling disrespected and ignored. 4:35 no Tech..I called their office back after the 2nd phone call I was told this guy name Andy would give me a call...what???
It's already4:55 I said" call me" he should be here by now i2don't need him to call me.. She said" that's what he told me to tell you" . long story....so he called5:10 said he would look at his schedule and see if he could get to me tomorrow( Thursday)....I'm sooo pissed now, hot and disgusted...called American Residential warranty back, explained this same thing to them and told them I will not use Same Day Maintenance anymore and to place that notation on the computer by my name...so now I'm searching the internet trying to find someone else who will come out asap to get me up and running......I recommend no body uses this service...at all. I know for some people it works find for you, but there are those of us who feel it's a race thing( that's my own observation people) if it works for you...more power to ya!!!👺👺👺👹👎👎👎

text: Came out installed a ecobee thermostat in our new home that was oh so amazing you can control it from your phone even took the time to explain how it work and set it up for us you won’t regret using this company!

text: Dylan is excellent. He not only has the HVAC degree, but he has real experience that allows him to troubleshoot and diagnose problems. Super nice & professional.

name: Ryan Anderson
text:
After the service Dylan provided today, Southern Comfort Heating & A/C are the only A.C. company I will ever deal with.
We had THREE different big A.C. companies come to our house and try to force a new system on us, even though we told them repeatedly we just bought our house, and could not afford it. They said the compressor was bad, and the unit would "never run again" and we needed a new, $12,000.00 heat pump system...
That's where Dylan, and Southern Comfort Heating & A.C. comes in. They were referred to us by 2 of our neighbors who said they were honest, on time, and got the job done. So we called today, Dylan, the owner, answered the phone himself which was good sign #1. Good sign #2 was that he showed up 1.5 hrs later, right on time. Early, actually, as he gave us a 2 hr. window. Then, after only about 15 minutes working on the unit, much to our surprise air came back on!
As it turns out, all our unit needed was a capacitor! All of the other companies (big companies at that) tried to high pressure us into a new system we could NOT afford. Dylan came out and got that baby running in no time flat! He charged a perfectly reasonable amount to come out and fix our stuff on a Saturday afternoon, & didnt try any high pressure sales b.s.
We were so impressed we also signed up for a maintainence agreement so we know we'll always be taken care of! And when we are ready to replace, Southern Comfort will be our guys! If you're looking for an HONEST, reliable company to come out and take care of your A.C., look no further. Our only wish is that we called Southern Comfort sooner!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We love saving money for our clients!

name: On The Way Home
text: I have not used him, but a while back, I posted on Facebook that a local 501c3 No- kill animal shelter was being donated some sanitizer spray and concentrate, 4 cases. The company donating asked that that the shipping needed to be paid. Dylan stepped up and paid the whole shipping cost of $61 without batting an eye.  I hope you all patronize his business bc he cares about his community and the animals that are abused and neglected in this County.

text:
First of all, the technician showed up 2.5 hours late to refill the Freon in our AC unit. But being late was only the start of it.   We discussed the possibility of having a full unit replacement because he said if the Freon kept running out then that meant it was probably time to replace the unit. So with that said, we weren’t planning to spend a ton of money on Freon since doing that repeatedly meant there was a problem.  He then continued to agree he would fill only 4lbs of Freon but instead filled It with 8.5 lbs without consent,  skyrocketing our bill.   Let’s just say they will not be the ones replacing my Air Conditioning unit when that time inevitably comes.

All being said, I would never recommend this company.  Despicable display of business ethics.

resp.text:
If I could post a pic of this bill I would. He was only charged for 4.8 lbs of Freon. And no we were not late . This guy is a total liar!
Correction. He was only charged for 4.5 lbs of Freon and we were 15 mins late  due to traffic jam on interstate and they live out in the country. This guy was high and couldn’t get his daddy on the phone to pay his bill and now wants to bare false witness.

name: sheila fulkerson
text: when I first called Tiger Heating and Air on Aug 9th, I was pretty pleased with the quick service that I received from this company. But after my experience with them over a new problem I am very disappointed. I wouldn't refer them to a dog house if it needed to be cooled down. My a/c unit stopped working Aug 29th, I called the owner and he was suppose to get back to me within an hour. I called his phone atleast fifty times from my phone and numerous times from my husband and unpublished as well. I finally get in touch with him today and he schedules the appointment for noon- 1pm my time (which is 11a-12p their time). I am sitting here in a hot house waiting on the a/c man... it's almost one pm my time and he calls me just before and tells me that he isn't coming out today I needed to call the warranty company and have them schedule someone else to come out. there are plenty of contractors in Phenix City that could come out today (did he call them and ask to see, hell no), he tells me that there is no way that he can come out he has an emergency at the hospital. that is understandable but why can't you send someone other than yourself to check my unit? He tells me that it isn't that hot outside that it could wait till Monday. This man knows that I have seven month old child as well as a four year old and he has the balls to tell me that it can wait because it isn't hot? The next time my baby throws up on me I will make sure I call him so she can do it to him. she can't be in the heat she has too many problems for it and he is not worth the time of day or the money you will spend. CALL SOMEONE BETTER, PLEASE!!!

name: crystal short
text: This is a great company. 4 years I have used this company.

name: Colyn Fetty
text: Best out there

name: windi rosson
text:
Initially installed our new unit with no problems in 2015. When we called for our yearly maintenance, no one ever showed up. We did this twice and then gave up on them, and changed out filters out ourselves.
After a few years we started to have issues with the unit not cooling, and blowing fuses and lost power to our thermostat.  Tech came out and checked voltage, and changed a fuse. They charged us 1.5 hours of labor, for a 20 min fix.
The issues above persisted and we called to have them come out for repairs again. The techs arrived and  tested voltage and various things but could not find the issue. It was my husband who discovered a wire that was cut and causing a short. The techs fixed that, and also cleaned the coils thoroughly on the unit.
We are still having some issues with our unit not cooling properly which were brought up in the first visit, but since the issue hadn’t happened that much over the course of the past 5 years the tech didn’t think it required any further investigating.
They will charge you for the techs coming from Opelika, however my husband talked to the tech and they were already in Columbus, had just finished a service call and were heading to our house. When my husband brought this up for Mr. Farnell, he stated that they had to include for fair wear and tear on their vehicles.
Tried to bill extra hours for labor, good thing I noted the time when they arrived and when they left, plus we had a rain storm that stopped all work for the duration of the storm.
Charged us for fuses, that we provided since the tech didn’t have any.
My husband called the office to challenge the charges on the bill and did negotiate them with Mr. Farnell, who agreed that something were charged/done in error.
As small business owners, we try to utilize other small business owners when possible. We have spent over $10k with this company (for the new unit and repairs) and after this experience will never use them again. It’s a shame that they let lack of communication, over billing and erroneous charges ruin their business relationship with customers.

name: WILL OBRIEN
text:
I have been doing business with Farnell Heating & Air Conditioning Co., for more than 8 years. They have replaced 2 complete heating & a/c systems for me, as well as 2 major heating system repairs, that several other heating & a/c companies had failed to figure out, after several expensive calls, over a period of 5 or 6 years. They have also done weekend emergency a/c repairs for me that took until 3 am, on a very hot summer night. Most recently (yesterday, 5/28/14, actually) they replaced an old water heater, in a very difficult attic location, in spite of a 3 hr. delay, while the Auburn City Water Dep't cut a very large root away from the shut-off valve at the meter, so that the water could be shut off; and the old water heater could be removed, and the new one installed. They waited, patiently, through the whole delay.

Through all of my experience with Farnell, I have dealt with at least 10 of their service men. From my point of view, as a repeat customer, it would be virtually impossible to find, and hire, better men, than those I have encountered, whenever Farnell was doing work for me. They are, without exception, always on time, very hard working, well-mannered, friendly, and very good at what they do. I have never had a single bad experience with Farnell or their people!!! They're just good people, and I actually trust them. They have never given me any reason not to.

text: My mother was charged 971.00 to replace a 30 gal gas AO Smith hot water heater.  Lowe's retail price is 479.00.  Parts were 127.00 The rest was labor which totaled $1500.00  This is just too much after checking with other companies.  She is elderly (88) and just needed hot water.  For all of you who read this inform your elderly parents to call you before they agree to such outrageous charges.  We will  not recommend this company at all.

text: One of this companies drivers cut me off and slammed on his brakes purposely. We called the company as this type of unsafe driving should be punished by the owner, but they had chose to NOT respond. They are irresponsible and completely unworthy of concern while driving a company vehicle.

resp.text: This is Tommy Farnell (owner). I apologize for this. I have been out of town and just was made aware of the situation today 6-24-19. You called our answering service on 6-15-19. I arrived back to work on 6-24-19. We do have meetings about driving and this type of behavior is not tolerated. Again I apologize and there will be repercussions for this behavior.

name: Robert Grantham
text: Outstanding customer service, professional office staff. I needed help with my residential unit and they came right over.

name: Mary Wynne Kling
text:
The only reason to use this company is if you love shelling out hundreds of dollars, but don't care if your HVAC system ever actually works. I have now "enjoyed" EIGHT visits to my home by Farnell employees written them almost $1500 in checks, had multiple parts replaced (some I am now certain were not faulty to begin with), vacuumed gallons and gallons of water out of my attic, paid Alabama power $500 two months in a row (turns out the compressor was dying and it took Farnell five or six visits to figure that out), and yet I am sweltering through my second consecutive weekend without AirConditioning. Today was the first time we've heard from a manager, who only informed us that "there are no managers in town to help you this weekend" and "we can send someone out, but I don't know if you'll have to pay for a service call or not, it depends on if it's because of something we did." OF COURSE it's because of something you did. Your employees spend more time in my house than I do. Don't waste your time with this bunch.
UPDATE 1/22/2013: Today I was contacted by the owner of this business asking me to remove this review. In Farnell's defense after I first posted this review some attempts were made to rectify the problems we were having. Today when the owner contacted me I attempted to remind him that there was still work they'd promised to do that had never been completed (repainting of a ceiling they damaged in August). Instead of offering to make the repair the owner became extremely rude. Cut me off mid sentence, wouldn't let me finish talking, and talked over me; insisting that he didn't know anything about this issue and that I needed to remove my review. It rapidly reached a point that I hung up the phone. There are some extremely poor customer service issues at play here, and I'd steer clear of doing any business with this company in the future.

text: Got a quote today for an AC replacement for my house.  The guy that showed up was very polite but was very unprepared in my opinion. He showed up with no paperwork. He did nothing to try and sell me on anything he had to offer from his basic to his fancier equipment.   The quotes I got for various brands/efficiency ratings seemed like guesses.

name: Harry Wheelock
text: The service was excellent !

resp.text: Thank you

name: Perry Pope
text: Logan was my Technician, he was very knowledgeable and performed the maintenance service as requested.

name: Stephanie Davis
text: Amazing people, amazing service! A++

resp.text: Thank you

name: Sparkle McGhee
text:
I just bought a home after last Christmas, so this summer is my first in my house and the very first time using the AC, it didn't work. My home warranty company called Turnkey Heating and Air, and a guy named Chris came out the day after my request was put in. I have a son who is a heart baby with Trisomy 21, and he has a fragile immune system and he cant get really hot, or be anywhere with the temperate being to warm for him. Chris was able to fix the issue the same day he came out, and advised the AC had to much coolant. He leveled it out for me and we got a new filter, and cool air was immediate!

A day after the issue was resolved, a leak appeared in my garage and and I had to make another call. Logan came out this time and had to replace my condenser box. Issue fixed!! Both of these guys were great!! They were friendly, informative, and took great care of the issues for me in less than an hour when they were at the house. If you are looking for great, timely service, be sure to give TurnKey Heating and Air a call.  Chris and Logan, you guys are awesome. I hope I am spelling your names right, and your supervisor see this review.

name: Brian Smith
text: Turn Key was on time and very efficient with their time while on site.  Even went out of their way to provide maintenance tips that no other HVAC Company has ever done (probably dealt with 4 or 5 in multiple states).  They will definitely be doing all of our HVAC work from now on!

name: ronald grant
text: Great people, work in a timely manner, great price and fix what broken and not a lot of add ons.

name: Ben Turner
text: They do a great job and when they make a mistake they're quick to fix it at no charge. Thanks for your help guys.

resp.text: Thank you

name: HSC Handyman
text:
Our A/C went out on Wednesday afternoon. I waited for my father-in-law to try to help me with finding a compressor/condenser and installing it for me. Thursday evening I spoke to Mr. Billy. I called Mrs. Frances Friday morning and by 3:00 pm Saturday I had a complete inside/outside Trane heat pump system installed and working. The tech even stayed for a while to make certain everything was working properly.
We weren't expecting this expense and didn't have enough money to make this all happen. "No problem!", says Mr. Billy. He told me about a financing option through Alabama Power. Mrs. Frances got it all taken care of and now we have cold reliable air in the summer and look forward to having hot and more affordable heat this winter.
Thank you so much Mr. Billy and Turn Key for a "Chick-Fil-A" experience with what began as a dreadful situation facing 90 degree temps with no A/C and no way to afford it on our own. Great Job!!!

name: Ora Ervin
text: They were very concerned about the unit and getting it fix asap, very nice and punctuality was great.

name: Edward Soltys
text: Excellent service and response time . The service tech Logan was personable and courteous. Turn Key was very reasonable and stands by their work.

name: David Turner
text: Highly recommend. They were fast, efficient, polite and did high quality repairs on my AC. Thank you, Logan!

name: carlotta wessels
text:
Nathan, is always a gentleman, that takes
of my heating and air problems!!! He does not waste anytime and always with a smile!!!!
GOD BLESS!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Whitt Joy
text: The personnel at Turn Key are very professional and courteous.  Very prompt service. They have been servicing my unit for many years before and I've always been very pleased.  I had a unit that was twenty plus years old and they did everything humanly possible to keep it alive.  I just recently purchased a new unit (Bryant) and am very pleased with the workmanship and service that they provided.  Never before have I seen such attention to detail.  I'm extremely pleased and will be proud to have Turn Key service my unit for years to come.  Thanks guys, you're awesome!

name: Elizabeth Dunn
text: Prompt and efficient

resp.text: Thank you

name: Mike M.
text: Great Company.  Cudos to Mr. Billy and his crew for doing suck a superb job on my AC.  Thank you again.  I highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: Charlotte Harrelson
text: I have used Billy many times for our commercial property.  He is always prompt and totally trustworthy.  Billy has saved us thousands of dollars in costs.

name: Rachael Hutchison
text: Great service!! Super nice guys!

name: John Dill
text:
The actual owner came to my house in Birmingham to check out my air conditioning and heating systems because I thought they were on their last legs ! But the owner surprised me by saying I just needed a AC and heating Tune up!
Thank you for your Honesty Turn Key Heating and Air. You SAVED ME MONEY!!!

name: Anthony Guin
text: Can not recommend! They were sent out for home warranty work. We are now worse off than we were before. Had to have the home warranty company send out someone else.

name: M
text: Great customer service!!!! THANK YOU

resp.text: Thank you

name: Dylan Hein
text: I can't imagine letting these men in my house after the way they acted so disrespectful on the interstate today.  One of their service vans was camped in the left lane, doing 10mph under the speed limit,  blocking traffic for miles.  When I motioned for them to move over so we could pass, both occupants of the vehicle smiled and waved.  They did this repeatedly, but refused to move.  Simply taunting me and those behind me.  After I was able to pass them by switching lanes several times, they proceeded to speed up and slow down, pull up next to me and both smile and wave.  Again, just being as disrespectful as possible, all while still refusing to move from the passing lane.  I called their office and received no answer during posted business hours.  People who are disrespectful enough to hold up a quarter million people and then taunt them while doing it, will be coming nowhere NEAR my home.  Absolutely atrocious the way Birmingham was just treated.  DO NOT PATRONIZE!!!!  COMPLETELY DISRESPECTFUL.  I'll continue to spread the word about this company until I'm notified of these two employees receiving disciplinary action.  If they do not, then obviously this company condones disrespect and gives us even more reason to never patronize them.  If and when I'm notified and shown proof of such discipline, I'll update this review with the company's statement and APOLOGY.

name: The Back Lot Drum Battery Drumline
text: Thank you Mr. Billy and Turn Key for all you do.  We appreciate you guys.

name: Jay Ellett
text: Billy's always been good to deal with.

name: F. J. R.
text: Quality work and knowledgeable workers,.

name: Mike Faughender
text: My service rep Logan was friendly and professional.

name: Jeff Partridge
text: Absolutely the best..........

resp.text: Thank you

name: Tiffany Carter
text: Would leave ZERO stars if that was an option.  They decided without telling us that they would wait until the SPRING to order a new part for our Air Conditioning.... I guess because it is currently Fall?  Fall in Alabama that is 90+ degrees.  I have 4 kids and have been a week without a/c because I believed they had ordered our part and we were getting it fixed this week.  Now, I have to start all over with another company because I won't be giving this one a dime of my money.  There are too many other options in Alabaster to deal with SUB-PAR customer service.  DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.

name: zoo york
text: Employee by the name of brandon was very rude.

name: Katie Hill
text: Great

name: Debbie
text: I have known Keith Johnson for years, and have hired him on numerous occasions whenever I have had a heating or air conditioning problem.  Keith has proven himself to be an extremely competent, fair and respectable tradesman. He has never hesitated to make a service call whenever I have needed him. I would highly recommend Keith Johnson in any situation.  His rates are highly competitive, and his workmanship is superb.

resp.text: Thank you for your business

name: Chris Collins
text: Great and fast.

resp.text: Thank you for your business

name: Shelly Matthews
text: Crystal was very courteous and helpful as well as knowlegable. Our air quit working it was very hot & we we're watching our 1 month old grandson , Crystal said let her call their guys and see what she could do, with in one hour their tech guy Chris arrived did a diagnostic & installed a new fan motor , gave everything a once over and had us up & running again in no time.great service all around , a great experience & reasonably priced. Very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you so very much. I am so Glad we had the Fan Motor on hand and was able to get you going and Cooled Back Off. We Appreciate Customers like you and your husband ! Thank you for taking the time and leaving a Review!

name: Pamela Griffitt
text: We have used Byrd heating and cooling at three different locations, and getting ready for a fourth because they NEVER let us down.  They come quickly, do honest work, and are reasonably priced.  We are very pleased with their services and would recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: We Appreciate your Business with our Company , I am so Glad that you are pleased with our Work !

name: Retha Kent
text:
I have purchased 2 units from this establishment   for two houses I own

They are up to date on all the latest systems but are just as eager to maintain my current system. I have been a customer for 10 plus years.  Reasonable price, quick service and also fixed with the first service call. Even if new parts have to be obtained.

resp.text: We Appreciate you and your family for your continuous use for our Business!

name: William Tidwell
text: Excellent service,  treat you like family.

name: Judy Williams
text: Tyler, Angel and Travis did an excellent job repairing our air conditioner.  They not only get the job done, but they are very customer friendly.  I have nothing but good things to say about the company.

name: Barbara Bryant
text: Derrick was awesome! Professional and courteous! Explained what he was doing!

name: Matthew Kadin
text: Great fast and friendly service!  I called on a rainy Saturday around 6pm about our compressor fan suddenly not working.  With it being so humid outside we were worried about waiting until Monday to get it fixed.  I wasn’t sure if they would be able to do same day or Sunday but their website says they are open 24 hrs.  I called their dispatch and they said Eric would call me shortly to schedule a time.  Well, Eric called me in about 10 min and said he just finished another job 10 min from my house.  He said he could come right over immediately.  I was very happily surprised with how quick he could come out.  With the rain getting harder, Eric showed up, diagnosed the problem and fixed it all within an hour and a half.  He was very knowledgeable and very nice.  Very reasonable price for a Saturday evening call.  I will be using them for any additional air and heating needs.

name: Reggie Pulliam
text: We called Island Air and Wes Hicks was incredibly phenomenal. He was professional and courteous AND a life-saver. AND, he told us about the teacher perks program with the chamber, so he saved us a little on top of their already very reasonable prices. Would highly recommend to anyone and everyone.

resp.text: Thanks Reggie!

name: Rachel Hurt
text: Island Air had to be called out on 2 occasions during a stay at our rental property They were incredibly prompt and professional during both visits. I did not get the name of the young man that serviced our unit on Saturday June 20 @ 3133 west beach blvd but it was after hours and we were exhausted and came into a rental with no air. He was able to give it a temporary fix and told us that the unit desperately needed replacing but they would be back during the week to check it out thoroughly. We were so thankful for him and were able to sleep at night. On Wednesday June 24th we had to call again because the unit had quit working properly  (as the first guy said it would) and Jayson Bryan came out and serviced it again and did an excellent job! We were incredibly thankful for the prompt and courteous service of Island Air!

name: Tiffany Wooten
text: Fantastic service,! We had our whole HVAC replaced,  and I couldn’t be happier with Island. Every employee I dealt with was extremely  knowledgeable, friendly, and professional. They were prompt with communication, and completed the job in no time. They cleaned up their work space, and left my house just like they found it. Highly recommend!

name: David Niznik
text: On time. Very professional. Would highly recommend these wonderful people.

name: Phillip Giattina
text: If you’re looking for a great, trustworthy HVAC company the Island Air is your choice. Their staff plus a great role in the community with a lot of volunteer involvement!

name: Christi Koehle
text: Fantastic Company! They stand behind their word. They will always get your problem taken care. A great company ran by great giving people.

name: Lawrence Baranek
text: Excellent service from a very professional and friendly young man. Chase did a great job representing island Air and cheerfully answered all of my questions. Thank you Chase...

name: Brian Ranies
text: This company came out three times and my unit is still not fixed way over priced do not recommend this company at all unless you want to pay high prices for poor work call someone else

resp.text:
Brian,

I am very sorry for the misfortune you have dealt with in regards to your HVAC system.  I would be more than happy to send someone back out. at no charge, to make sure your unit is running its best. Unfortunately, I do not see your name anywhere in our database. If you could send  me an email with your contact information and address, I will make sure that we address your issue immediately.
blake@callislandair.com

Thank you

name: Paul Hurst
text: They do not stand behind their work.

name: Samantha Tomlin
text: Good staff

name: Allison McGrath
text:
How could you be closed on a day people needed you most.  My house has now been without heat going on 40 + hours.  Let’s hope you open your doors this morning.

The AC guys were out driving around risking their lives to try to get heat back to customers but you were not there when we needed the part.

name: Shane Taylor
text:
Tom does a great job taking care of his customers ! Our company services 20 Hobby Lobby stores and most of them have Lennox equipment. We use this location to order as many of those parts we can.
Very impressed with his knowledge of product and customer service is top notch.

name: najai stewart
text: Don't really know about this place, but would have been a good job for my boyfriend if he had license

name: LiqwdE Teryx 4LE (LiqwdE)
text: Great staff, highly informative

name: Nancy Steadmon
text:
First rate service. I got a new unit put in several years ago, they service every year like
Clockwork. Nice techs professional and always very responsive

name: Robert Kuhn
text: Technician came the day and time as promised. He was actually early. I live out of state so this was important. My unit is 31 years old. He cleaned it and checked it. Said it was running as it should and didn’t try to sell me a new unit. Kinda wished he had because I will definitely by from them when the time comes.

name: Lowell Hicks
text:
These good folks replaced our entire home system. Outside and inside units. New duct work. HALO Whole Home Air Purifier System. Very responsive and on time. Extremely professional and knowledgeable about their products. Their prices couldn't be beat. Very reasonable prices for all they did.
They made sure everything was properly sealed. And, when they finished, they made sure no mess was left behind. Unbelievably cleaned up. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND Hansen Heating & Air to anyone!
You will not be disappointed with this company and their professional team!

name: Gary Gooris
text: Hansen Heating and Air replaced our complete A/C system and duct work in a professional manner, on time, and within budget. No excuses or exceptions. All materials used were the highest quality and the installation team was clean, prompt, and professional.  The Hansen Team provided such excellent service I have asked them to install a whole house generator. I'm highly confident we will receive the same level of service for the generator installation that we received in the past.

name: Coach Brouillet
text: We have been a customer for a number of years.  At that time, Hansen Heating & Air was the best value for our 2 system purchase.  Since then, they have been very responsive & have taken care of us.  We also have been using the Preventive Maintenance program to have the systems checked out every 6 months.  We are very pleased.

name: Charles Weston
text: Had to replace the coil in a/c unit. They were very professional. We’re in and out in an hour or so. They were polite and respectful. They are quick to respond when you call for service. Highly recommend Hansen Heating & Air.

name: Nancy Gilmore
text:
We arranged to have the annual SAM plan for safety and inspection of Cooling/Heating, Electrical, and Plumbing maintenance.  We also had the  iWave system installed.  The service techs that visited were all very professional, courteous, efficient, knowledgeable and most helpful.  Rick, Frank, and Alex were amazing.  The iWave speaks for itself (cleaner, fresher air!) and has lived up to its assertions and more. We have referred several friends to purchase and they have had the same positive experience.

Since initial inspection under the Same plan, we had need of a plumbing visit.  The techs were very thorough in their attempts to identify and resolve the issue, but unfortunately were not successful, perhaps due to the initial construction installation and lay out of the plumbing system, which sadly would be too involved to resolve.

We would give the Hansen group the max star ratings in all areas and would not hesitate to refer with confidence.

name: Jenny Ladnier
text: From our first interaction with a service call late in the evening to the installation of our new unit everything was wonderful. The guys that arrived and took care of everything were more than professional. Phillip was our tech who came on the service call. He was super respectful and helpful. I appreciate everyone at this company and their professionalism.

name: Gene Eaves
text: Very professional and courteous. Explained service work and answered my questions. I would highly recommend Hansen Heating & Air Conditioning

name: Andrew Brymer
text: Hansen was very prompt in scheduling my AC installation as well as the actual installation. Very respectful of my home and very professional. My only possible complaint would be that a couple of small items that were quoted weren’t performed, such as replacing the wooden platform my interior air handler rested on. Other than that, I’d recommend Hansen!

name: Charles Harper
text:
The serviceman from Hansen came the same day that I called and did an excellent job. He diagnosed the problem and let us know the cost. After he finished he was in the den and I was talking to my wife about an issue with some new furniture that was just delivered. The young man asked what the problem was and fixed the issue quickly. I thought he was very considerate and certainly went beyond the call of duty.
Hansen has a wonderful and professional group of folks.
Charlie

name: Karen Lucek
text: Ricky was on time as per our conversation before arrival. He was thorough in his inspection. He took the time to explain and show me what the issues are and what work is needed. I am confident in Hansen's expertise.

name: Tory Bray
text: I have used Hansen Heating & Air several times over the years. They have always been professional, courteous and knowledgeable. Efficient at pinning down the issue and resolving it in a timely manner. I would recommend them!

name: Shanavia White
text: very satisfied with the service we recieved.  Tech responsed timely and fixed  problem with ducts. The price was was well within my budget. Now we are enjoying the pleasure of a cool house during these extremly hot summer day. Thanks Hansen. Job well done.

name: Brian Lovrey
text: I cannot speak highly enough about Hansen Heating & Air. Every one of heir employees was courteous & friendly & the quality of their work is outstanding. They were very neat and tidy with everything they did and they were extremely efficient. It was an absolute pleasure to deal with  this company.

name: Cynthia Blake
text: Jason Martin for diagnostics along with Aaron and his crew for install can't be beat. Over 100 with the heat index, same day as I placed the call and these guys finish in less than 3 hours. Very professional, friendly,  super tidy, and made sure the job was done right. I'm getting ready to sleep comfortably at a cool 70 degrees and that is priceless.

name: Betty Murdock
text: My experience with Hansen has always been professional. They were on time and did a great job and clean up was great. Reasonably priced also. Would recommend them.

name: Carol Zambrano
text: Right off the bat, calling in and scheduling was easy, reps were nice and professional. The whole office communicates with you and I am very pleased. They were very responsive and the install techs were professional and informative.

name: Sherrie Byron
text: No problems nice people cheaper than most a.c. companies will use from now on.

name: Beth Power
text: Fast scheduling through a friendly office staff, and the service call was right on time too! Excellent work. Highly recommend.

name: Dale Davis
text: Thank you so much for helping us, gave you guys a call and by 8 last night my house was cool. You guys came back today to do some more work for me. Thank you so much!!!

name: Raja Mahtani
text:
This company is very prompt reliable and trustworthy
They understand the importance of solving the problem so that their clients can be comfortable.
I have and will recommend to my friends and family

name: Chantrell Amey
text: They are always professional. The price is affordable. They are opening 24 hours and always on call. I have use them for about 10 years or more.

name: Joseph Behr
text:
Preformed preventative maintenance on my standby generator and replaced the battery. The technician was very professional; he arrived as scheduled, explained the need to replace the battery in my generator along with the tests he performed.

Would definitely use their services in the future.

name: Tristan Wedge
text: Hansen did an amazing job fixing our AC unit! They were on time, professional and did a great job getting our unit back up and running! Thank y’all.

name: Larry Saranthus
text: Competitive pricing but more importantly they were punctual and professionally completed the Mitsubishi split system in a timely manner. Follow up service is commendable!

name: Barri Perez
text: I absolutely love Hansen we use them for all of our rental properties, as well as, our personal home.  I recommend them every chance I get.

name: Brian Fletcher
text: Hansen Heating & Air is fantastic. I have been using their services for years. They are reliable, friendly, affordable, and always deliver the highest quality services.

name: Mary DeWise
text: The technicians were courteous and very efficient.

name: Jackie DeWaal
text: I only use this company because they are professional, honest and trustworthy.  Best in the area.

name: Wes Harless
text: A/C started acting up only hours before I had renters scheduled to come in. Hansen got a technician out to me in less than an hour during peak season! They had it fixed several hours earlier than the other companies could even get someone to show up. They will be my go to for any repairs moving forward.

name: cessna151
text: So far I have bought 4 a/c units, and a home generator from Hansen. They all work great, and I am very pleased.

name: Randy Quinn
text: Drain was stopped, required "blowing out". Problem was diagnosed immediately and repaired efficiently, but cost was beyond excessive: $295 for clearing drain is outrageous, especially for repeat customer.

name: Hayden Dudley
text: Great value, very fast response time, and my HVAC system is now up and running perfectly.

name: Kayla Mowdy, DPT
text: We began having AC problems early June and called 2 other places and were given times several days out for a tech to come check it. Hansen was there within 30 minutes of our call (just a little after 5pm on a Thursday) and diagnosed our unit. We ended up needing a replacement and got a brand new unit installed first thing the next day.

name: Curt Crider
text: They have always been reliable and professional and the work has always been done right the first time.

name: johnny goodwin
text: This was a great experience from the first call I made to the tech arriving and fixing ac unit, the tech was very knowledgeable and told me exactly what was wrong and had it fixed within 30 minutes of arriving!

name: Michael Hoskins
text: Service was prompt and efficient. Ricky did a great job. Already signed up to use them again.

name: Patti McPherson
text: Repairmen came out day I called and super nice which was great.  However, they didn’t fix my heating problem first go around.  $95 to come diagnose the problem(spent time looking at the unit) $50 to process warranty for part covered then $95 to come back to install part.  Appeared to be working when I left the same day returning home the next day found house freezing and heater not working again.  It appears part replaced was not the issue.  So, Needless to say I’m not happy.  Let’s see if I’m charged again for service call and repair! Currently waiting for them to come back to look at the problem again. They did come back and fixed the problem with no additional charge.  Satisfied customer!

name: Dayna Hurst
text: They have always gave us the best service!

name: Clark Kelly
text: They did a nice job with my commercial HVAC requirement

name: Scott Lewis
text: Once again great service!   I love how they go the extra mile cleaning after themselves!

name: Karen Hong
text: Very good services before and post installation

name: Sue Ryan
text: Very professional, efficient...very impressed

name: broomegar
text: Came to replace capacitor late one hot evening.

name: Gen Proctor
text: I am new to Alabama and this was my second time to use Hansen Heating and Air. This was my first time to have to call out on the weekend because my AC went out. It was this past weekend in the middle of a storm with extremely heavy winds and rain. I could not believe that I was able to get someone the same day but was even more amazed that they responded in about an hour. They are always polite, extremely careful of surroundings by wearing shoe covers,etc. after checking my inside unit he went out in the storm, I offered an umbrella but he didn’t need it. In a few minutes I saw him walk to his truck. I thought he was writing a bill so I asked how much. He came to the door and showed me that my breaker was burned up and how much hot it was. It would burn your hand if you held it. I was surprised he had a breaker for my unit and was able to install it so quickly. The charge for the service call, travel, weekend inconvenience, repair and parts was less than I paid for a service call in my last state. Donnie was so knowledgeable, professional and fast that I couldn’t begin to give him enough stars. I said the first time I used Hansen that I would never use anyone else. This was definitely a great find. Hsnsen’s Is by far the best company I have dealt with. I have already began advertising to my community how great they are. I am definitely a customer for life. Thank you so much Donnie.

name: Walter Garrett
text: Awesome service and professionalism! I would highly recommend.

name: Brad Albrecht
text: Very fast service.

name: derya doster
text: They were good.

name: Janice Mccants
text: The technician is friendly, professional, punctual, and doesn't mind if I ask a question. Really, from the time that you call Hansen until the time the technician leaves your home after he is finished, EVERYBODY IS FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. And they are a lot cheaper than my previous AC Service. I told the old company to take my name out of their COMPUTER.

name: Paul Darnell
text: Very professional Installation on time And left our condo very clean

name: Tommy Reynolds
text: Great fast responses to repair your issues. They fix the problem right away, and don't do the old you need a complete system like some others do when you just need a capacitor or fuse. The staff are friendly and are quick to answer all questions. They are the only ones that I will call for all my work

name: James Barnard
text: The best company I have ever used will recomend thanks

name: Hope Dunn
text: Thank you Kevin ,Robert and his crew. Excellent service.  Would recommend them again and to all my friends.

name: Greg Seelye
text: Very dependable.

name: Bruce Barrett
text:
I've lived in Orange Beach for over 20 years and, until now, had yet to find a truly good HVAC company. My consistent experience with perhaps six other A/C companies has been over-charging and up-selling. Example: one local business charged me $236 to replace an $8 part in 17 minutes.
-
Hansen Heating & Air is a breath of fresh air. Technician Mason was great. He diagnosed, explained, verified, and corrected the problem in less than 10 minutes. And for such a quick fix, I was charged only the VERY reasonable service call/diagnostic cost. They now have another lasting customer.
-
This licensed local business, with very fast service on a hot weekend, is a 5-star GO TO company. I highly recommend anybody needing A/C or Heating service to call them first.

name: Kimberly Anderson
text: Michael was prompt in returning our call and was accurate on his estimated time of arrival. He was very courteous and professional. Took took time to explain things we needed to know and some preventative maintenance.  We had used this business before and definitely will again.

name: Matt Spradley
text:
The best HVAC I have ever seen. Friendly and very polite. Courteous and fast. I will definitely call these guys for the next HVAC problem I have.
Thanks

name: Zina C
text: Every time I call the receptionists are very friendly, courteous, and professional. The technicians are professional, thorough and knowledgeable. A job well done.

name: Judith Mogavero
text: Troy came out to our house pretty quick this morning! Only reason I gave 4 stars was the fact that he came in and left quick with a possible diagnosis of replacing the fan blade or an issue with the motor of our outdoor AC unit. Professional, nice and  Hansen offers an affordable call fee.

name: Beth K
text: Friendly professional service every time

name: Mary Bama
text: Starting with the receptionist who answered the service call to the timeliness of the service call was excellent professionalism.  The serviceman Chris was friendly, knowledgable and efficient and went above and beyond to explain the problem. He worked quickly and provided information about the company and I opted to secure a yearly service arrangement due to his professionalism and knowledge. I could not be happier with choosing this company and will endorse them anytime. Thru Chris i also found out they service electricity issues and plumbing as well so this is good company to have immediate as access to. Thank you, Hansen and Chris. Excellent service.

name: Brenda Strickler
text: Repairman was excellent

name: Chris Stewart
text: Everyone that works for this company is absolutely amazing! Highly recommend contacting them if you are ever in need

text: Hansen's service is superb. Jason was on-time, courteous, and Super-knowledgeable about our system ! I know we can count on them to take care of our H & A needs.

text: Every year I receive Hansen Heating and Air refrigerator magnet; so when our air went out I called Hansen Heating and Air. The lady who answered the phone was very nice and explained that a technician would be calling us soon. Sure enough shortly afterwards, Donnie called and said he would be there in forty-five minutes. He was right on time and diagnosed the problem immediately.  He didn’t have the replacement part in his van, but he called around to other technicians and found one.  He left and came back with the proper replacement part. Donnie was respectful, knowledgeable, and efficient. I give Hansen Heating and Air FIVE stars! Thanks for your quick service on a LABOR DAY weekend.

name: Jason Fountain
text:
My wife and I returned after a week's vacation to find that our ac was out. We delt with it the first night as it was too late to do anything about it. The next day my wife began searching for contractors to come repair the system. We spoke to several highly rate businesses all of whom were either rude or couldn't get to us for days.

Enter Gipson. The owner of the company answers my wife's call and uses his own name (Shane) not the company name, very personable. My wife describes our predicament, this conversation taking place around 10am, Shane says that while they are a small operation and have appointments booked all day, he would not end his day until we had ac back.

Shane was true to his word, by 5pm 2 technicians were at our house and working, while other companies gave us hassle about having to speak to our home warranty company, Gipson showed no hesitation to do what was necessary for us.

Fast efficient service and a very honest and detailed approach about the work that was being done. The repairs cost way less than we anticipated and they went the extra mile to install a simple cheap fix to avoid this issue in the future. We jumped at the opportunity to sign up for the yearly maintenance program which is exceedingly affordable. I decided even of we didn't need the service I was going to pay for it because this is the type of business that deserves to succeed!

Thank you Gipson, we are life long customers now!

resp.text:
Mr. Fountain,
Thank you very much for the kind words and the review! We appreciate this more than you know! I’m very glad you were happy with the service.

name: stacey coe
text: Businesses like this are hard to come by these days! The owner came out and repaired our AC within 30mins of calling for repair. One of the most honest, stand up guys, very professional as well as informative. He did not rush through he took his time and got down to the bottom of the issue we were having with our AC. He went above and beyond! Very professional and cleaned up after himself even though I insisted I could move some items in the yard back into place. Can’t say enough good things about this guy! He is greatly appreciated! My AC is back up and running and he did an outstanding job! If you want a company that will treat you as if you are family     this is the place to call! Thank Gipson Heating and Air!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Brittney Mayes
text: Shane and his team are absolutely incredible! They spent an entire day correcting mistakes that a previous contractor had made. Some of the work they did included: rebuilding duct work (that was previous leaking air into the attic), they raised the furnace, strapped up the indoor coil, put in a new supply run, and fixed all of my vents (that were previously blowing backwards). I had the air running constantly for the past few weeks and it was not getting below 78 degrees. It is now down to 67 degrees in just a couple of hours! They were very professional, detail oriented, and clean! They went above and beyond for me an exceeded all expectations! I will give them a 10/10 and will recommend them to all of my clients/ friends.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review! Glad your happy and cool!

name: Adam Klein
text: Cannot highly enough recommend Shane Gipson and his team. They’re responsive, creative, trustworthy, and extremely professional. I feel very fortunate to have their help managing my home.

text: Shane was great to work with through this whole process. He has been extremely responsive and went above and beyond to explain all of our options with our A/C. text: Outstanding service and very knowledgeable - so grateful to have found a reliable, honest company that is willing to fix existing units instead of pressuring customers to purchase new ones. name: Villiam
text: Gipson Heating and air conditioning is the BEST. I just moved to a house and needed my gas heat turned on. To do so I needed an inspection and pressure test. Without any luck from multiple companies I reached out to, and a few let downs from companies that said they could help (but canceled last minute) called Gipson. And he was able to pull a permit and set everything up for the next day! I should have called Gipson first! Shane (the man who came to my house) was honest, insightful, and very professional. Because of Gipson I was able to get my heat turned on that same day! Gipson will be the only company I will recommend for Heating and air  from this point. Thank you very much!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Tim Brice
text: Gipson Heating and Air is a very capable, experienced family-owned business with multiple skill sets.   We have used them to replace our main single stage heat cooling system and they also came back to make repairs at no charge.   They also replaced our water heater on very short notice at a great price.   Their techs are always courteous and clean, wearing booties every time they come inside, and they work fast without a lot of chit-chat.   We are indebted to them and would highly recommend them as a trade company with high skills and equal integrity.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review! So glad to have you as a customer!

name: PJ Simmons
text: Shane was incredibly helpful in getting my heating system going again. He clearly has been doing this for long enough to home right in on the problem. He has restored my faith in service companies with his honesty and professionalism.

resp.text: Happy to help out! Thanks for the review!

name: greg honeycutt
text: Fast, professional with amazing service and people. I would highly recommend Gipson for all of your hvac needs.

resp.text: Thank you sir!

name: Alesha Price
text: I can’t say enough about Shane and his amazing crew. We had him come out a few months ago to repair our HVAC system. He did a wonderful job fixing it after the company who installed it really messed it up. I thought we were having problems with the same system again because water randomly began leaking through our ceiling which is what had happened in the past, so my first thought was, “Uh-oh, the air conditioner is malfunctioning again.” So I called Shane to check it out and it turned out to be our hot water heater. First of all, he answered my call on a weekend when he was doing other things on his own time and made our problem a priority to fix, which I truly appreciate. And instead of referring me out to someone else to deal with it since it wasn’t an HVAC issue, he came out and replaced it himself and made modifications to ensure it could never leak through the ceiling again. Also, he discovered in the process that a faulty valve had malfunctioned on the outside of our house and was causing extraordinary water pressure on the inside, which had cost us thousands of dollars in repairs and appliance replacement, (including the water heater!), over the years! No one had ever been so thorough as to investigate something as simple but as impactful as the water pressure in our home, (and we had other big companies come out over the years). But Shane did and he even fixed that issue- spending literally hours digging out and replacing the broken valve in our front yard. We are so thankful that Shane was there to help us out. They really are jacks of all trades at Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning and are truly knowledgeable about many things across the board in terms of repairs. I have since referred others to Shane and Co with full confidence that he and his crew will always do the job right for a fair price, without taking advantage of people in the process, and will go above and beyond in the quality of their product and services.  And that, in and of itself, is worth more than anything to me. I do truly appreciate these fine people and cannot say enough good things about this company.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words! It’s truly our pleasure to go above and beyond for our customers.

name: Katie Vick
text: Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning LLC did a great job installing our new system! We got quotes from multiple people and went with Gipson. We got the most for our money with them and they were really great! We will use them in the future for all of our heating and cooling needs!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!

name: Prayer Warrior Princess
text: I cannot say enough about Shane- owner of Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. In order to give a better understanding of my situation let me say, without the intent of trashing anyone or their business, that when our system was replaced two years ago by the company that installed it, (who I also called for help yesterday when it stopped working), it malfunctioned quickly and flooded a bedroom ruining drywall and requiring extensive repairs. Eventually it had to be completely replaced as it never functioned properly. The replacement system needed a few tweaks, but eventually it seemed to work consistently and well and did for nearly a year- until yesterday. So, I contacted the company who installed the system and they were unable to come out immediately, nor could they give me a timeframe for their arrival.  It was 80 degrees inside, I have pets, and I needed someone there sooner rather than later. Shane wasted no time in getting to my house to assess the system and set to work immediately. In the process, he educated me on the system and gave me a complete rundown of what exactly was wrong, including a list of issues caused by the installers of the system, which were contributing to the malfunction of it. He also hauled off a large garbage bag of trash that the installers left in my attic! Additionally, his service charges were so reasonable I actually questioned him about it! His reply was basically that he would rather be good to customers, charge reasonably and fairly, and get great reviews and referrals than charge exorbitant amounts of money for his services! I was blown away! Now my air is working beautifully, I didn’t spend a fortune to get it fixed, and he has a customer for LIFE. Try Gipson Heating and Air Conditioning. Their work ethic, professionalism, quality work product, and positive results speak for themselves!

resp.text: Our pleasure to help and thanks so much for the review!

name: Cohen Johnson
text: Shane diagnosed and fixed a problem with our gas logs. Highly recommend Shane!

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Ashley
text:
First, let me mention that I have never written a review for any company or even a product I've purchased and loved from Amazon but Gipson Heating & Air Conditioning deserves a review.  I don't even know where to begin because they are so AMAZING.  The owner of this company literally has the key code to my front door because he is so trustworthy.  I wouldn't hesitate to let him babysit my children because he is such a great guy.  His staff as well.  My story is unique because what started with me calling him out to talk about a duct cleaning turned into my husband and I gutting our entire home for a remodel (for other reasons) and we wanted a brand new system.  Shane came out to do a load calculation to help us pick the perfect system.  He was so detailed that he climbed into the smallest, most cringy area underneath a stairway landing in my basement. I felt like I was watching the show Fear Factor because you couldn't have paid me to crawl under there!!  We sat down at the table and he explained with so much detail the system I needed.  What I found to be so funny, is that I have never met a HVAC guy that was so passionate about his work.  I thought I was going to have to kick him out because, at one point, I think he started doing algebra equations based on how many windows I have and insulation in the house and whether the sun rises or sets on backside of my roof...LOL.

Anyways,  this remodel has taken two years and I don't know how many times he came out to my home to help me before I ever paid him a dime.  I have a longer chain of text messages to him than I do to some of my friends.  He has just been there to answer every...single...one of my questions. I have a beautiful new HVAC system now, all new ductwork, gas lines for my hot water heater and two fireplaces and an additional ductless, mini split system installed.  There is not a better, more skilled, or more honest HVAC company in this area....period!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Ashley for the nice review!

name: Whitney Mosley
text: Shane and his team went above and beyond to make sure my family was taken care of before we needed heat for winter. They always arrive promptly and ready to work. text: Highly recommend this contractor,  Shane and his crew are very good at their craft.  I had a new air handler and heat pump installed with duct work needing to be replaced. text: Gipson replaced both HVAC units, rebuilt ductwork, and replaced vents at my home this summer, and the entire experience was fantastic. text: Shane replaced both our main unit and the unit upstairs, replaced old duct work, and added duct work where needed to handle the air flow. They did a great job. They were friendly, clean, and showed pride in their work.
