text: They worked hard to make sure that we got the unit we needed for our needs. I would not hesitate to recommend and use them again!

name: Jean Gable
text: LOVED IT!!!

name: C Rod
text:
Very responsive. Had to reschedule via text due to an emergency, and was given another appointment right away. Whoever is running the office is great!
Additionally, the tech sent to my house was very knowledgeable. Went above and beyond. Took a photo, and showed me what the real problem was. Even though the problem was not related to my AC, he flushed out the line anyway. Excellent service! Highly recommended!

name: Alex Boctor
text:
After my prior unit failed, I had Best Plumbing and Air Conditioning come out to install a new one in my attic. The regional manager got the prices for a new unit and informed me that the Trane units come with a 10-year parts and labor warranty. A few days later August 17, I was met by the sales rep to sign the contract to have my air conditioning unit installed the next day. He let me know that the unit came with a 3-year parts and labor warranty. I negotiated to have the 10-year parts and labor warranty but felt uneasy that I had to catch the discrepancy and negotiate to get what I was told verbally.
On August 18, a crew came out to the house to install a unit. The crew then arrived and installed my air conditioning unit. After they left, I went up to inspect the unit and found that the air filtration unit (installed weeks prior by Best Plumbing and Air Conditioning) did not have the red light on, indicating the device was active, while the unit was running. A simple check to see if the red light were on would have revealed this. Furthermore, the electrical connection to the unit had a cable spliced open with exposed wiring. I called and asked for someone to come and clean the mess left behind in my attic as well as to fix the air filtration unit and ensure its operation. In addition, the crew had damaged my attic frame, but agreed to fix it later on in the week.
Before someone could come out, I noticed my celling over my shower leaking, right underneath the air conditioning unit. I called back and asked for a different crew to be sent out come out. The regional manager came out, then the same individual followed. As both were in my attic, the regional manager then left the same individual behind to do the repair, contrary to my request. After they left, I walked back in my house to discover my heat was on, even though my unit was set to cool. I called the regional manager back directly and he sent someone back out who said he got some wires crossed. He fixed it then left.
I was informed on August 19th after the install that within 3-4 days I would have a contractor come out to repair the ceiling that was now brown due to the air conditioning leaking. When that time lapsed, I reached back out to him again. He told me it would get fixed. If I wanted to, I could call someone to come fix it and get reimbursed and apologized for them being backed up. Well, a few days later (September 4th), my ceiling started to leak again in the exact same spot. Fortunately, this was over my shower.
This time another technician came out. He mentioned that it was because the pan was the wrong size, or in the wrong location, so they would get it fixed next week. It concerns me that the regional manager was up in my attic after problems were found and failed to diagnose the cause of the leak as being the size or orientation of the pan. This makes me wonder what other problems will be faced down the road.
Then another tech comes out to fix the cause of the leaking ceiling on September 8th. It gets repaired. So, I think all is good, right? No.
Later that day, I notice a brown spot on the ceiling in my other bathroom. So, I go up to investigate and I find that it appears to be spilled water from when they repaired the unit. So, I call again (3rd time) and I am told the same thing “We can have someone come out and fix it.” At this point, this is the 3rd leak I have had, so I have zero confidence that the unit will not leak again. So, I decide “let’s wait and see if any of the leaks happen again.” Since it has leaked 3 times, it may be better to wait.
2 weeks go by, so I reached out to the regional manager and asked for $160 so that I can fix the damage myself. $60 for the parts and $100 for my inconvenience. No response. Zero.
It is now 6 weeks after the unit has been installed, so I have decided I will just fix the stains myself, rather than to deal with the frustration of being ignored.
If I had it to do over again, there is no way I would choose to do business with this company.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Boctor - our Branch Manager has been attempting to reach you regarding your feedback. It has always been our intention to repair any damage caused by our installation as stated in previous conversations with our Branch Manager. We are no way attempting to ignore you or hide from this. We will continue to reach out to you in hopes that you will answer the call or return the call so we can move forward in a way that may help to restore your faith in our company.

name: Jason Cosby
text: I had a really good experience working with Alex.  Alex offered top notch professionalism by communicating with me before and during the time he spent servicing my unit.  Good customer service is very important to me and Alex passed with flying colors.

name: Carl Smith
text:
My experience and expectation with Best Care wasn't met.  After the installation was completed the technician couldn't get the A/C unit to work.

Just to be clear my family and I had been without air for four days in 85 degree weather.  I called them on two separate occasions to reschedule appointments to finish the installation and they didn't show up.

I personally drove to Best Care office after a few days to complain about my situation.  They finally sent a technician to my house to finish the installation.   It took the technician about 2 hours to get the system to run.

After that the technician didn't offer to show me how to operate the new system.   I asked and he only showed me how to turn on the A/C unit then he left.

I'm not convinced my system is operating correctly,  my thermostat is on 70 and my home isn't cold.

I changed my system from a 4TN to a 5TN unit and I don't see a major difference.

My system shows cooling zones but it's not working.

I need someone from Best Care to come out and check out my A/C unit.

Carl Smith

name: Suzanne Peterson
text: On June 12th I discovered a leak in my master bedroom. I called my home warranty and they sent me Best care of No. Alabama. First Carlos came and told me what the problem was. He was great at getting my next appointment with Nate to show us our options. We ended up choosing to get a new A/C unit. Nate quickly had use an appointment for Monday June 21st. Unfortunately the wrong unit came in, so we had to wait another day. Tyler showed up with an assistant and installed the unit on June 22nd. My house is finally cool again. Thank you Carlos, Nate and Tyler, you guys are amazing. I am so happy with the service I have received from Best Care. Thanks!

name: Suzanne Wellborn
text: Braxton at Madison Alabama office came on time and fixed our problem quickly. He was very polite and courteous and let me look at everything with him and explained to me what he was doing. We are very thankful for him today.

name: Keith A. Casey (WKAC1080.com)
text: Would recommend Service Technician, Carlos Chacon for any type of A/C service work.  Prompt, Professional, and Polite.  Having someone like Carlos to do the work will help restore your faith in the human race for someone that still believes in honesty, and integrity.  If additional services are needed, I'll definitely request that he do the work.

name: Rick Bradshaw
text: Carlos was knowledgeable and also had great customer service. He diagnosed and explained In lamest terms what the issue was and then quickly resolved it.

name: Paula Roberts
text: Carlos Chacon was very helpful, service was excellent, he was very helpful with explaining everything that we needed to know, he was very kind & patient, we give him three thumbs up

name: Leslie Vincent
text: Service was amazing Carlos was great he had the AC cooling in no time highly recommended him and best care for any hvac repairs. Thank you Carlos

name: Tracey Smith
text: Very professional, knowledgeable, and sufficient. The technician knew exactly what the issue was and had everything back and running in no time. Excellent Service!

name: Molly Pointer
text: Carlos Chacon was very professional and did a amazing job.. he was on time and had our ac system running in no time. Highly recommend this company for any HVAC repairs

name: martin
text: My experience with Best Care was amazing. The Technician that came out was extremely knowledgeable. Parts had to be ordered and he kept me updated through the entire process. Best service company I have dealt with in years. I can only check on of the survey boxes but if I could, I would check all 3, Seamus was top knotch

resp.text: Good afternoon. I'm sorry that you weren't able to reach a manager. I'd like to help and get you in touch with the right person. Can you please send an email to info@bcshlink.com with your contact information and I'll have someone reach out immediately.

The lead installer was were able to troubleshoot what turned out to be both a defective thermostat and a bad wire in the original house wiring that precluded the new Trane system from immediately turning on. Great work by the lead installer and his support team from Best Care.

That's ridiculous when I purchased the unit and had it installed by them. Something so simple should happen because I change the filter.

name: Mel Seemann
text: "our technician went over and above to explain each step of the process and to make sure we are confident in his work."

name: David Jenkins
text:
I had to hire another contractor and pay over $4000.00 to correct the damage Best Care Home Services did to my unit. Best Care Home Services was hired to repair one of my four American Stand dard / Trans  central air conditioning Units..  I had a simple problem that Best Care Home services made worse and worse. Best cate then left me without air-conditioning all summer long in 2020 ..  The service manager Chad actually lied to try to cover up their mistakes..  I reached out and left voicemails and emails for Brian the company owner who never even had the courtesy to call me back. My home was damaged further my lack of air-conditioning on the second floor  and we had to send my 2 step Sons to live with her father since the bedrooms had no air-conditioning

I recommend everyone  stay far away from this company  their technicians not have the experience necessary to diagnose simple problems .. they will be more than happy to take your money and not provide you a service and if anything goes wrong they will leave you high and dry and abandon you like that did to me Not to mention it actually cost me $4000.00 to have what damaged corrected

resp.text: Mr. Jenkins -- We had multiple conversations with you and your warranty company. There was no damage to this unit. While the warranty company did cover to replace your compressor, there was nothing mechanically wrong with the condensing unit which is why they would not cover to replace that component. Each time we visited your home after the compressor install, this unit, along with your other three units, was cooling. We are bound by the terms of your warranty coverage and we followed the direction given to us by your warranty company.

name: Jeremiah Flynn
text: Absolutely the best service ever. Really great with their hands.

name: Jeremiah Flynn
text: Absolutely the best service ever. Really great with their hands.

name: Brandon Bennigsohn
text: We've had a few experiences with Best Care.  Nothing but good things to say.  Very professional.  All work was done through home warranty so I can't help on prices but I would trust whatever quote they may provide.  Great people.

name: JJ Parsons
text: Their Tech Jeremy called me and stated they would be earlier than anticipated. Once they got here we had a brief discussion , they asked some great questions and then got to work. Found they didnt have the part the needed but went and picked it up and were back within  a few minutes. Completed the job, checked the system again to ensure it was  working correctly and then departed. I hope AHS continues to assign them our job requests when we need them!

name: Margaret Lamb
text: Carlos was friendly, competent and professional!

name: Michael Chunn
text: Extremely professional and explained everything he was doing.

name: Scott B
text:
The worst company I have ever dealt with. I've spent a total of six weeks without AC since May, after seven visits from this company. It's literally 91 degrees in my house right now.

First AC issue: smelled a burning smell so we turned off the AC, which caused it to start blowing warm air somehow. The tech came out, assessed that it was the blower motor. It took 11 days for the part to come in, then another five for them to come install it!

Second AC issue: after a week of it working, it stopped again. The same tech came out and said that our thermostat was now uncalibrated. This was on a Monday. He said that it's a common issue and he will be back out no later than Wednesday with a new one. Seven days go by, so I call to find out what in the heck. The customer service said that my issue was marked as "resolved" so there was no plan to come back out! I complained, and they came out four days later.

Third AC issue: it stopped working... again. Hurray, the same wonderful tech to the rescue! He said that now there was a crack in the coil and it was leaking freon. When asked why I've seen him so many times, he said that fixing one thing led to another thing breaking... Two weeks go by waiting to find out when they are going to bring a new coil, but they said they've decided to order a new unit instead.

Fourth AC issue: after three hours of installing the new unit, they inform me that this new unit has a different metering device that only blows a different kind of freon or something to that effect and that this issue should have been caught before they even came out.

My laptop has overheated and my dogs are not doing well. They said today that I need to call tomorrow at 7:30 AM to see if the part we need even came in.

Please, avoid AT ALL COSTS!!!!

resp.text: We can certainly understand your frustration with the process and see where there have been some opportunities on our side to resolve this more quickly. One thing we cannot control are part delays which kicked off the initial delay in getting the motor -- it had to be ordered from the manufacturer. This service event is not indicative of how we work. We are also required to work within the confines of the warranty contract -- if it's not broken they will not cover to fix it until it does break. And, it is very common when working on older units that once you start installing new parts, the next weakest part will fail because it can't handle the power of a brand new component. We're very glad we were able to resolve this situation and make your home comfortable again within a day of this review. It is never our intent for a service event to last this long, especially during the hottest part of the summer.

name: T Baker
text: Carlos was prompt, professional, polite, courteous and even arrived with his COVID mask on! He quickly identified what the problem was with our air conditioning system. Highly recommend Carlos for your air conditioning needs! Thank you for helping us stay cool on these hot humid summer days in Alabama!!

name: Justin Speakman
text: We put in a call when our AC went out and got service pretty much immediately. The staff is on time and polite. I appreciate how fast our service went and how well we were treated in the process.

name: Steven Walker
text: Carlos Chacon was very professional and courteous. If future problems arise will call on him again.".

text: They did an awesome job on my unit and were very proficient, polite, knowledgeable, and timely. I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Jeff Gilbert
text: Abriam had experience in replacement/repairs. He wasn't an off the street salesman. Past experience goes along way with me. His quote was fair, I got the best, a Trane, and Arthur installed the unit left the work area clean. I'll be calling Best Care when my next AC unit goes out.

text: Carlos did an excellent job! He had my A/C back up and running in no time ! Would definitely recommend Carlos and would use him in future jobs. Thank you Carlos!

It's been a month since I had AC in my home... Never ever use this company, he probably orders parts to re-sell to other customers 🙄? Scam artist!!🎨 👨‍🎨

resp.text: Mr. Roemer - I have spoken with Chad who will be calling the supply house when they open Monday morning to order the necessary part. Our employees are fully vetted and background checked and we're confident in his abilities and experience. We will notify the warranty contract holder when the part is ready for install.

There are not enough words to express how highly satisfied I am with his work and his awesomeness!!!!  I recommend him to everyone! Keep up the great work, Abriam!!!! :-) :-) :-):-) :-) :-)

name: Chris Harris
text: It took 17 days for them to resolve my issue. It took 3 days to send a technician out. Then 9 days to receive a part they told me would take 2 days then another 5 days to get a technician to come out and install a part. The technician that did the repair was great, but the company is terrible to deal with.

resp.text: Hi Chris. We're sorry we didn't meet your expectations. You placed your service request through your warranty company on a Saturday. We were able to schedule your initial visit for the following Tuesday, which is within guidelines for the warranty company. As far as the part delay goes, the supplier had to order it and we have no control over that. When we were notified that the part finally came in, we were again up against a weekend, which delayed service. Ideally, we would have liked to resolve this much more quickly but the part delay had a negative impact on that. We'd definitely like the opportunity to service you again.

name: Kelly Knight Allen
text: They were hired through my Home warranty, but I would definitely hire them myself. They were awesome. Had the problem fixed in under 45 minutes.

name: paulette ROCHA
text: Layne the technician was outstanding very attentive amazing problem solver I will use this company again and I will share with my friends what a great team this company has from Steve the manager to Layne  the technician what a superb job!!

text: Our hvac was making a weird noise. We had a home warranty, and they came out to fix it (I think our guy's name was Abriam). Within seconds, he knew the exact problem. He confirmed, ordered the part, and fixed it once the part came in. Both times, he came within the time frame that was told to us, and he was very friendly. I liked that in addition to giving you a time frame, they text you when the tech is actually on the way, and then you can "track" them to see how far away they are. Overall, I was really impressed. If we have a problem in the future, I would feel confident calling them again.

text: Best Care came out looked at my air conditioner and said that i needed a compressor. They scheduled a appointment from 8 to 12 and callef me at 1145 saying they were heading my way. I have heart problems,  serious sinus problems that affect my breathing and have developed heat rashes from all this extreme heat. This is not fair to customers to go throgh this

text: Very nice and pleasant experience.

name: S. Niecei Gayden
text: Worse service ever. Completely Destroyed my air conditioning system. 🤬🤬🤬

resp.text: Ms. Gayden -- we're sorry your experience did not meet your expectations. However, our technicians did as much as they could to get your 15-20-year-old unit up and running in accordance with the terms of your home warranty agreement. Additionally, we were made aware that you contracted another company to work on your unit prior to us being dispatched by the warranty company. That company rewired the unit incorrectly and once our technician was able to rectify the situation, we determined there was a leak in your evaporator coil. We have been authorized by your warranty company to change out the coil, however, you have not agreed to pay the charges that are not covered by the warranty.

name: Etha Stewart
text: Technician was nice and knowledgeable.

name: Prisca Ilo
text: He is fraudulent and will rip you off. Neither is he licensed for heating and air

name: Jason King
text: When I purchased my house 10 years ago the unit was already installed by absolute air. I did my research and called them for a service on the unit. Now that the unit is getting older I'm trying to milk every year I can out of it. The house was not cooling so I called them and they came out today ...unit is in good shape. They cleaned the coils and checked everything out. Come to find out one of the branch ducts had come aloose and cool air was going under the house ....this was fixed and it's getting cooler now as I type. We keep the house cold like 65 degrees during the hot summer months. We work outside and it's always nice to come home to a cool house. Thanks to the tech that came out he was awesome.

name: Tammy Mcclure
text: Absolute Air is always on time and does a great job!  They have fixed my AC’s in several locations and even installed new ones.  They have also installed a ductless unit in my house and a hot water heater.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Tammy, thanks for the kind words.  We love to help our customers.

name: Sandra Moon
text: I have used Chris and his team for years. His customer service is awesome!  This means quick service, reliable and professional. This is what you are looking for when you have a problem and it is 80 degrees outside! Happy customer!

name: Ashley Drum
text: I called early this morning and had Chris out by the afternoon! He repaired our unit in a matter of minutes and was kind and courteous throughout the whole process. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank You Ashley

name: Anne Riley
text: This is my second great experience with this company! The first time around, I asked them to give me a second opinion after being told I needed a whole new system by someone else. They told me I did not need a new system, and made a repair that cost maybe $100 instead of the thousands I would have spent otherwise. This time, one of their techs, Noah, was able to solve a strange problem I was having with my thermostat not reading correctly even though it was functioning fine, and the system was functioning fine—something no one else has been able to solve. (Let's just say it was actually an insulation issue, not an HVAC issue. But he still fixed it.) I'm thankful for their trustworthiness because that can be hard to find. Would absolutely recommend them to everyone I know.

resp.text: Anne, we are so glad we could help you out

name: Stephanie Reese
text: Noah and Caleb are very knowledgeable about mini-split systems and were able to repair my system ASAP. Very punctual and professional. Highly recommend Absolute Air!

name: STEPHEN ARCHER
text: The hot weather hit our units and we called Absolute Air because they have always treated us great.

resp.text: Thanks Stephen

name: Lisa Primanta
text:
Highly recommend!
Absolute Air came out, identified the issue and fixed our AC same day. Very knowledgeable and courteous.

name: ronnie chappell
text: Great job and we're very pleased.....

name: ralph doughton
text: Rapid response, knowledgeable technician, fair price.

name: karyn stalcup
text: Our 14 year old Trane AC died a week ago. After getting a quote from a well known 5⭐️ company in Birmingham, I had sticker shock at the replacement cost for a unit that was not near the quality of a Trane and a downgrade compared to my current specs. A friend recommended Chris Kelley at Absolute Air. What a lifesaver. He arrived within two hours after my call. He quoted me an American Standard (maker of Trane) that significantly upgraded my current seer rating and added a variable speed versus single stage unit. His price cremated the previous company’s quote with a superior product and upgrade. Unit was installed less than 48 hours later. Excellent service techs that were polite and so helpful. I don’t think I have ever been so impressed with an HVAC company. Thank you Chris.

name: Martha Williams
text: Great company to work with.  It was pouring rain but they still came when we needed them

name: James Green
text: Great company and very responsive

name: Bekah Vakil
text: They were absolutely the best company I have ever dealt with. Quick response, worked with me on billing, and very nice and professional.

name: MARILYN WHITLOCK
text: I have used this company since it started years ago.

name: Ben Watson
text: My ac unit started acting up over the weekend so I called Absolute Air Monday morning and they promptly sent out Mike, to inspect my system. He tried to repair the unit but it was 15yrs old and needing to be replaced. They quickly gave me an estimate for a replacement with great finance options. I chose to go the the Trane system and the next day Curtis and John Mark showed up to install. The entire staff was very friendly, courteous and respectful. I would highly recommend Absolute Air.

name: LaRita Smith
text: My experience with Absolute Air Inc. was FANTASTIC!!!! The level of professionalism, knowledge of hvac systems, being patient and friendly, and answering all questions I had made my experience with them wonderful. The team that put my system in was GREAT!!!! They got the job done efficiently and explained to me the process. That means a lot as a customer and I recommend anyone needing HVAC services to call ABSOLUTE AIR INC. The guys are great and the staff in the office is friendly and accommodating.

name: Tammie Day
text:
I was blessed to be referred to
Mr. Rich.  After my AC  stopped in the middle of a heat wave. He is very knowledgeable, professional,  and  able to get all repairs done in a timely manner. When your AC is out call on Absolute Air for all your repairs.

name: Shelia Morris
text: Excellent service!!!  I would recommend this company to anyone who wants quality work at fair prices.

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text:
Johnny Rich is a great guy - one of the nicest fellows you'll run across in the HVAC community in Birmingham. But he's not reliable.

He had already been to my house on a couple of calls over the last couple of years, and did a great job. Back in October, I left him a voice mail on his cell phone to check my HVAC unit. No reply.

A few days later I texted him, and got a return text he would get back to me later. I never heard from him.

His voice mail says call his office for immediate help. I then left a message with a woman who answered the phone, who i assume was his secretary. She said she would pass the message on to him and he would call to set up an appointment. I never heard from him. In my book, three strikes and you're out.

I have no idea why he didn't want the business. But even if I had been a new customer, if he didn't want the business, or was too busy and didn't have time, you would think he would have the professional courtesy to call and say he was too busy. Or call back and say something.

I called Norrell, who was recommended by some friends. They responded immediately and fixed the problem at a reasonable rate. I won't be calling Absolute Air again.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent service and on time.

name: Lee held
text: They are Aces!

name: Ci B
text:
Called and came out the same day.
Reasonable prices .  Would recommend

name: Mary George
text: Great workers

name: Marie Sweat
text: I called at 9:30 this morning to make an appointment and the tech was at my house by 10:30. The tech was professional and courteous and quickly solved the issue. He explained what he did and why and was done in less than 2 hours. The price was also reasonable. Overall, a great experience and will use them again!

name: Joshua Velasquez
text:
Great company! I would highly recommend them for any HVAC issues you may be having. They offer great pricing and honest work. They made a billing error on their work they did to our system. My wife and I didn’t notice and paid the bill. A day or two later we had this mailed to us with the error refunded.

I will definitely use them again in the future!

name: sheila yarbrough
text: Very professional. Super fast. Good prices!!! He is super nice and very efficient! I can not say good enough things about this company. I would recommend him for any of your heating and air needs.

name: Michael Albarram
text: Great service at a reasonable price and fast called in the morning he was there that afternoon

name: Amanda Lowe
text: Awesome job!! Very affordable and the guy is super nice!

name: Daniel Bradley
text: Great AC Technican!! Highly recommend!

name: Jason Garner
text: Mike came to our house quickly on a Saturday morning and solved our problem quickly and didn't try to convince us it was something worse than it was to get a more profitable house call will definitely use Harvest Heating and Air Conditioning for our HVAC needs.

name: lavena smith
text: Michael was awesome!!!! Found my problem in less than 10 minutes!!! Soooo happy with his performance!

name: Love Abrams
text: Good business

name: Mary McKinnon
text:
The entire staff has been helpful and professional! Thank you Gary, Carla and Katie for your information and guidance. Gary went out of his way to accommodate our crazy schedule. He is so knowledgeable.
Mason, Jaq and Clay arrived on time, they were professional and informative. The work was done in a timely manner, very neat and clean with attention to detail. When they were done, there was not a spec of anything left. Thank you for a job so well done!

name: Katie Willis
text: I have been using Total Comfort for about 3 years. They have always exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this company for your heating and air needs.

name: M Tyree Wilson
text: From the initial PHONE CALL TO THE FINAL "FIST BUMP" AFTER THE INSTALL....We knew we made the right decision going with this company...The rep we set up the appointment with....EXCELLENT...The guy(Gary) that came out to do the estimate....EXCELLENT and HONEST ....The guys who performed the Install....you guessed it EXCELLENT !!!!!!  My family and I are very pleased with everything that was presented and performed....couldn't  ask for better service...Total Comfort Heating and Air is the TOTAL PACKAGE of Honesty, Service, and Professionalism ....

name: C Mallory
text: This was my first time using this company, but it definitely will not be my last. I called on a Saturday when my furnace went out, which was actually beyond repair and had to be replaced. They were very polite and courteous and I am well pleased with my new furnace.

name: kristy templeton
text: Great place. Harry is the best

name: Sylvia N.
text: Total Comfort Heating and Air is an excellent company, fully committed in delivering the absolute best service to its customer base.  The HVAC technicians are highly knowledgeable and very professional.  They  efficiently get your home back to the right temperature at a reasonable cost.  Chelsea, in the office, schedules appointments with the lowest wait time.  Harry, the service manager, is responsive to individual customer's needs and intends to exceed their expectations.  Big hearts all around with these people!  I wish other companies were this sincere in pleasing the public.

name: Ambera Law
text:
Total Comfort Heating & Air, they came out Saturday my system had frozen-up, water was leaking into the room below. .I was told me what to do over the week-end, they said they would return on Monday.
They came that Monday morning and did everything they said I needed and extra work to get my system up and working in a timely manner.  Total Comfort Heatimg & Air is a great company.  They stand on you word Thank God for a company like theirs.

name: Mrs Johnson
text: I have to say that the one person I spoke with was very polite and professional. I called their office and Mrs. Danielle pick up with a very polite and professional voice. I have several questions and she didn’t hesitate to answer any of them. I could tell she was very busy as she did have to ask me to be put on hold a few times,( which wasn’t a problem)  but each time she came back she would always apologize and make sure she helped me in any way she could. With everything going on in our world this is someone you would enjoy talking too. This to me is how you would want your fore front of your business to be. I will have no problem recommending this company or recommending Danielle to anyone.

name: Taylor Stinson
text: Landon and Justin who did our install were awesome. Really professional and knowledgeable about what they were doing. Cleaned up their area after finishing.

name: Kekke Young
text: Brett was our technician. He was very knowledgeable and efficient. He answered all of our questions.

name: Kamren P
text: I would definitely recommend this company . I called on Sat morning around 5am & someone was able to come out around 9am I only had to pay $50 for them to come out , which was awesome considering that it's the weekend . Some other companies charge a much higher fee to come out on a Sat . My technician was Tyler . He was excellent! As a woman , he made me feel very comfortable. He explained the situation clearly and informed me of my options . I didn't feel pressured , swindled , or hustled like I have by a technician from another company . He was very honest . I will definitely call them in the future .

name: Alphonso Hicks
text: My system was installed in 2014 by TC. I wasn’t impressed with the old owners, and the way they did business. The new owners are great and the Technicians are so much better than what we’ve seen in the past. Eddie did the maintenance recently and did a great job. Found some issues from the initial install and took care of them at no cost to us. Really appreciate the new owners and staff.

name: Helen Nuelle
text: My air conditioning was not functioning and the company came in checked it out  and made recommendations to correct the problem. Our new system is efficient and it was installed quickly.

name: Earl Cambron
text: Great experience working with Fisher. Would highly recommend Fisher and Total Comfort!

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

name: Ethan Jones
text: Eddie came out to my parents place yesterday. I really appreciate the time he took taking care of their needs and he was very polite and professional. We had some less than happy experiences with this company before the new owners took over, but it looks like they have really turned things around for the better.

name: Scott Williams
text: Total Comfort came out this afternoon.  The technician was Harry. He was very polite and informative. We are getting a new furnace installed on Monday. I would highly recommend Total Comfort to anyone. Thank you so much!! Scott Williams

name: Anne Vicknair
text: After the last service my AC unit wasn’t cooling properly. Called TotalComfort and Eddie came out on a weekend and found the problem and easily corrected it at no charge. Not many companies will stand behind their work like that anymore. Really appreciate the kind and prompt service.

name: Sandra Reaves
text: Gary was very prompt, professional, and efficient.  We really appreciated his courtesy. He quickly got our air conditioner up and running.  In this hot weather, that makes him a super hero to us!!  Thank you so very much!

name: Jason Lane Garrison
text: If you’re looking for a company that’s reliable, professional and do honest work look no more.  I heard Total Comfort Heating was under new management so I was reluctant to call them but did they change my mind when I used them.  Quick to respond, professional and spent the time explaining what was going on with my unit. I’ll definitely use them again.

name: Danny Brown
text: My a/c was not operating correctly so I placed a call to One Source Heating and Cooling and asked for a service man to visit and find the problem.The ladies in the office were very nice and professional and arranged for him to come and access the situation. Sonny   ( the serviceman) arrived right on time and quickly found the problem and had me going in about 10 minutes. He was very professional as well and I certainly will be calling them again for all of my heating and cooling needs. They are the best company for their honesty, punctuality, dependability, professionalism and affordability. I'm so grateful to have them.

name: John Casada
text:
We have two HVAC systems. Total Comfort replaced our first system two years ago. Our second started acting up and we called Total Comfort again.
Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: I’ve dealt with Total Comfort many times from maintenance to repairs and I’ve always been satisfied by their service. Eddy has been out to help us before and always seems to go that extra length to take care of our needs. We really appreciate everyone.

name: FLYBY
text: Had tech arrive, a young and inexperienced boy, explained the issues with the units, the tech did visual inspection only, never hooked up gauges, stated system is working fine. I realized the system was not working, I called 4 times, no one returned my calls, was not allowed to speak to the Manager, Jody, and was told it would be additional charge to come back. Be careful.

name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran
text: Brett Shelton,  my service professional, was very nice and knowledgeable.I find they seem to care a lot about the customers.I would totally recommend them.

name: Holly Chapman
text: Thankful for the New Management for quickly repairing my unit. Professional, on time, and trust worthy. I would choose Total Comfort again and again and you should too!

name: Joe Randall
text: Cody was honest and efficient and took care of my problem. Will definitely call again.

name: Terry Payton
text: Glad they have new owners.  The new ones are terrific!   Took great care of us fast and very fair price.  Thanks again!

name: Stan Paschenko
text: Total Comfort has serviced my Hvac units for the past 3 years. I recommend this company because of their honesty and integrity. No pushy sales pitch.

name: Kelsey
text: I had an emergency call after coming home to an 86 degree house. There's technician was extremely friendly but no resolution was provided. Ther problem he said I had wasn't the problem at all. I missed an entire day of work to be told mid morning the next day noon one could come until afternoon. I could've gone to work in AC for the morning! Very disappointed in the level of service provided.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Just  had total comfort heating and air come to my home and they just installed this new thermostat I could not be more pleased with their work friendly service and the price was just right.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Christy Thomas
text: New owners and management are fantastic!  Good quality customer service!  Very pleased with the work and it was completed in a timely manner.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mike Gillespie
text: Very nice on the phone. Called to let us know the technician was on the way. Technician could not have been more helpful or professional with his explanations and wanting things to be done correctly! Would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Tracie Lewis
text: The tech was very courteous and professional. He and the company went above and beyond. Would highly recommend Total Comfort!

name: Jimmy Owen
text:
Setting the appointment was easy and the agent worked very well to set the appointment which was convenient for me.
The technician was great and explained everything very well.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Blakely Segroves
text: We were so impressed with the new owners!  Prompt and reliable service to repair my unit.  Would highly recommend them!

name: Kandy Kane
text:
Eddie was fantastic!!! Very professional and quick at fixing our problem.
We will only be using this company from now on! If you have any problems with your heating or air, definitely give Total Comfort a call!

name: Julian Kit
text: Called them out after our unit stopped working. The guy who came out only saw $$$, down played our system every chance he could. Said its to small for the house (our house is fairly small and it's always keep us plenty warm). Told us our system had rust which was causing the problem but got it working by taking a piece of wire and cleaning out the sensor. Took less than 2 min to get the system working but cost almost 100$ for next to no work. 18 point inspection is also a lie.

name: Linda Fomby
text: Tyler arrived in a timely manner and solved my problem. Very efficient.

name: Betty Gunter
text: Eddie was at our home yesterday and he’s such a sweetheart. We felt a little silly when he told us why our furnace wasn’t working but we’ll know what to look for next time. Thanks!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Joanne Walker
text: Great Service starting with the operator who took my request for a service call, to the technician who came. Thank you Sonny for being on time, courteous, polite and your very thorough checkup of our heat and air system.

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME! text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

text: My husband has been piecemealing our 30 yr old HVAC unit for 8 years and finally, the heat condenser rusted out, clogged up to the point carbon monoxide was present.  We shut the unit down and have been riding it out for a few weeks without heat or air not wanting to spend a lot of money going into 'Winter 2020' during a pandemic.  Now it is getting down into the 30's, so we made the calls...  The moment I contacted Polar Bear Services, Billy Weller, the owner responded.  I told him what was going on, what we needed and wanted from the type of unit to warranties. Mr Weller gave us a quote and offered several payment options.  We had other quotes to compare this to and Polar Bear was by far the most affordable for the exact same system. We chose Polar Bear and Mr Weller had his crew here the following morning to replace the entire system.  The technicians were on time, very polite, professional, know what they're doing AND they replaced the old single-wall pipes to double-wall getting us up to Code too.  I strongly recommend Billy Weller & Polar Bear Services... I give Polar Bear an A+!

name: Courtney Parrish
text: My fiancé and I just recently bought a house. We called Polar Bear services to come out to check our ac unit because of something to do with our inspection. They said everything was fine. A week later, the temperature in the house starts rising so we call them out to look at it again. First, they told us they’d be out in a few hours since no one was home at the time. They call my fiancé back a couple minutes later and say they are at the house waiting on us and he proceeds to tell the guy he told someone on the phone no one was there for at least another hour. The service guy got angry with us because of poor communication within the company. Then, the service guy proceeds to tell me it’s because the unit “might” be low on Freon. He never looked at the system in the basement, just outside so I don’t know how he got an accurate solution.  He charged us for the most expensive Freon (he only used 1 lb) and $99 for less than an hour of service. Needless to say, it was a complete waste of time and money because the problem was ongoing and we had another company come out a few days later. That company was able to tell us the problem right away which the other guy would have, maybe, known had he looked at the system in the basement. Needless to say, the Polar Bear services guy didn’t seem to know what he was doing but had no problem charging an unnecessary, large amount of money. We will not be using this company again.

resp.text: I am sorry that you were not happy with your experience with Polar Bear Services.  I reviewed your invoice and saw where the tech had added one pound of R22 to your system to achieve his pressures.  We were unaware of your dissatisfaction with our services and would like the opportunity to talk to you.  Thank you.

name: k Harris
text: $3850 + $79.99 wasted!!!!! Our AC stopped working and we were advised we need a coil and condensor replaced. The fee for that was $3850. A month later the ac went back to blowing hot air. We called for PB to come back out and the technician stated a part was loose and needed to be replaced from the first service job and we would not be charged. That fixed it for about another month or two. The next technician stated a frog short circuited the system and he removed it and the ac went back to blowing like it should for another couple weeks. Every visit after the alleged frog incident has been one excuse after the other. We're doing renovations and were told the filters needed to be changed more frequently and the house would cool down. We continued to change them weekly and still no luck. We called yet again to advise of the continuing problem only to be charged $79.99 for them to clean the coils and blame the filters. The AC still continued to blow hot air and then the attic began to leak. So ANOTHER call was made. The technician stated the coils were frozen and that the ac needed to be turned off and to change the filter again (at this point we're already changing it weekly and have completed the renovations). The house still didnt cool down and the ac was still leaking. Another call was made the same day (as a leaking attic is urgent and ruining the ceiling) the technician returned and said the coil was shooting out water (ya think!!!! That's why we called in the first place!) had they bothered to look and not blame it on the filter they would have discovered it on the first visit. So the technician fixes the leak and says give it time, the house will cool. Guess what, it's still not cooling!!! So we wait a week (we work and can't keep taking off for someone to come out) and call them back out. The technician now states the roof doesnt have enough vents  and the attic door is off centered and that is what's causing the house not to cool. He said he tweaked something and give it a minute and it will cool. He also states he was advised to charge for coming out. What is there to charge for? The house is still hot, the temperature is steady rising as I type, and the original problem has not been fixed. They're basically grasping  at straws at this point and have run out of probable excuses.  Be prepared to throw away $4000 plus dollars and live in heat if you use this company. Currently in search of another AC company.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience, we would appreciate if you could call us to discuss this and see if we could resolve your problems.

text: I am not getting paid to say this.  I am just a very satisfied customer.  No need to look any further.  Norrell is a great ac company. He explained to me that I have a drainage problem in my system and that it is what tripped the system.   He showed me where to go to ensure that it is draining properly (and where to put a shop vac if not) and offered to install a safety switch to prevent water back up.  I didn't take him up on that offer but he has not pressured us to get it.  Ever since he came the first time, we have specifically requested him.  He is always professional and since Covid hit, he has always followed all covid protocols.  He cleans up after himself which is nice and wears protective booties in the house to keep dirt out.  I have yet to see him cut corners.  I highly recommend Norrell and will continue to use them.

text: I'm writing this for my mother. She is elderly and feels taken advantage of. The cost of the new system was exorbitant and probably much bigger and more powerful than the house needs. They asked if they could also inspect our water heater while they were here.  They had no idea that our water heater was leaking and we were just waiting on the plumber to be able to come and replace it.  They offered us options to eradicate the issues they found, explaining each in full.  Logan installed a new water heater the same afternoon!  Our HVAC system   was serviced and we will have them service twice yearly from now on.  We all lead very busy lives and to have a company and its employees come when they said they would, do what they said they would, and charge what they said it would cost, all the while following the difficult "Covid" precautions such as wearing shoe guards and masks,  makes us very happy customers.  We would highly recommend this "5 star" company to anyone.

resp.text: Vicki Parr - We are so glad you chose us for your maintenance call and look forward to continuing to be your trusted partner for any HVAC needs!

name: Carl Emmons
text: I recently signed up for this service (the two times a year HVAC servicing) and had my first scheduled service this morning. I was told the technician would arrive between 8-10. I received a call at 8:02 AM stating he was on his way. KD arrived, wore a mask, put on boot covers to protect the rugs/floor, and got straight to work. Honestly I wanted to watch him work but I didn't want to come across as nosy or rude. KD was very receptive to me standing in the room watching him service the HVAC. Not only that, but KD actually talked me through the entire HVAC system, process by process, and showed me what he looks for and tests. I'm sure most people wouldn't care to learn about the system, but I was curious and he was so friendly and accommodating. I believe he went above and beyond because even though this was a pre-paid visit for a simple tune-up/preventative service, he went back out to his van and got the metal tape stuff and came back in to re-seal some of the spots that he could feel hot air leaking through. I bet I had the same fear most consumers have - I was waiting to hear how my machine (which has worked perfectly for me since I moved in a year ago) was somehow in need of hundreds or thousands of dollars in repairs. The fact that he (a) didn't charge a dollar, (b) didn't recommend that I spend any money on anything, (c) spent the time to run me through his entire process, (d) and then used his company's tape to fix some gaps in my ducts without charge... I couldn't be happier with the service I received. Any concerns I had about "another monthly expense" ($12/mo) are now out the window. I'll be requesting that KD do our HVAC service work exclusively moving forward. Thanks Norrell and thanks KD!

resp.text: Carl Emmons, thank you very much for the wonderful review! We appreciate your business and we're so happy you're pleased with the work we did!

name: Dan Stockdill
text:
Follow up,

I want to thank Jeff for his quick response to my concerns, he immediately addressed the issue listed and it was a simple fix. I have always trusted Norrell and I know things will happen but, it's how you respond to it that really matters.

I have been using Norrell for over 4 years, Thanks you Jeff!
....
Service date was May 7th, 2021. I want to say Norrell Service Experts was doing a good job up to this point. Last service tune up was terrible, technician left the cover to the attic unit half closed, stripped out the fasteners due to over tightening. Cool air was blowing out the side of the unit, because the door wasn't sealed correctly.  Also he left the insulation tape off Freon pipe hole into the unit (6X2 inch hole). My attic was cooler than the house itself.

Why tune it up if you cant put everything back the way it was before you started, didn't save me anything!

Seems like the two technicians were really only interested in selling me on the "Advantage Free Plan" or a new Water Heater then doing what I was paying them to do.

Also if I look at their Home Health Service Report (yellow copy), 90% of the report is checked good, 10% is checked fair.

Emergency technician that came out after I realized the AC wasn't working correctly stated half my Freon is gone (4LB) $800. Hmm??

Still waiting on a call from manager!

Thanks Norrell!

Previous Review..............................
Norrell has serviced my unit since I moved into my new home. Always professional and they take the time to explain your systems health, along with showing pictures. Micah was on time and I was glad he took the time to point out an issue that could have caused my energy bill to go up.

Also, we love the UV air filtration system installed this year.

Thanks Norrell.

resp.text: Dan Stockdill, thank you so much for the updated positive review!  We're glad we were able to turn your experience around and look forward to our continued relationship.

name: Sagar Beeravelly
text: I hired Norrell Service Experts based on Google reviews to do the regular maintenance of HVAC Unit and I totally regret it.  The unit that has been working just fine all season long was fully break down the same day after their technician did the maintenance job. The fre-on leaked from the unit, A\C unit ran without fre-on resulted in compressor breakdown.  Here is how its started. After finishing the maintenance job, the technician said that the unit is old, it could go on just for a day or week or an year. He advised to replaced the unit. That was a red flag. The other technician who came over to evaluate AC performance gave a couple of options to replace the unit with estimates around 6k to 10k.  A few hours after the left, the unit was break down for the first time,  I followed up with Norrell Experts and raised my concerns the next day after I had the unit looked at by another technician to diagnose the problem. Norrell Service Experts had sent a senior technician who temporarily fixed the issue and said the problem was with a wire the connects the compressor and capacitor that burned out. That doesn't explain the warm-air blowing out of the A\C vent after the first technician did the maintenance job. After the follow-up call, The unit ran for a couple of days and stopped working again. I looking into exercising my options but I suggest you not to take the chance with Norrell Service expers. They are not dependable. I wouldn't trust them.

resp.text: Sagar Beeravelly, we sincerely apologize if you feel that we have not provided the best service possible. Please contact us at CustomerService@ServiceExperts.com with the full name on the account, your address, and a phone number where we can reach you. We would like to work with you to resolve any issues.

name: Sharon Weinman
text:
Chris came out and did service maintenance on both of our units.  Besides being very pleased with the job he did, I have to commend him on his professionalism.  He wanted to change the batteries on the thermostat upstairs and asked if I had any AA batteries.  We keep the extra batteries in the basement.  I told him to stay where he was and I would go get them.  Rather than do what I asked of him, he followed me down the steps, waited until I got the batteries, and followed me back up before going upstairs to replace the batteries.  I have to commend this young man as I did not know him and he did not want to be left alone in my home.  I appreciated his thoughtfulness in this day and time.....I did not know him and it appeared that he did not want me to question whether he would take something that did not belong to him.  Kudos to Chris.

Today, a different young man, Jeremy, came to replace one of our thermostats.  I was impressed with his professionalism also.  He took the time to explain what he was doing as well as showing us some of the features on the thermostat.   Jeremy is a very personable young man.  Kudos to Jeremy!

resp.text: Sharon, thanks for your praise and kind comments about our team!

name: Alan Dean
text: My wife and I met John Jones, Sales Consultant, and Jessie Clark, Service Technician today April 29, 2019.  We needed our HVAC units tuned up and checked thoroughly.  Jessie remained with us to do the work, and we could not be more pleased, both with the quality of his work and explanation of what he did.  This is the first time we have received what we would consider excellent service on our units.  Jessie also cleaned them spotlessly.  He made sure that the circuit boards were in good shape, that the condensate system was cleaned and working properly, and the temperature differentials of intake and cooling air were adequate.  Jessie patiently answered our numerous questions and could not have been more gracious.  Our sincere thank you to him and Norrell.

resp.text: Alan, we are so happy to read such a great review about Norrell Service Experts!

text: I don't know how these guys managed to get so many five star reviews because my experience with them was anything but five stars. These guys don't do what they say they are going to do, they don't meet deadlines, they don't follow through, they don't show up on time and when they are confronted about it they lie, make excuses and take zero responsibility. We decided to give them a chance because of all the 5 star reviews but we have since regretted it. I am advising anyone who is considering doing business with them to reconsider because the reviews are extremely misleading!

name: Omar Sims
text: Jessie Clark came out to have a look at my mini-split that was not properly cooling. Jessie was the ideal service technician. He was polite, knowledgeable, thorough, not rushed or in a hurry, and kept me in the loop on everything that he was doing. Throughout his diagnositic process, he gave detailed explanation of what was going on with the unit in a way that was easy to follow and understand. This was my first time using Norrell Heating and Air and I am always nervous about using a different hearing and air company for the first time. My service experience with Jessie was outstanding. He immediately earned my trust and I will certainly use Norrell for future heating and air needs, and will ask for Jessie Clark. As well, he took the time to explain and to go over the details of the bill. I very much appreciated thoroughness and willingness to make sure that the cooling issue was fixed.

resp.text: Omar, it is great to know you had a positive experience with Jessie! We are so glad you chose us for your maintenance call and look forward to continuing to be your trusted partner for any HVAC needs! Thank you!

name: Jim Baker
text: I've been a Norrell customer for more than 30 years. Outstanding service. Recently purchased my second H/AC from Norrell. Decided to purchase a high efficiency unit and very pleased with it. It not only does a great of cooling, but equally well with heating. Used the furnace for the first time on Thursday and noticed an odor. Called them yesterday and they sent out a service technician, Jason Threadgill to check it. He was very through with the inspection. Jason explained the heat exchangers are coated with a oil at the factory and sometimes when first used will produce a slight odor, which will be gone. I was very impressed with Jason's service and willingness to answer all my questions. Great job.

text: I usually don't complete service provider reviews, but am making an exception because I was so impressed with my recent AC service by Chris McKown.  Based on another AC company's diagnosis, I expected a bill of over $1,000 to replace a part the other company diagnosed as bad.  Chris scoped out the problem, carefully explaining everything he did, and was able to return my system to A-1 condition without replacing the part.  I believe that Chris' many years of training and experience allowed him to properly scope out and repair a problem whereas the other company's young and less experienced techs were more interested in selling a "replace" versus a "repair."  Because of Chris, I entered into an annual maintenance agreement with Norrell and will be asking for him when I schedule future services!

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text:
We had four HVAC companies come to our house in Bluff Park to figure out why our heat pump didn't work. One was a big advertiser in the Birmingham media market, and they just wanted to sell me a new $15,000 unit. A smaller company wanted to basically do the same, although they came in at $11,000. Two one-man HVAC guys were nice, and didn't want to sell me new units;  but after several attempts, they couldn't find out what was wrong.

Then I called Norrell. Technician Jeremy Stiles patiently listened to my long boring history of our heat pump and how it had worked off and on. He asked questions. Then he started investigating. After almost two hours poking around both my inside and outside units, he discovered a terribly clogged dysfunctional coil was the problem.

Instead of charging me $15,000 for a new unit, Norrell charged less than $1,000 and Jeremy took the better part of a day to unclog and restore both the inoperable coil (which kept the heat pump from turning on) and the dirty coils on the outside unit.

He not only found the problem and fixed it, he explained what he did in detailed layman's terms I could understand.

From my experience, if you don't call Norrell for heating and air conditioning issues, you're wasting your time and your money.

resp.text: Gilbert, your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it!

name: Laurence Street
text:
Norrell is a very good company. We have been serviced by them at our current location since 2003 and at our other house longer. They came and did our semiannual check and maintenance. The Service Technician was Brian Wiggins. We had had him before and we will request him in the future. He is a very knowledgable and competent worker. He took pictures to show us various things. We applaud the company for hiring men like. We had other techs in the past and would recommend any of them.
We definitely recommend Norrell Service Experts!

name: Thomas Mitchell
text: My service tech was Jessie Clark. He could not have been more personable and polite. He was unable to complete repairs the first day due to having to order a part, but was prompt in returning and completing the job. He spoke with and treated my mother like he knew her personally and not just a customer. He also was great with my two dogs who can be quite difficult with strangers. My chihuahua isn't aggressive, but can be really grumpy with new people, but Jessie was so good around him, he actually allowed your tech to pet him. I think very highly of my two dogs, and when someone treats them as though they were their own dog, I hold that in high regard. I don't know if these reviews will reflect on his work records, but he deserves recognition for both his work and the way he conducted himself around my mother and my two dogs.

resp.text: Thomas, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with Jessie!

He returned to his office to obtain some needed parts and then had our compressor torn apart and then fixed in a manner of hours.  He also replaced a part in the furnace that was about to fail.   The house has remained cool ever since!  We were really impressed with the professionalism of this company and the tech they sent us to repair our system.

name: Karen Edwards
text:
I had a faulty HVAC unit less than 2 years old. After several parts had to be replaced, I escalated to the supervisor Jeff. He personally came out and rechecked the unit. The next week, more cooling issues. General Manager Terry Henry, then came out and checked the entire system, under house, checked temps, etc. Found out the unit was, indeed, not putting out up to specs and was the wrong tonage. He went to bat for me and I now have a 3 ton, NEW HVAC system, with no charge!!! Shawn installed it yesterday, worked hard all day. I did pay for new duct work to be installed and sealed, since mine was very old and cooling my crawl space!!  They "did the right thing" by me, and I am very appreciative.  I have been a loyal 10+ year customer with Norrell and highly recommen

Karen Edwards
