name: Caryl Green
text:
March 16, 2016
Have used Service Experts for several years to maintain my A/C unit and they have always done a fine job.  Yesterday I needed a quick service call.  I was hearing sounds from my unit that spelled trouble I was sure.  The man taking my call scheduled me that afternoon, much to my relief.  What impressed me was his professionalism but with a personal touch, not the "call center" feel.  I later learned this was Jeff.

My tech, Luiz, showed up on time and, with some clever detective work, diagnosed the mysterious sound and took care of it.  He was professional, polite, explained everything to me, couldn't ask for better.

This is the first review I've written but I wanted to express my appreciation for such great service from both Jeff and Luiz

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We appreciate your business and are thrilled you were pleased with the work and service Jeff and Luiz provided. We look forward to working with you!

name: Melinda watts
text:
Please read my review about JEESE CLARK that is attached to this one below!                 Matt Chapman was great at my home today. Very nice young man with lots of manners. I would recommend him for everyone. Great tech!
This is my second review for the month due to having issues with my new unit! This technician JEESE CLARK came to service my unit on December17 or 18 th. I was completely without any heat. It was approximately forty degrees and it was cold! Anyways JEESE was sent out and he told me mycircuit board was damaged and they would have to order the part and it would take two days. I have several health issues and to leave home would be impossible. JEESEKnew I had already spent one nigh in the cold without any heat so he was determined not to have me in the cold again. HE completely re figured another board to another u it and spent all day to get it to work and by six I had heat!! There is not another service man who would have done this. Most would have said well good luck and see you when the part comes in two days later! But notJEESEhe found a way for me to have heat! He is one fine service man! Norrell is very lucky to have him! Jeff his boss should do something nice for him because he went far beyond what others would not have done! Thank you JEESE CLARK you are one excellent service man I wasn't sure Iwould have gone with Norrell next time if they hadn't of done something! THis is my third unit with them and I will request Jesse from here on out to service my unit!

resp.text: Thank you for this review! We are happy to hear you were satisfied with the work and service Matt provided and we look forward to continue working with you.

text: The motor recently went out on my A/C unit and Jason Threadgill came out and worked for several hours to replace it. It was late Fri evening when he let, but he made sure we had working air for the weekend.

name: Joel Epperson
text: Norrell Service Experts sent installers out to our house on New Years Eve and they worked most of the day installing a new Lennox hvac system.  Our old system had failed on December 30th. We had the sales person at the house the day before New Years Eve to give us a quote on multiple units.  Like I mentioned, the Installers were out the next day on New Years Eve. From beginning to end we had a good experience with the salesman, the technicians and the support personnel.  To say the least we were greatly relieved to have warm air on New Years Day.  We sure enjoyed the football games. The system is very quiet, heats the house quickly and we love the Wi-Fi graphical thermostat. There is an app for our cell phones so we can remotely manage our system. Great Service.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review! We truly appreciate your business and are glad we could get your home warm and comfortable before game day. We look forward to continue working with you!

text: My ac unit stopped working Sunday afternoon.  I called them Monday morning had some over by lunch time. It's very hard to find good dependable companies that have good dependable employees.  This company gets an A+ from this (very hard to please) homeowner! And I like doing business with a local company!!

text: Bradbury Hvac has been a wonderful company to work with. So thorough in every way. They for sure get five stars..plus in our book!!!! name: Mary Catherine Barnes Sutphin
text:
I can not say enough wonderful things about this company, from the scheduling desk to the service crew, they are all amazing! I would like to give a special “thank you” to the three men that came to our home in the past two days, John, Brody, & Steve. All three men delivered top quality customer service, while also allowing me, as a stay at home mom, a sense of trust and comfort that the service being provided to us was one we needn’t question. These gentlemen were very thorough with their original diagnostic visit, and also very kind to answer all of my questions. I have hired companies, prior to Bradberry , to repair our HVAC unit, and many a time I have been left feeling “swindled” or ignored. (I.E. rather discuss the business at hand with my husband). We’ve had multiple companies, even just send out a salesperson, instead of looking at all possible cost saving options for our family’s financial situation. I have been disheartened by other companies, to say the least...

That’s why I am so honored to write a five star review for the company of, Bradberry. They have gone above and beyond meeting my expectations. For years our family has “band aided” our AC unit, we knew it would be in the near future to get a new unit, however, Bradberry, and their service workers, still gave us multiple different options to consider.

After much deliberation, my husband and I did decide to replace the HVAC UNIT. All diagnostics, financing, and installation were done in 24hrs. (Keep in mind this is also at the end of May, in Alabama, when the heat is unbearable). These gentlemen had a kind smile on their faces the whole time, while also giving clear and concise details on what to expect going forward.

Like I said, I cannot say enough wonderful things about the customer service and products that Bradberry delivered to our family.
Thank you to the three gentlemen and the company of Bradberry for exceeding my expectations. I am truly thankful, and so much more comfortable!

-Mary Sutphin

resp.text: Thanks for your business Mary Catherine!! We are glad your experience was nothing short of great. Please spread the word in your area and we will take care of anyone you send our way.

text: From start to finish (which was very speedy) I was impressed and pleased with Bradberry. The installation crew arrived the next morning, and thanks to them, I arrived to a wonderful cool home after a long day at work. And did I mention honest? After inadvertently overpaying, I was contacted by Tuesday in the business office, who informed me I would be receiving a refund check. These folks are first-rate, through all phases of the job…I couldn’t be happier. Thanks, Bradberry!

He returned with a new special-order replacement part within two days, and the entire HVAC system has been running smoothly ever since. I highly recommend Bradberry, and I'm now a loyal customer!

name: Rose Cavender
text:
** HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! **
have recently purchased my first home and my gas hot water heater had been going out. They replaced the hot water heater, but I still didn’t have hot water in the showers. I called the emergency phone number and told them my issue, the woman was incredibly nice and someone had returned my phone call within 30 minutes and was on my way to fix the issue at 8:30pm. Unfortunately, the next day after the fix, I still didn’t have hot water (it wasn’t staying warm long enough for a shower) and I called the emergency number again (it was 9:30pm). Same woman answered, again, incredibly nice. Within the hour, someone had reached my cell number and was scheduling an appt for the next day to resolve the issue (they would’ve come that night but I had to be at work so I told them to wait until the next day).
Long story short, it had nothing to do with the hot water heater, but the fixtures in the shower had recently been replaced prior to the inspection on my house. So the service man, Robert, changed the settings in both shower fixtures to allow more hot water to come out.
Great service, quick reply time and great all around!
HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

resp.text: Rose, thanks for choosing us for your new home needs. We value our customers feedback, and appreciate you taking the time to post a review.

name: Rob Kizer
text:
In fairness to the reader and the company my experience was as followed:
My old unit went out, I had just moved into this home about 6 months beforehand. Seeing the service number on the unit I called them just because they had serviced the unit before. They came out and were straight shooters after evaluating the unit that day, and determined it had to be replaced. After taking the time I needed to make a decision on the unit they promptly scheduled a service date and installed the unit.
I had an extremely high power bill the following month, and to their credit the technician came out on a Saturday in the middle of potential severe weather and identified and hopefully resolved the issue that caused my power bill to be so high. I give these guys the benefit of the doubt, and chalk it up to an anomaly. I don't expect to see a bill for the correction, and I DO recommend their service in the future because they strike me as good, hard working, and honest people.

resp.text: Rob, I’m aware of the issue with your old existing thermostat wiring in the wall, and I apologize for the issue. I appreciate your fair review in this matter. Of course there is not a charge at all for the work we performed Saturday to correct your issue in pulling new thermostat wire. We appreciate your business and please let us know if there is anything else we can do in the future!

name: Bryan & Karla Morrow
text: Arrow Air System will be the only company I call from now on. From the owner, Randall, to the tech who came out tonight, Derrick, everyone has been caring, professional, courteous, and above all else willing to explain things vs just trying to “sell” something. I’ve already recommended Arrow Air to others and will continue to do so. If I’m able to, I’ll ask for Derrick every time. A+ for Derrick, Randall and the whole Arrow Air Team! Kudos!

name: George Shamblin
text: Our parents had a reason for telling us 1st impressions matter, that we should take pride in who we are, and the family or organization whom we represent. BY no means am I suggesting Randall has his techs were 3-piece suits, but to possibly re-consider what Arrow presents when 1st arriving at the door. Unreal. Not to mention it would have been kinda cool if 1 of the 4 times they came out to lead with "Hello. I'm so and so with Arrow and heard you had a problem I'm here to fix." As opposed to the 4 for 4 "I have to collect $100 before I come in."  Look at this pic of coils Arrow charged us to "clean." Suffice it to say you'll have no luck finding a negative review from me anywhere, and I write them all the time. This is the worst company I've ever dealt with, and I'm just getting started.

name: Paige Cooper
text: Randall Booth and his employees were Phenomenal! Technicians arrived about 15 minutes before the scheduled appointment time, Very Professional & knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend Arrow Air Systems, LLC. for all HVAC needs. Thank you Randall for such GREAT Service.

name: Thomas Hession
text: Derrick came out to install a thermostat very professional and thorough. We have had this company out before threw out home warranty and they always deliver. Derrick took the time to explaining everything he did and was very responsive to our questions.

name: Felicia Yonter
text: Thank you Cole and Arrow for promptly coming out to fix my broken a/c. Service was quick and I hope to never need it again, but if I do, I will call Arrow.

name: Jonathan parton
text: Unbelievable Customer Service.  I called on Thanksgiving Day, YES Thanksgiving Day.  I was expecting to leave a message.  But to my utter surprise one of the owners answered the phone in the middle of cooking Thanksgiving dinner she put her husband on the phone and I explained that my AC System was having issue.  I was expecting him to say call back Friday.  He didn't, he actually asked me where I lived, he was going to come to my house and look at my system if I was close, however I was over 100 miles away.  But on Thanksgiving he was about to come.  They were booked up till Monday but said he would see if he could do something for me the next day. Well a little after noon there was a professional, knowledgeable and very friendly repairman at my house working on my system.  He got it up and running and order the parts to fix it.  If there's another company that has the level of customer service I've never found them.  I WILL NOT USE ANOTHER SERVICE BESIDE ARROW AIR SYSTEMS,. and you shouldn't either.   Thank you guys for all you do.  Happy Holidays!!!!

name: charlene matthews
text: Randall was great he explained everything that was going wrong with my system. Hunter was Awesome as well great customer service. I will HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

name: Sebastian Bivins
text:
Thanks Randall for sending your son Hunter to my rescue when my unit was not cooling and getting my bonus room where we can now sit upstairs and enjoy every inch of our home.

Oh yeah, and to beat other companies by over a $1000 wasn’t so bad either and I have given several referrals to several people in my neighborhood.

name: Kat Owens
text: Our home warranty company sent these guys out. They detected issues with the AC unit we were having issues with. The owner, Randall, called and went over the issues and the solutions. He really wanted to know what the other AC companies had diagnosed. I said that was up to the warranty company if they wanted to share that info. But that it sounded like he had detected issues and said he would send his diagnosis to the warranty company. So the very next morning I get an email that a new contractor had been dispatched. I called the warranty company to see what was going on because we already had a contractor assigned. They told me Randall told them to write up a diagnosis to replace the system or we would sue them and the warranty company. WHAT?!? Apparently there is something with the warranty company that if a new company is assigned to the work order and they detect issues not detected by the previous company assigned, they new company can be reprimanded. Instead of being honest with the repairs that needed completed so we could get our AC fixed and stop living in 80 temps inside our house, he made up a LIE saying we would sue everyone. I DO NOT recommend working with these people at all. .

name: nancy saxo n
text: Our home warranty sent this company out to repair our air conditioner. We made the owner, Randy, aware that we were currently sick with Covid-19.  They were very professional and took all safety precautions necessary including not coming into our home. We had cold air within an hour.  Highly recommend Randy and his team!!!

name: Natalie George
text: Was assigned to Arrow by home warranty, I called the next day and they sent someone out the following day. Showed up on time, fixed the issue, they were professional and followed covid safety protocols. Have had issues with other HVAC companies in the past that warranty assigned so was definitely pleased with this encounter!

name: John Bell
text: Arrow installed a new heat pump and coil in my house in December 2019.  During a maintenance call in July 2020 the tech found that the coil was bad.  It was explained to me that coil was still under warranty.  I spoke to the office and they told me it would be 2 weeks to get the coil.  I explained to them that I was selling the house in less than two weeks and would need to have this done before the close.  She said that she would call me back.  To be honest I didn't think much would happen.  To my surprise when Arrow returned my call that same day told me they could have the coil installed that coming Monday.  I have never had a company come through for me like that.  Needless to say the coil has been installed at no cost  in plenty of time for my closing.  I also received a followup call from the owner of the company to make sure the job was done and I was satisfied.  I was not only satisfied I was ecstatic!!  I would recommend Arrow to anyone looking for HVAC work.  As for me I will always be an Arrow customer.

name: Tonya Hunter
text: The service was professional and they went above and beyond to fit us in the schedule. They were responsive and made sure we understood the entire process every step of the way. The owner even reached out to make sure we were satisfied with our service.

name: Chris
text: American Home Shield sent this company out and I am forever grateful for that. Arrow Air Systems does incredible work. From the office staff, the tech, and the owner, every one was friendly, informative, and excellent at their job. Randall went ABOVE and BEYOND what was asked - he even went as far as to cover a fee for us that the warranty company would not. We will never use another HVAC group again. They have our business for life and we are letting all our friends and family know to give them a call whenever they need honest, quality, and affordable work. Thanks again to the entire staff at Arrow Air for making our experience great.

name: james m
text: When our 22 year old AC broke, arrow provided a couple of options which included patching or replacing.  They really worked with us to get a price we could afford for a new unit.  Every step of the way, they were very professional and attentive and honest.  The owner gave us his personal cell to call if any issues which we really appreciated.  We would definitely recommend this company to others.

name: amanda r
text: Absolutely the best! Very polite and did everything to get our air running! They are truly awesome. What i liked most was the honesty!

name: Daniel Engle
text: I do not recommend this company. I made a complaint due to a tech having to come out to "fix" an issue somewhere in the realm of 7 times. They called before they came out the last time and said basically because we complained they aren't fixing our air. We have a 2 year old and 3 month old. When I spoke to Randall, he basically said F off, in more words, and that we shouldn't complain about how they do business. Our unit is still broken and they still have trash waiting for them that they left the first 7 times they came that I will soon be mailing to them

name: Christy Harris
text: My experience with this company is below any means of any standard that you would suggest for a company that claims to be professional. First of all, they sent out this young guy but I feel did not know what he was doing. He kept snapping pictures and calling other people to assist him with my situation. My problem was merely outside and to be honest I had already told him what the problem was before he even started. The problem was my compressor. He changed out all these different things that had nothing to do with the fan and after an hour and 30 minutes he then comes to me as if he was defeated and told me that's a problem with my compressor. I told him that's what I told you at the beginning of the service call, but that's neither here nor there. So he continues to tell me that they do not carry the compressor that I have for my unit and that it would need to be ordered and it will take an a week for it to be ordered so I complied and thank him for his time after paying him the service fee. Fast forward 4 days I decided to call the company just to double-check and see if the part has by any chance already come in and to my surprise the operator their stated that my claim was actually denied from my home warranty company because the technician stated that my compressor going bad in an 11 year old air conditioning unit was not normal wear and tear and that I be customer could have prevented it from actually happening so in that case the warranty company denied my claim which was total home protection. I would not suggest this company be used because it seems as if the technicians they're clearly need a little bit more training they do not know what they're doing and what it seems like there is also doing is coming out diagnosing the situation and going back and telling the actual company that that hired them that this was something that was not considered normal wear and tear so the company would not be obligated to fix your units or your equipment and still charge you the service fee that is not a refundable this whole entire thing to me is just a complete rip-off and I do not suggest that they be used

name: Rebecca Smith
text: This company was dispatched to my clients house and I must say, they’re absolutely rude. They offer no explanation of any repairs, couldn’t/wouldn’t  answer questions, just said “we’ll be back to fix it,” that was Monday. They’re coming back Thursday. Mercy, what has happened to good service???

name: Nats Wesley
text: John gave me a quote for 2 new Heat and cooling systems on Thursday. Two days later a woman called Karen who claimed she was John's boss, answered the phone, was very uncouth and said said they could no longer give me the units for the price John quoted. I was shocked and asked how prices could change in couple days and she was very rude and didnt allow me to speak and kept saying 'have a good day.' Even if I get a good price from them, I will never ever use them if they dont know how to handle a new customer.

name: Kendal Perry
text: Was very pleased with Arrow Air. When my technician was unable to come to our appointment, the manager, John, came instead. Karen in the office apologized and they handled the situation immediately and professionally. Our home warranty company found arrow air for us and I’m so thankful they did! Thank you John & staff for taking great care of your customers!!

name: Mike Mehlhoff
text: I can t say enough about how pleased I am with the service that was provided. Arrow Air Systems replaced two aging units that were beyond being repaired and needed to be replaced to adequately cool my home. Within a few hours of call for service they were at the house installing the new units. Fast, professional, and courteous! I recommend using them for all HVAC needs. Thanks guys!

name: ben scott
text: If I could give less than one star , I would. I sat in my house in August heat for over a week waiting on these nice people to get a set of screws to fix my a/c. Manager would not call me back and his cell phone is not even set up to take voice mails. That should tell you all you need to know. Run from this one, just run, fast.

name: Billy
text: There was a slight hiccup with the initial  repair but they were quick to fix it and didn't put the burden on us. As a small business owner, and as a homeowner, that's very important in these trying times. My wife is 9 months pregnant so she was very concerned about the second tech not wearing PPE but he might not have had any as it is hard to come by these days. We just wiped down the doorknob and thermostat with a Clorox wipe and he did a great job.

name: sheri sheffield
text: Randall, his son, Hunter, and his entire crew just installed a new system in my home and I am very happy with the entire process.  They were able to get me on the schedule quickly after an electrical issue destroyed my old unit and were able to get a new unit installed within a few days.   He is honest and, as his logo says, straight as an arrow.  Please give Randall and Arrow Air Systems a call for any HVAC needs.  You will not be disappointed!!

name: Robin Nelson
text: I only found out about these guys from a warranty co, but glad I found them. Ended up using them even though I didn't go through the warranty co for final job. Randall (owner) called and updated me on parts he was waiting on just about every day. Made me feel like I was a priority, which was helpful because I was in the middle of a home sale. Explained everything he was doing and why. Most of the techs were friendly, some not so much, but they got the job done which is what matters. Would recommend.

name: Robin Massey
text: There were great installing my new unit inside and out.. Thank you too Arrow Air Systems.. If you need a good and honest company for your heating and air call them!!

name: Sandra Srygley
text: I want to thank everyone at Arrow air, they do an awesome job. Everyone is great from Karen who answers the phone, the tech who comes out to do the work, and the owner who always does what and when he says he will. I have found an amazing company, i will always call when I have a problem with my unit.

name: Steven Williamson
text: Arrow air installed a new HVAC system after our old system quite literally blew up. They were precise in their quote, professional in their service, and very personable. My tech Cole was interested in our satisfaction and, I felt, the integrity of their work.

name: Brian Newsom
text:
These guys are great.  I called Randall from a referral I got when my AC unit shut down.
He came to my house two hours later and identified the problem in ten minutes.  He said he would have someone out the next day (Saturday).
His technician Cole arrived at 9:00 Saturday morning and my air was back cooling by noon.
Never tried to up sale me or anything.  Honest, dependable and very polite people.
I will never use anyone else.  Thank you Arrrow!

name: Jenene turner
text: One of .the worse experience i have when dealing with a business.  I will live in my home with no AC  with 100 degree heat before dealing with this company. the worse thing was  i was talking to one of the owners (female).She was rude and really disrespectful when it was there negligence from the very beginning.

I can't say enough about these guys!
The office staff was very nice and sent a Tech out on their very next available day. (they even send text update notifications). The Tech/s were on time, extremely knowledgeable and very professionally mannered.
AAS LLC stands behind their work. They were steadfast with my service call until they got everything up and running. AC is now blowing nice and COLD.
Super happy with everything! Thank yall so much!

My air isn’t being fixed they keep saying the line keeps getting clogged but tell me how a the line gets clogged in two days! Everyone has been very nice but for some reason they can’t fix the problem

name: Sheila Gorman
text: They quoted me a $500.00 price for cleaning my evaporater coil.  Then they called me a week later and said it was gonna be $900.00 to clean it.  Mr. Dan's came out and cleaned it for $154.00 and it works great again.

name: James Rodgers
text: Randall was professional and thoughtful in his service of my client after the purchase of her first home. He does what is right, not just what is easiest, because the health and safety of the client comes first.

name: Norm Booth
text: AVOID!!!! they lie!! They will rip you off. The only reason one star is because I had too. Very unprofessional.

name: E Pickett
text: Awesome. Technician was knowledgeable and professional. Would definitely use the company again.

name: Carlos Hall
text: Called this company about my air being out on a Sunday and within the hour it was fixed. Great people and great customer service. If you need help call them ASAP!!!! Thanks Arrow Air

name: Angel Velasquez
text: Great company. The technician Hunter was on top of all of his work. Keep up the good work! Call and request for hunter.

name: Stephanie Shetron
text: If I could give a zero rating I would. All of the technicians to include Cole and Ty were very nice, professional, and knowledgeable. However, the owner Randall is very rude, does not follow through with his work, and lies about their intentions with repairs. I used American Home Shield and they sent this company to my home. The entire time they stated that my warranty company supplies junk and the owner continued to try and sell me his units. When my air handler was finally received after nearly a month without air conditioning, the service people came out to install and then told me it was the wrong part. I was fine with that and was very understanding as long as it would still be fixed sooner than later. However, after they left once again the owner and his wife told me that the part was correct but that they had additional work that would need to be done. Again, more money requested out of pocket and still no A/C. Randall, the owner stated he would complete all of the work within a week but instead the very next day after the install was supposed to occur they completely ditched the entire install. Randall then called my home warranty company and told them there was a confrontation (which absolutely never happened). In fact his two employees stood in my living room for 30 minutes talking about pets and their parents during high school life. I offered them water and even assisted them with unloading the air handler from its box in my driveway. There was absolutely no confrontations and at the end of the day it was because he didnt want to do the work. He wanted to sell me expensive equipment and wasted an entire month of mine. He didnt even have enough decency to call me before dropping the entire job completely. I found out when the new company called to schedule with me. The new company that American Home Shield is sending states they can fix it same week. Arrow Company and its owners are a joke. Do not use them as they are not reliable and are run by rude inconsiderate people that do not have a sense of urgency nor care about the way they treat you.

name: Ferhat Ferhatzen
text: Excellent and honest work! Randall, his son Hunter and their team provided the most professional service that you would wish. I did not now Arrow Air System before. I just filled an online request and several companies called. First, a technician, Cole, came from Arrow Air Systems. He provided all the information that I needed with absolute honesty. As a university professor, I was able to distinguish that the service I was receiving was very high quality. After showing me the exact problem and explaining me all the details, he provided me several options. Given that my outside unit and air-handler were 18 years old and I have been very tired with the patch work that was done by the American Home Shield HVAC firms, I was ready to move and replace both units.  I spoke with the owner Randall and he gave me a price for American Standards Unit. I told him to give me couple of days to do my homework and shop around. He encouraged me to do what is best for my family. Obviously he was very sure about competitiveness of his quote.  After shopping around I realized that Randall gave me the best quote. The level of honesty was phenomenal!  I had many experience with other HVAC companies. I can easily say that Arrow Air Systems is the best in Shelby county and Birmingham. Within couple of days Arrow Air came and performed an absolutely perfect replacement of my air-handler and outside unit. As a mechanical engineering student Hunter provided absolutely the best service. They replaced my upstairs unit within several hours. name: Nancy Owen
text: All I can say is Autumn Air was professional, trustworthy, economical and exceeded all my expectations. There is nothing more aggravating than to have your air conditioning unit quit. Although it is mid-October we needed our air conditioning fixed ASAP. Our unit was 17 years old and I knew we needed to replace it if not immediately, within the very near future. I emailed a few companies Saturday night asking for estimates and to please contact me Monday morning. Only Autumn Air and one other company returned my call today. Autumn Air was very pleasant and offered to have someone come out to price the unit immediately. Since I knew I did not want to start throwing money away repairing such an old unit I asked for a quote for a new unit (with and without the furnace). Skip came out and priced the unit with three options and it was clear if I wanted more options he would give them to me. He did not acted putout or frustrated with my request. He did not pressure me to make a decision nor did he push me to buy the most expensive product. Without me asking, he let me know the specials that were being offered. I asked how soon they could install the unit and he said either this afternoon or in the morning. I called my husband and sent him the estimates. My husband was impressed and even showed his fellow employees who were also impressed with the prices. After weighing the pros and cons we decided to replace the entire unit (with furnace). I called Skip back about 2:30 saying we did want to go ahead and replace the unit, he said he would call me right back, that it would be either this afternoon or in the morning. I was floored when he called me back shortly afterwards and asked if it was okay with me if they could install it today. Skip and two other gentlemen came and installed the unit working hard until close to 9:00 pm. We were all extremely grateful to the diligence of these men. In addition, Autumn Air included a 2-year service plan where they will come out to service/clean the unit twice a year. They have earned my trust. I am very thankful to Autumn Air.

resp.text: Thank you!!!!

name: Raymond Gerard
text: Well this guy trys telling us that we needed a WHOLE new unit when in actuality we need 1 part and to find where the freon is leaking. He says it's holding freon when I know for a FACT it's empty. He did not go into the crawl space of where part of the unit is located. This guy is trying to sell us something we don't need. Reason being,  our 18 yr.old son was the one home who doesn't know any better than to just let him in. Didn't talk to my wife or me about anything. Very unsatisfied with this company. We have 5 properties and while our normal ac guy was servicing our rentals(while we waited days for the first company you sent) looked at it and told us exactly what was wrong.... NOTHING MORE THAN REGULAR WEAR AND TEAR.

name: Tory Shannon
text: Very unprofessional. When asked if I could get number to Corporate office, I was told no the general manager and customer service rep handles all complaints. Customer service only reached out AFTER she seen the review I left on their website. Before the review no one called to apologize or even keep us updated on when our new unit would be in. All this could of been avoided if they would simply offered a simple SORRY. But no one wants to take ownership of their actions. Then Hannah in customer service asked me to stop yelling at her while I was having a conversation , with phone on speaker, haven’t disrespected her nothing and she stops me to tell me stop yelling. Instead of trying to understand the message I’m trying to get her to understand , she is asking me to lower my tune when it wasn’t in a disrespectful manner and I told her that several times.  It’s not like they are doing us a favor, WE ARE PAYING CUSTOMERS. I would not recommend. Spread the word

name: John Hosmer
text:
For a long while there have been atmosphere issues in our basement where the previous home owners had never taken care of sealing up the rooms and keeping temps and humidity in check. We had addressed those issues and we had tried using good filters at the returns to prevent as much of any dust, mold spores, etc. from recirculating and spreading, but it ended up being a losing battle for both comfort and our family's health.  Finally, about a month ago I disconnected one of the flexpipes at the end of the trunk run to see just how bad it was and found almost 100% coverage of dust, mold, and nastiness throughout the system. It was in every bit of the trunk, and every flexpipe throughout the house (See pictures). Even a few of the vent registers had started harboring mold growth which was a really bad sign as well.

So, I did what any good panicking homeowner would do at that point. Went to Google, pulled up nearby HVAC companies with good reviews that could do duct replacement, and called for appointments for onsite inspections. Out of the four highly reviewed and reputable companies (minus individual contractors) in the Pelham area that actually showed up for their appointment, Autumn Air's rep Baker was the only one who showed up on time, actually visually inspected inside the ductwork even after I showed him the initial pictures I took, and then spent a solid amount of time explaining to me options for replacing the entire ductwork system so we could see about what would be right for our budget. In the end, the price that Autumn Air was able to provide for an upgrade to a new round smooth metal interior and outside insulated wrapped system, including new boots and registers, throughout the entire house, plus a new central AprilAire Space Guard filtration and iWave-R GPS ionization system upgrade (per my request) beat out the one other company who actually sent me a quote by almost half. Let me say that again differently...TWO of the four companies NEVER sent back a quote. This told me that two of the highly reputable companies in the Pelham area that have a high amount of favorable reviews simply did not want a job. Pitiful for them.

Fast forward to the install a week later...Led by two guys named Javy and Charles, they took care of making sure everything was treated with care when taking out the old ductwork so as to minimize spreading of dirt and mold as much as could be. Then, they proceeded to assemble and install all of the new system on site for custom fitting plus making sure all seams were taped properly and coated with mastic so that the chances of air leaks past the coils is forever kept at a minimum. They arrived early in the morning, and worked until the job was finished that evening (on the day of Harvey storms coming through too!).  Any questions I had concerning anything with the job was answered and explained with no hesitation on their part.  They went beyond expectations with accommodations and I just can't be any happier.

I can't say it enough in this entire description here how great Autumn Air is for an HVAC company. They want someone's business in the best way because they give the work the best service they can at reasonable prices, and offer great financing options too if needed. They understand how to go the extra mile to make sure the customer is being taken care of in the end as well. I can say I have also had the pleasure of meeting Jeff, the owner, later when he came back to look at a minor issue that crept up post install, and he is just as awesome about discussing more than the "here's what we'll do". He takes the time to explain the why and how's (if you are interested to know and ask) and will work with you as a customer to do everything he can within reason to make sure you are satisfied with him and his company. Because of all of these things described about everyone at that company and how we were treated, we now not only have clean, sanitized fresh air, but the confidence to know it will stay that way due to the complete service and professionalism we got from Autumn Air.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your review of our company!

text:
So thankful for Jeff and his team. So professional, helpful, informative, and efficient. We called the night our air conditioner went out, Jeff came that night to offer options and quotes, then they arrived and installed the very next morning. They had the air on by lunch and completed modifications by dinner. Jeff considered our concerns and needs, then offered multiple options to meet both. Leaps and bounds above the competition. They made sure everything was properly set up and running as efficiently as possible before leaving. They even cleaned up after themselves. I highly recommend, especially if you have an out of date unit and and want to reduce your power bill. Fresh, Clean, Crisp Air all thanks to Jeff and his team.

Description of work:
Heat Pump and Air Handler Replacement - increased from 4ton unit to 5ton unit - duct work modifications to accommodate increase. Original construction of our home, 12 years ago, was  rushed and the a/c and duct work was thrown together quickly and in a sloppy manner. Our duct work was constricting air flow and in need of modifications. Our power bill was astronomical. So we called Autumn Air.

name: Max Levi
text:
Autumn Air (Charles in particular), have been absolutely incredible!  My existing furnace kept cutting off in the mornings, but then it ran fine for most of the day.  It was a difficult thing to track down, and they never quit troubleshooting to get to the root of the issue so they could fix it the right way.

This took several trips, they tried several things, one at a time, to narrow it down.  Instead of changing a bunch of things or applying "band-aids", they worked hard to pinpoint the true issue.  It ended up being a piece of metal (limit) that was popping and shutting it off prematurely (before the heat limit actually occurred).  So a tiny faulty limit had to be found, and they found it.

It took a lot of patience and tedious work at times.  They just had the attitude of "I'll find the root cause no matter what it takes, and I won't stop until I find and fix it."  I truly believe others would have given up or chalked it up to an issue with my new thermostat.

I really appreciate the time and effort that was put into troubleshooting, not giving up, and finding the real issue, and fixing it the right way!

name: Deidre Stone
text: We built our house just 3 Summers ago. During that 3 years it seems like either 1 unit or the other was in a struggle and the builder's installer was at my house at least every 6 months. It just never did heat or cool correctly and ran what seemed like constantly. You can imagine my frustration in a new home. This spring we called Autumn Air. They came right out and checked everything. They even went into the attic and found an issue with a clogged drain. (which the other guys never did) The air has been so cold all Summer that we can't set it under 74 without getting a chill and my power bill is HALF of what it has been in the past! Here we are 4 months later and my technician, Baker, gives me a courtesy call to just see how things are going since the service. I can't say enough good about these guys! Affordable, professional, and quick! I won t call or recommend  anyone but Autumn Air going forward!!Thanks for taking the stress out of my Summer!

text: I have been with a different local HVAC company for the past 4 years. I had been content with them and their service until I had a repair. Turns out it was a steep price! I lost TRUST and confidence with them for work. I heard Autumn advertising on WDJC and thought I would check them out. Their monthly maintenance program is very reasonably priced and I even quizzed them on how much a capacitor replacement would run...much more reasonable! So I made the switch and scheduled my first maintenance visit...next day I might add and not in 6 weeks like the other. I was once again shocked at how bad my other service companies quality of work was for maintenance as Charlie showed me all of the stuff that wasn't being done! So, I am very happy I made the switch and hopeful that I have a company I can trust!

name: Lee McCarty
text: Our air conditioner decided to break down late Friday night, so I found myself in the position of trying to find someone to come out on Saturday to fix it. After calling numerous other companies that were in my area, each time just being told they had no available service time except later in the week, (none of them even asked exactly what the unit was doing, or what was wrong). I found Autumn Air online, and even though they weren't in my area, I figured I had nothing to lose trying them. My call was answered professionally, and he took my info and told me that they were pretty full for the day, but that they would try to fit me in. He asked me for details on what was wrong. After about 10 minutes, he called me back saying that they had a cancellation and a tech could be. at the house in about an hour. An hour later the tech was here and within 30 minutes we had cool air!!! I want to thank Autumn Air for taking the time to talk to me and for fitting me into their busy schedule on such a hot Saturday. The price was VERY reasonable, especially considering that it was a Saturday in the busy Summer season. I would recommend this company to everyone I know!

resp.text: Lee thanks so much for the recommendation.  Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Amber Flores
text: We went with them about a year ago and they did a decent job but not this time. We had absolutely no air in 90 degree weather. We called Friday and they told us they were busy and may not get to us that day which was fine (we wanted to go with them since we did last year so we didn't call anyone else) and they took our name and number and said they'd give us a call back that day and let us know when they could come. Late Friday no call, no text. I called and left a voice mail letting them know. Monday still no call so I called them again. We left another voice-mail. At this time we decided to call another company who scheduled us in as an emergency since it was so hot outside. It is now Wednesday and we have yet to get a call back from this company and our air is running beautifully thanks to the other awesome company we went with. My problem isn't the fact that they may have been too busy and couldn't see us this week,, my problem is the fact they couldn't call and let us know at any time in the past 6 days when the weather has been over 90 degrees in the house.

text: Rude customer service over the phone. Sounded annoyed when they answered and said “hello”. Sounded further annoyed when I asked questions about warranty coverage on my 4 month old Trane AC unit. Will never call them or choose to do business with them again.

resp.text:
I am sorry that I am just now coming across this review.  I have checked our customer database and do not see a customer

with your name so I am not sure you have called the correct company.  If I had an address, I could verify if we installed your Trane unit and what name it was purchased under.  The warranty on parts come from the manufacturer and we can get warranty parts on units installed by any Trane Dealer if we are the company that installs the parts.   We can not warranty another installing dealer's labor unless an extended labor warranty option was purchased through a warranty company that we are set up with.  I am sorry you had a bad experience, but hope that this explains how our company processes warranty. I think that most other HVAC companies process warranty in this similar manner.

text: The technician was polite and competent enough for the job. He replaced a leaking outdoor faucet. The COST WAS EXCESSIVE. This company uses a notebook with a printed price list. You pay the service fee in addition to  the listed price. . The cost has nothing to do with time spent, parts used, or ease of access to the job.  The technician spent less than 20 minutes and the cost was $577.  He left the old faucet laying on the ground. I regret that I agreed to the job.

resp.text: Hi Cindy, thank you for your honest feedback. Input like yours helps us take steps towards improving as a company. We are sorry to hear the cost of our services didn't meet your expectations. We provide upfront pricing before the job begins so there are never any surprises. We also pride ourselves on cleanliness and picking up after each job - so we sincerely apologize for the faucet that was left behind. Please know we will be addressing each of your concerns with the management team, but we'd also love the chance to speak with you directly. Please call us at your earliest convenience: 205-942-1405

name: Fred Patterson
text: OnTime Service is a great electrical contracting company.   Most of my experiences with contractors on the Eastern Shore have been pretty mediocre at best.   OnTime Service was a refreshing change.   They are a well established Birmingham based company that just recently branched out to Baldwin County.   They took my call immediately (unlike the other 3 electricians that never called back) and the next day an electrician showed up to install the transfer switch for my house generator.   It was pretty clear the technician was very skilled and was very pleasant to work with.   They have a preset price book, which matched what I was expecting for cost.   If you need a competent electrician that cares about customer service, give these folks a call.

resp.text: Fred, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are thrilled to hear that our team took excellent care of you, and we appreciate your business. Thank you for choosing OnTime Service!

name: S J
text:
My first experience with On Time was excellent !!!
I was having issues w my air con and looked at many companies in our area and this one stood out above them all. I am very picky and since we are newer to area we had no idea who was legit. I Did A LOT of reading last night. I could tell the owners really screen and take extra care to hire great people as well as they themselves seem like awesome people !
Of all times for my air con to have trouble during this  CO-19 virus scare it would seem who could or would be safe to call ? With stay at home-social distancing that all of us are doing I was concerned
However On Time made me feel safe with the precautions they have taken with their employees
They are very professional in so many ways.

Thank you On Time for your excellent service and for sending Reaves to our home
He was polite professional and thorough
My air con is fixed & all is well

Thank you Reaves for putting yourself out there to fix our air con during this scary time
God Bless you

He replaced thermostat with the proper one, so I can use ‘auto’ function. Everything seems to be OK. Good Job Kevin!

11/5 Derrick returned and we decided after an evaluation of the problem, my unit (heat side) can not be run in the ‘Auto’ mode. He removed the new thermo and put my old one back in not using ‘Auto’. text: Charged us 127.45$ to simply change the name on the utilities bill. They stated its due to opening it as a new account under a different name. Also incredibly unprofessional when it comes to actually getting trash. Stating when the trash can is on the sidewalk it is 15ft from the road. That is a bold faced lie. Im taking time stamped pictures. Seriously this service is beginning to eat at my patience. Hope you see this when considering their services.

name: Michael Pitts
text: They returned my deposit by crediting it to my current bills. July was the first month this year I had to pay due to that. Just nice to have my money returned.

name: Al Gossan
text:
We have waited around 4 months to get our cable buried after installation and it is STILL not done. This is after calling repeatedly and getting promises it would be done by secretary, managers, etc.

They also buried our neighbors (who moved in several months after we did and STILL didn’t do ours...even though the technician mentioned to our neighbor he saw the “mess” of our cable laying there!!

They OBVIOUSLY need to hire more people to keep up with their booming business OR they will experience a mass exodus as soon as another cable company comes to compete. Shortsighted business practices that will backfire in a big way! WAKE up company leaders before it is too late.

name: John Smith Sr
text: Quick to response and bring the darkness into the light.

name: Rachel Engle
text: They have always been so understanding and I am impressed at how willing they were to help and how understanding they were when things got tough with this covid19 stuff. I'm so appreciative and so glad we chose them.

name: Bernard Cook
text: Very easy to find, fast efficient & very cordial service, quite impressed!

name: Susan Wangner
text:
Hubby and I are so happy that Riviera can repair appliances. We only have our water with them, no other utilities. A friend suggested we call Riviera to repair the clothes dryer several years ago so they came and fixed the problem right away. The dishwasher had an issue later so once again, we called Riviera to get ‘er done. Yesss!

Now more recently, we decided to FINALLY  get our ice maker repaired. It had been on the blink for several years and we were tired of messing with it, so we got the repair guys out. We knew it would be costly since the ice maker needed replacing (we figured that) but the estimate they gave us and the estimate we had guessed was the same! No worries about being overcharged, ever. These guys are prompt and so courteous.

We will always call Riviera for our appliance repair needs. Thanks guys!

name: Nikia Robinson
text: Very unprofessional,  we asked to get cable installed and had to wait a whole week , also the cable guy FINALLY came and he acted like he didn't have a clue what he was doing . he told me the maintenance people had to do something in order to get the cable,  ok . I got maintenance here they said he was suppose to do everything because they have cable n internet with rivera . Called them to tell them about the issue . They called back saying that the cable guy told them I said I didn't want the cable anymore. Which was a complete LIE because if I didn't want it I wouldn't have paid .. We asked for a refund n we couldn't get it . And they never told us no refunds ..

name: James Childers
text: Internet service is terrible. I'm only getting about 20% of the speed I'm paying for. Have called several times but nothing has gotten better.

name: Richard Haygood
text: Only owed a small amount and they were ready to take our meter. Always paid our bill every month. Tried to get a one week extension, not a chance. Why are there other customers with $500+ bills still with their meters? Disgusted by this company.

name: Juli “Crappie Queen” Chandler
text:
Decent service
Expensive start Up fee

name: Colton Stevens
text: You'll get the other 3 back when we get internet back.....

name: Beach Rat
text:
WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!!!  Been paying for their premium internet service which  is supposed to be 40.  Since the date it was connected, November 14th,  I have been lucky to get around 14-20 mbs and not the 40 I'm paying for.  I have tried numerous times to get this problem corrected.  Technical support advised me that there were "upgrades being made" which I was later informed that was a lie and evidently used just to appease me.  I've since called back numerous times and left messages which are rarely returned.
I actually had one lady transfer me around and when I kept getting transferred back to her she sent me right back to their internet help department which I had already spoken to thanks to numerous times for several hours total.  Their internet help department apologized and transferred me back to her and the phones had been switched off saying that they were closed.  After successfully giving me the runaround for nearly 30 minutes she was able to just switch the phone off and be on her merry way.   I left Century Link due to poor internet speed and piss poor customer service.  It appears Riviera isn't much better.  I understand things happen with technological items and speeds vary.  But to never get the speed I'm paying for and to constantly get the run around when trying to get the problem fixed is unacceptable.  If only Mediacom serviced my area.  I've been with Riviera for years and this is by FAR the worst experience I've ever had with them.

name: elayna vail
text: They responded immediately and Nick and Russell, the 2 fellows that came out ,, were very courteous and kind and polite and fixed my meter right away and answered all my questions and never complained even though it was a very cold day. It’s hard to meet people with good attitudes in any service nowadays but these men had good friendly attitudes.  Thank you guys.

name: Matt White
text: Ask for Anthony for your appliance repair needs. He was by far the best and most helpful person in repairing my hot water heater after lightning strike! I called a lot of places before Riviera Utilities and they were the only ones that were helpful in my case! Thanks!

text: Horrible prices. A 1000 square foot apartment costs over $275 a month for water and electric ONLY. When I was on Baldwin EMC I had a 1200 Sq ft condo and it was never over $150. Extremely rude customer service and they are never on time when they need to come by. HORRIBLE

name: Pat Clay
text: Not much to review as far as cable internet.  They just don't offer it and it's 2016.  This leaves the only internet service provider in much of the service area as CenturyLink.  CenturyLink offers substandard internet service at substandard speeds at an inflated price because they can;  they're the only game in town.   I spoke with a Riviera Utilities rep about why they don't offer cable internet and she said that they did not want to compete with private business.  I don't really understand this response as subscription television is offered by Dish and DirecTV and if I'm not mistaken, they compete against cable television services.   So, with the help of Riviera choosing to not have cable internet and competing with CenturyLink, if you're in Foley Alabama, welcome to 1995.

name: Mark Engelmeyer
text:
During the quoting process for a  complete replacement Heat Pump for my 15 year old system we reached out to Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning.
They had been recommended to me from a neighbor.  We scheduled a time  to meet and discuss replacement options and quote the replacement system.  Madison called the morning of the estimate and Josh Hembree called, as promised, one hour prior to the meeting time.  Josh arrived on time and came prepared with all necessary information on a variety of systems available.  We were searching for a reliable system with an excellent warranty.  Josh offered an American Standard with an extended warranty through Hembree at a very fair and reasonable price.  The quote was under our budget which allowed us to step up to a 16 SEER system.  Overall, the quote for the 16 SEER system was less than any other quote we had received.  Josh schedule an install date for the following week.  Walt gave me a call on hour before the scheduled install.  Walt and Colin arrived on time to conduct the install as promised.  They were both very knowledgeable, friendly and professional.  The installation of the system was completed on time the day of starting the install.  The entire system functions flawlessly and is so much cleaner and more professional performing than my old system.  Josh Hembree and the entire Team at Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning are friendly, knowledgeable and trustworthy.  The final price was exactly as quoted and we continue to enjoy our new American Standard Heating and Air Conditioning Heat Pump.  I recommend Hembree Heating & Air Conditioning to all of my family, friends and will continue to use them for all of my future HVAC needs.

name: mike norris
text: I absolutely could not be more satisfied in the professional service that Hembree provided me!  I had to replace two systems due to Hurricane Sally and Hembree made this process so much easier than I expected.  From the initial consultation with Josh to discuss my options to the top notch installation by Chris and Morgan.  I was consistently kept in communication with what to expect, recommendations and progress.  They were prompt, courteous and did an amazing job with the installation.  I never thought I would be so excited about a new HVAC system!  However, Hembree exceeded all my expectations and I would not hesitate to use them again!  I highly recommend this company!!

resp.text: Mr. Norris, you are so kind. Thank you for your thoughtful review! We have thoroughly enjoyed working for you and will always be here for you should you need us again in the future. Enjoy your two new 17 SEER systems!

text: 3D Air was excellent in their handling of our project. They would also explain how far along they were in the process (we elected to fully replace our 40 year old ductwork as well).  Everything looks shiny, neatly installed, and there is no more "accidental cooling" of the garage area due to the old ductwork.  I highly recommend 3D Air!

name: Jay Connor
text: I have used 3D Air Services for 5 years to service my home and two businesses.  Their services and products offered have been top notch.  The service techs are on time, professional, and are able to communicate clearly what is needed and the process that will take place.  Every time I call I easily get someone on the phone that is professional and efficient when handling my requests.  They schedule my service for maintenance within any time that works with me.  If I have an emergency they always come immediately and are prepared to handle whatever problem arises.  I have had them out at 11pm and worked until 3am as well as on holidays and still received the same professionalism that I was accustom to during normal business hours.  I am always impressed with how detailed they are when doing a simple service and cleaning.  I have entrusted them to replace 2 separate hvac units, a water heater, and dryer venting.  I have them service a separate unit that was installed before I knew of them. They treat it with the same respect that they do with the ones they installed.  They have provided superior service and I am confident that what is replaced is going to give me plenty of trouble free years.  I will continue to use their services on anything else I need and I am more than happy to give them a recommendation if needed.

text: Our heater went out the day before i went in for back surgery. When i got home we called 3D and Rodger G. came out that day and inspected everything. name: Adam Owens
text: We had an 18 year old unit that finally bit the dust on Sunday...mind you in the middle of a down pour from Hurricane Nate. I called 3D and they said they would have someone out between 2-2:30. Chris called and showed up at 1:15pm. He took his time, worked on the unit and gave us an estimate for the repair but also to replace the unit. We decided it was time to do so and so they got on it the next day replacing the unit within a few hours. The unit has been installed for a day and is running great, very quiet and the installer even leveled out the area where the heat pump would sit to make sure it was balanced properly. I can't stress enough how much customer service makes a difference for us and Chris and the crew at 3D really did a great job.

name: Heather Thomas
text: Excellent service. They made sure to get us heat before the cold weather got here. The workers were polite and professional. Thank you 3D!!

text: Chris is very knowledgeable and very professional when working with a client. They do not keep you waiting for the appointment time that you have. They do not try to sell you something you do not need and I appreciate that.

text: Bad board on 20-yr-old system caused blower to quit. They were able to jumper blower to run constantly until they can come back and replace entire system.

text: Initial visit was great and helpful. Fixed the problem quickly and answered all of our questions. We even decided to sign up for yearly service maintenance with them. Unfortunately, after paying for it and being told someone would call to start the maintenance the next week we never were contacted during the next three weeks. I finally called and cancelled and was told they would send the refund. I would recommend them still for a one time fix but not the annual service contract.

name: Stephen Harris
text:
I had 2 heat pump units that died so I went down the list of EBSCO recommended contractors for Birmingham.  I had one company come out to get my first quote.  The price seemed high and the salesman was not especially personable or helpful.  I needed another quote and Chris from 3D Air services came out and had a look.  He was very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions.  He saw things that the other contractor did not, such as a poor duct work design that was choking air to a particular room in my house.  He explored a couple of options with me and we settled on the best solution.  He really inspired confidence and wrote me a detailed quote for a fair price to replace both units with 2 different brand options.

The installers were also knowledgeable in answering my questions and addressing my concerns.  Chris showed up on the first day of the install as well, which was good to show that the salesman didn't just wash his hands of me after the sale.  The installers worked hard for 2 days and got everything installed in a professional manner.  They put down mats on my floors to minimize mess and swept up on their way out at the end of each day.

Overall I am very pleased with 3D Air Services.  The service was professional top to bottom and I always felt like the employees were being honest with me.  I will absolutely recommend them to friends and family members in the future.

name: Ryan Moulin
text: Initial visit was great and helpful. Fixed the problem quickly and answered all of our questions. We even decided to sign up for yearly service maintenance with them. Unfortunately, after paying for it and being told someone would call to start the maintenance the next week we never were contacted during the next three weeks. I finally called and cancelled and was told they would send the refund. I would recommend them still for a one time fix but not the annual service contract.

name: J.B. Guthrie
text: On time, professional, efficient, and life saving. Alabama heat doesn't mess around in July and neither does 3D Air Services. Highly recommend.

name: Marie Smith
text: Kevin was very professional and on time.

resp.text: Thanks!

name: Lance Moore
text: Quick service on a Saturday. Was very happy with the tech, Chris. The price was reasonable too.

name: Carolyn Petty
text: We have used 3D Air Services several times, because we have a number of units in our large building. Every time we call, they respond quickly, usually coming out the same day. They replaced an aging unit with a great Carrier unit, and it's working well; but when we called them out again, expecting to have to replace another, they simply replaced the thermostat instead, solving the problem and saving us thousands of dollars. I highly recommend them for their efficiency, honesty, and general attitude. Even the woman who answers the phone is part of the same company-wide excellence!

name: Ron Rollins
text: Big Thanks to Shavarus and Kevin. Friendly and professional. They went the extra mile, all the while smiling!!!! Thanks again for everything!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ande Underwood
text:
Chris came over and helped address the sloppy work performed by another HVAC contractor sent by our home warranty company. He was professional, polite, and knowledgeable. We signed up for their service plan, and are considering dropping the home warranty.

Thanks to Jay C. for recommending them!

name: Richard Garlikov
text: 3D Air installed a mini-split system for me three years ago and did an excellent job of that, and were nice to work with, especially because they patiently explained all that I needed to do before having the system installed and how it all worked.  They also installed the main house unit when the house was built, and came out one time at no charge to make an adjustment I requested.  So even though I have free semi-annual inspections of my main house unit with Sears whole house warranty, I do not use that and instead I pay for 3D to come out and 'tune' my unit and clean the coils, etc.   I trust them more, and they are more professional.  Today the service representative was Kevin and he was excellent in terms of doing the work and explaining all of it to me.  I like to understand what all is involved in this sort of thing.

name: Karen Smith
text: Chris at 3D Air did awesome repair on our air conditioner.He is very knowledgeable.explained in detail what needed to be repaired and went to work.I would call 3 D Air without hesitation.

name: Crissy V
text: 3D showed up when the company we had a maintenance contract with did not.  We spent $900 less than 14 days prior with the previous company.  We called 3D's main number and Chris called us back promptly.  Chris was their prior to his ETA.  He was friendly and professional and gave us several options as to how we could proceed. We needed to replace our AC system.  From the person on the phone, technician, and the installation crew, everyone was courteous, informative, and on time.  We had our entire system replaced within 24 hours of our after hours and on a holiday service call.

name: Rachael Hutchison
text: Chris was awesome! Had same day service and got us back up and running! Highly recommend!

name: Randall Williams
text: As a liscensed realtor, I always want to work with professional people who know there business and perform well. We are very pleased with the work, told me what they would do and did all they said. No surprises in the quality, the price or the workmanship, I would recommend them for my clients and would use them again for my personal needs.

name: Phillip Hughes
text: Very professional group. Correctly diagnosed problem and made repairs . Job required additional duct, stayed late into the night until the job was finished. I would certainly recommend them!!

name: Brandi Sharit
text: Our unit is a year old and works great. Our gas bill decreased dramatically with this unit. Chris does a great job with our maintenance on the unit. Thanks, 3D!

text: Installation was done in 1 day, the technicians were courteous and worked diligently. The office staff was awesome each time I spoke with them. I would highly recommend using this company for your HVAC needs!!!

text:
The service has been impeccable, and while knowing nothing about HVAC the quality seems beyond reproach as we have had no problems.

Chris is the consummate professional. We have had them put in an AC unit and have a maintenance contract with them and have been very pleased. Next is a duct re-work. They have put no pressure on us to have that done, but has been mentioned on several visits and we finally decided to get 'er done.

name: Jeannie Birkenkamp
text: We had to have our entire until replaced.  All I can say is we will never use another HVAC company.  They were extremely informative, professional, courteous and timely.  They made a huge frustration into a very smooth process.  The techs, the office, we were impressed with everyone we came in contact with.  I would absolutely recommend them 10x over!  Great company!

name: Paul Wynn
text: Very knowledgable and helpful. Would do business with again!!!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Stephen Talley
text: We had 3D conduct our annual service today. The technician, Chris was very professional and when he found a problem, he explained what the problem was and what would be best to correct it. I am very happy with the experience and would recommend 3D to everyone!!!

name: Devin Smith
text: 3D has helped me several times over the years. After installing a new water-heater in my home, my power bill has been significantly less, and it's all thanks to 3D!

name: CHRIS HARPER
text: These folks are great. A/c would just stop in the middle of the night for a few hours then start back. Did this for about 4 days. Finally it shut down right befor they got there and the problem was discovered and fixed. They stayed with the process to make sure it was fixed. Can't say enough good things about their work and Kevin the tech.

name: Matt Clements
text: Excellent experience with Rodger and crew, from estimate to installation.  When my mother needed to replace a 24yr old Carrier system, we got estimates from 5 companies; one for Carrier, two for Bryant, one for Lennox, and one for Heil.  3D Air's proposal was not the cheapest, but also not the most expensive, and (1) Rodger was the most thorough in his visit; (2) others charged extra for duct cleaning/sealing and/or didn't include a filter or sanitizer/UV; (3) others proposed reusing the lineset, which I was just a little skeptical of with it being 24yrs old (or older); (4) nobody else considered whether rooftop venting required updating; and (5) the next closest offer included less labor warranty or a very expensive option to extend from 1yr to 10yr.  In addition, 3D Air's front office was very responsive by email to requests for changes to the proposal options.  Plus, they offer competitively priced annual service plans.  After deciding to proceed, the time from signing to install was minimal, and the installation crew worked politely & efficiently and the results reflect an attention to detail that provides a lot of peace of mind.  The new system is running great.  Thank you!

name: Pat G. Johnson
text: Our experience with this company was great. The service tech was very knowledgeable and even though we have an older heat/air system he took time to research the problem and fix it . I highly recommend them!

name: Cherie Hickey
text: Fantastic job by Chris Gilham and his team today! Very professional with the job, cleaned up the mess, and left us way cooler than we were before, if that’s even possible! 🤣

name: Steven Sisco
text: Quick response, honest and excellent installation of water heater, heat pump. We are happy customers!

name: Austin Bond
text: Really appreciate the customer service, they went way above and beyond what was required! They stand by their slogan “whatever it takes.” Thanks guys.

name: MICHAEL CLEMMER
text: Needed help fast on a Saturday and 3D had me covered.  Rodger showed up and quickly determined the problem.  These guys are fast, efficient, and honest.

name: Chris Hardin
text: Guy came out. I knew i had a leak and i complained about how my previous HVAC guy would just put in refrigerant at $100 per lb. He said they didn't just do that and he would try to find the leak. He pulled off my coil panel said its rusted out and we needed new coils or a new unit. He was really pushing the new unit, we decided to wait and just get r22 put in. He charged way more than i expected, he half put back on the panel so cold air was still leaking out into the attic like crazy. I managed to find the leak myself with a $20 sniffer off Amazon and I repaired it. It turns out the coil manifold wasn't rusted bad like he said. I feel sorry for people who just take these guys word at face value.

name: Oliver Pesch
text: We first encountered 3D Air over a year ago when another, not to be named, firm try to scam us on a simple service call and even sabotaged our unit in an attempt to get us to buy a whole new unit at an inflated price.  We came across 3D through some other contacts and Chris stopped by, fixed the original problem (simply a clogged drain line), found and corrected the problem created by the other contractor (loosened valve to drain the Freon to make it look like the unit was faulty) -- all at a normal service call rate.  We have trusted Chris and team ever since so this year when our unit went out for real we called Chris. He quoted good quality units at a very reasonable price and the whole process was fast, efficient and very professional.  I would not hesitate to recommend 3D Air to anyone needing a trusted HVAC expert.

name: Professor Waller
text: 3D Air Resolved my issues in an efficient and timely manner.

Yesterday when Chris came to check out my complaint of a sporadic start for the air compressor, he found nothing wrong with it, but checked all the equipment to be sure all was OK.They are the tops for service and professionalism.

name: Charlotte Weems
text: Just had my 2nd yearly inspection performed. The technician was very thorough and knowledgeable. I renewed my contract for another year and got discounts on the Aprilaire media replaced in my return air filter. I have used 3D since I moved in my new house in 2008.

text: Had an AC issue caused by my roofers who then called 3D Air to check on it. Chris came out within an hour and confirmed the issue. His recommendation helped me recover funds towards a new AC unit. The new unit was installed within 2 days with no issues. Very professional installation and customer service. Chris answered all of my texts within minutes I look forward to the new relationship. Price was not the lowest but worth a small premium for the quality of service.

name: Sheila Guidry
text: The best company! Chris answers my phone calls at any hour and installed a Reme Halo and a Apriliaire Filter, I can already tell a difference in my air quality!

name: Steve Bedsole
text:
Our heat pump died. Chris came out the same day I called to scope out the replacement and other work we needed (move a duct and replace hot water heater). Unlike the other two companies that we consulted, Chris prepared his pricing for us before he left our house. His pricing came out slightly higher, but his professionalism and three years of labor coverage made the choice easier for us.

They came out the day after we awarded the job and stayed until everything was done and cleaned up. They ran into a little snafu when a water shut off valve malfunctioned - not their fault. But they stayed, sent a guy to Lowe's to get a replacement, and fixed it with no additional charge to us.

We are very pleased withtheir work and how quiet the new Bryant 15 SEER heat pump is. Time will tell how much our energy bill drops, but we feel confident Chris and his team will be there for us should we need them.

name: Robby Farley
text: we have used these guys for just over 5 years. they are always courteous, professional and most importantly punctual.

name: Jim Jones
text: We had our duct work replaced and the unit serviced. 3D technicians was very professional and done a awesome job.

name: Gloria McGee
text: 3D Air originally came to my home to service our unit for the Summer before we discovered a much more serious issue. 3D provided a detailed plan to eliminate the problem with a cost effective method of payment for a very unexpected problem. Their service techs came back the next business day to fix the issue and the unit is working better than it was when it was originally installed. Their reps are very friendly, informative and professional. They also cleaned up behind the work and left the house as clean as it was when the techs arrived. I would recommend 3D Air to anyone with HVAC maintenance or repair needs and I will continue to use them as my HVAC service provider in the future.
